columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record (surrogate key).

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign that this salesman is assigned to; likely references a Campaign entity.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman / salesperson assigned to the campaign; likely references a Salesman or Employee entity.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date the assignment record was created (stored as CHAR(10), format MM/DD/YYYY in samples).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique address identifier (surrogate key).

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary address line (native language). Typically street name and number.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line (native language), e.g., apartment, building or additional info.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line often containing locality, city and postal code (native language).

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Quaternary address line, typically country name (native language).

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate for the address (FLOAT). Values may represent projected coordinates depending on geocoding model.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate for the address (FLOAT). Values may represent projected coordinates depending on geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Code indicating the geocoding model type used (e.g., 0/1).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model that produced the geocode information (text).

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocode lookup/search was performed.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Quality/confidence score returned by the geocoding model (higher is better).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for the street entity returned by the geocoding model (may be null for many rows).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for a secondary street entity from the geocode result (often null).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Location identifier (e.g., locality or place id) assigned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal code returned by the geocoding model (text).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Identifier of the country for this address; foreign key to dbo.Country.ID.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string used when performing geocode lookup; useful for debugging or matches.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number/token returned by the geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street name text returned by the geocoding model (often null).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Secondary street number returned by the geocoding model (often null).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality / place name returned by the geocoding model (native language), e.g., city or village.

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude returned by geocode engine (stored as VARCHAR in source).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude returned by geocode engine (stored as VARCHAR in source).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical area codes or identifiers returned by geocoding/boundary data (space-separated codes).

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Numeric representation of postal code (INTEGER).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative area name returned by geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Sub-area or neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model (native language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mart key or source system reference used for ETL mapping to downstream tables.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name or partition identifier used in the data-mart / ETL process.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the data-mart or source system; often null.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code from geocoding model indicating geometry/classification type (e.g., L, N).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether Line1 was overridden by a user (BIT/boolean).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary address line translated / transliterated into English.

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line translated / transliterated into English.

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line in English, often contains city and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Country name in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Street name returned by geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street text from geocode result in English (often null).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality / city name from geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative area in English returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area / neighborhood in English returned by geocoding model.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the English Line1 was overridden by a user (BIT/boolean).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number/token from geocoding model in English representation.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Secondary street number/token from geocoding model in English representation (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this payment method record

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the type of payment method (e.g., check, credit card); foreign key to dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Optional reference to the bank used for this payment; foreign key to dbo.Bank.ID

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount applied by this payment method

columns.name: CheckEndDate
columns.description: Expiration or end date for the check (if applicable)

columns.name: CheckPublisherIsSame
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the check publisher is the same as the payee/recipient

columns.name: CheckPublisher
columns.description: Name of the person or organization that issued the check or payment

columns.name: CheckPublisherTaxCode
columns.description: Tax identification number (tax code) of the check issuer or payer

columns.name: CreditCardTypeID
columns.description: Reference to credit card type (e.g., Visa, MasterCard); foreign key to dbo.CreditCardType.ID

columns.name: CheckNumber
columns.description: Number printed on the check (if payment is by check)

columns.name: CreditCardTransactionCode
columns.description: Acquirer or gateway transaction code for a credit card payment

columns.name: CreditCardNumber
columns.description: Stored credit card number (sensitive). Typically masked or encrypted in production systems

columns.name: CreditCardEndDate
columns.description: Expiration date of the credit card used for payment

columns.name: CreditCardOwner
columns.description: Name of the credit card owner as provided on the card

columns.name: CreditCardInstallments
columns.description: Number of installments for a credit card payment (if applicable)

columns.name: BlockSeries
columns.description: Series code for blocked receipts or preprinted document series

columns.name: BlockReceiptNumber
columns.description: Receipt number within the block/series (often from preprinted receipts)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data migration integer key used for ETL or legacy mapping

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of legacy or migration table associated with this record

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for legacy data mapping or ETL identification

columns.name: SystemReceiptNumber
columns.description: Internal system-generated receipt number referencing the transaction or receipt

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Reference to the sales collection record this payment belongs to; foreign key to dbo.SalesCollection.ID

columns.name: CheckPublishDate
columns.description: Date the check was published/issued (if applicable)

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Bank deposit reference number associated with this payment

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date and time when the payment was deposited in the bank

columns.name: CollectionDate
columns.description: Date when the payment was collected or recorded in the system

columns.name: PolicyAmount
columns.description: Amount sourced from an advance payment policy (if applicable)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the advanced payment policy

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Descriptive name of the advance payment policy

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer human-readable description of the policy

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this policy was created

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or account that created the policy

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to this policy

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the policy

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value applied by this policy (when applicable)

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (limit) imposed by the policy

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Structured rule expression (XML/XAML) that encodes the policy logic and conditions

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional logic or formula (text) used to calculate advance amounts

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed amount defined by the policy (if applicable)

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentMethodID
columns.description: Identifier of the advanced payment method. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod(ID).

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the sales collection. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.SalesCollection(ID).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type/category of discount (business-defined enumeration).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description or business notes for the discount policy.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the discount policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value of the discount to apply when policy uses percentage-based discounts.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed amount discount to apply when the policy uses an amount-based discount (currency).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Business rule expression or formula that defines when and how the discount is applied.

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount applies per unit (True) or to the line/transaction (False).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Discount value for bundle level 1 (nullable).

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Discount value for bundle level 2 (nullable).

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Discount value for bundle level 3 (nullable).

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Discount value for bundle level 4 (nullable).

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Discount value for other bundle scenarios not covered by levels 1-4 (nullable).

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount that can be applied by this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount allowed by a supervisor under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount allowed by an area manager under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount allowed by a sales manager under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount allowed by a salesperson under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart / dimension key used for ETL or reporting integration (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the related data-mart table used for ETL or reporting (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for reporting/ETL to link dimensions (nullable).

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 1 under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 2 under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 3 under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 4 under this policy (nullable).

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for other products not covered by slots 1-4 (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate integer identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of why an advertisement was deactivated (Greek text).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short text code or label describing the sales type (e.g., ST1, ST2).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key referencing a record in an external data mart (frequently null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table where the DMKey/DMCharKey would map (frequently null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for lookups in an external data mart (frequently null).

columns.name: GeoAreaId
columns.description: Unique identifier code for the geographic area (alphanumeric string).

columns.name: Name_ΟΝΟΜΑΣΤΙΚΗ
columns.description: Official nominative name of the geographic area in Greek (onomastiki form).

columns.name: Name_ΓΕΝΙΚΗ
columns.description: Variant form of the area's name in Greek (genitive or alternative grammatical form).

columns.name: specifiers
columns.description: Additional qualifiers or administrative specifiers for the geographic area (e.g., district, qualifier).

columns.name: Concatenate Name
columns.description: Precomputed display name that combines the primary Greek name and any specifiers for easy presentation.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: internal unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code value that was archived (business-facing code used to identify the archived item).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the archived number record is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the archived number record; foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number record (display-friendly user identifier).

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute category or group (stored as text). Example values are numeric strings like '155'.

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Small code indicating the attribute type or classification (stored as text). Sample values include '5'.

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute (may be localized). Example: 'Internet_Cities' or Greek localized names.

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier (LCID) for the AttributeName field, stored as text (e.g., '1032').

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for the specific attribute value (stored as text). Distinct values represent different value records.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Human-readable value or description for the attribute (often localized). Example values are place names in Greek.

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier (LCID) for the AttributeValue field, stored as text (e.g., '1032').

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes applicable to the attribute value (e.g., 'RSHA1,RSHA2,RSHA3,RGSP') or 'None'.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the calendar entry.

columns.name: CalendarDate
columns.description: Date of the calendar event (date portion used). Example values like '2013-12-25 00:00:00'.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the calendar date or event (often localized), e.g., holiday names.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the auto-extract history record.

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when the extract event occurred (timestamp).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Descriptive log message or details about the extraction action.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code representing the type of extraction (e.g., 0, 1, 2).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numeric status code for the extract event (e.g., 0 = success/ok).

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition. Foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand allowed for the condition. Foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank record.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Official bank name or description as stored (may include Greek characters or localized text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the bank is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank deposit detail record. This ID is also used as a foreign key to SalesCollection.ID when the deposit is linked to a sales collection.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: References the Bank.ID for the bank where the deposit was made.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Bank's deposit or reference number (may include digits, letters or localized characters). Used as the human-readable identifier for the deposit.

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date and time when the deposit was recorded or posted.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this batch action history record.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: Identifier (GUID) of the batch to which this action belongs.

columns.name: BatchActionType
columns.description: Enumerated code indicating the type of action performed on the batch.

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when the batch action was recorded.

columns.name: RowsAffected
columns.description: Number of rows that were affected by this batch action (if applicable).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable message or description for the recorded action (may include localized text).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status code indicating the outcome or state after the action (e.g., success/failure or stage).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Additional classification code for the action used for categorization or filtering.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the analysis record in the batch action analysis table.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: Identifier (GUID) of the batch associated with this analysis record.

columns.name: EntityID
columns.description: Identifier of the entity (for example a customer or record ID) that was analyzed as part of the batch.

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type or category of the referenced entity (helps interpret EntityID).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Code indicating the analysis subtype or classification applied to the entity in this record.

columns.name: EntityData
columns.description: XML payload containing additional attributes or analysis details for the entity; may be null.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Code that identifies the broader geographic area (e.g., region code).

columns.name: AddressID
columns.description: Identifier of the address associated with the broader area (foreign key to dbo.Address.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key linking to an external data model record; may be null when no mapping exists.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mapping table that provided the mapping (e.g., XOFIX_GeoModel).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key from an external data model used for mapping; typically used when DMKey is not available.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geographic model used for this lookup row (e.g., '3.0').

columns.name: BroaderAreaID

columns.name: AreaName

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the master geographic area group (foreign key to dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup.ID); may be null for uncategorized areas.

columns.name: ShortAreaName
columns.description: Optional abbreviated or short version of the area name in the local language.

columns.name: AreaNameEn

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Optional abbreviated or short version of the area name in English.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version identifier of the geographic model used for this lookup row (e.g., 1.0).

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Unique identifier code for the broader geographic area within the specified GeoModelVersion.

columns.name: AreaName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the broader area (primary display label). Values are typically in the local language.

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Identifier for a master geographic area group. Column contains no data in this version but reserved for grouping areas.

columns.name: ShortAreaName

columns.name: AreaNameEn

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the business point record.

columns.name: LocationNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the classifier node that describes the business location (FK -> dbo.ClassifierNode.ID).

columns.name: LocationAddressID

columns.name: ActivityClassifierNodeID

columns.name: SalesNodeID
columns.description: Reference to a sales-related classifier node when applicable (FK -> dbo.ClassifierNode.ID).

columns.name: BillingAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the billing address for this business point (FK -> dbo.Address.ID).

columns.name: SalesContactID

columns.name: LegalFormID

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Official or display name of the business point (primary human-readable label).

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website URL associated with the business point, if available.

columns.name: IsActive

columns.name: DeactivationReason
columns.description: Text description or coded reason explaining why a business point was deactivated.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the business point record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the record.

columns.name: BrandName

columns.name: TaxOfficeID

columns.name: VatCategoryID
columns.description: Identifier for the VAT category applied to the business (FK -> dbo.VatCategory.ID).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business point business code or short identifier (often numeric string used in applications).

columns.name: Profession

columns.name: IsPOI

columns.name: CustomerSourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source or channel where the customer/business record came from (FK -> dbo.CustomerSource.ID).

columns.name: LastUpdateOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update received from external sources or processes.

columns.name: LastUpdateBy
columns.description: User or process that performed the last update reflected in LastUpdateOn.

columns.name: SalesAddressID
columns.description: Reference to an address used for sales or deliveries (FK -> dbo.Address.ID).

columns.name: DMKey

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: GLSeqCodeID

columns.name: KEPYOStatusID

columns.name: HasCRMTicket

columns.name: DMCharKey

columns.name: CustomerSolvencyID

columns.name: NoTaxVat

columns.name: SpecialInformation

columns.name: ExtraCardInformation

columns.name: TransferDateToEBS

columns.name: CustomerSourceModifiedOn

columns.name: CustomerUpdateModifiedOn

columns.name: CustomerUpdateID

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user who created the comment (dbo.User.ID). Represents the comment author.

columns.name: CommentDate

columns.name: CommentText
columns.description: The textual content of the comment. This is the primary human-readable description of the comment.

columns.name: CommentType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type or category of the comment. Values are implementation-defined (e.g., 0 = standard).

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Foreign key referencing the related business point comment (dbo.BusinessPointComment.ID). Links the attachment to its comment.

columns.name: Filename
columns.description: Full stored file path or location for the attachment as saved in the system (may include directories).

columns.name: DisplayName
columns.description: Human-friendly file name or display name for the attachment shown in the UI; suitable for labeling attachment entries.

columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attachment is considered deleted/soft-deleted (True) or active (False).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: BusinessPointID

columns.name: BusinessPointIdentificationID

columns.description: Identifier of the user who performed the action (foreign key to dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Numeric code describing the type of action taken (e.g., confirm, unconfirm, update). See application enum mapping for values.

columns.name: TaskID

columns.name: SourceType

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this custom attribute value record.

columns.name: BusinessPointListingID
columns.description: Reference to the business point listing that this attribute value belongs to (foreign key to dbo.BusinessPointListing.ID).

columns.name: AttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the custom attribute definition (references attribute metadata).

columns.name: Value
columns.description: Stored value for the custom attribute. Values may be free text or encoded lists (e.g., comma-separated codes).

columns.name: DraftValue
columns.description: Draft or proposed value for the custom attribute. Often null when no draft exists.

columns.name: IsDraftInit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a draft value has been initialized for this attribute (true/false).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Primary identifier for the business point (also a foreign key to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID).

columns.name: BalanceValue
columns.description: Current outstanding balance value for the business point expressed in the accounting currency.

columns.name: DueBalanceValue
columns.description: Amount of the balance that is past due (overdue) for the business point.

columns.name: SettlementBalanceValue
columns.description: Balance amount designated for settlement or reconciliation.

columns.name: SettlementWay
columns.description: Method or terms used to settle invoices or balances (e.g., bank transfer, cash, credit).

columns.name: HasCreditInvoice
columns.description: Indicator (true/false) whether there is an active credit invoice for the business point.

columns.name: CreditInvoiceDate
columns.description: Date when the credit invoice was issued for the business point.

columns.name: CreditInvoiceValue
columns.description: Monetary value of the credit invoice associated with the business point.

columns.name: PaymentWays
columns.description: List or description of accepted payment methods for the business point (e.g., cash, card, bank transfer).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used by downstream data marts or integration processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the downstream table or data mart where this record may be mapped.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external system mapping or integration for the business point.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the business point identification record.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the main business point entity (dbo.BusinessPoint.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Primary legal or trading name of the business point (human-readable label).

columns.name: BrandName
columns.description: Brand or commercial name under which the business point operates (may differ from legal name).

columns.name: TaxCode
columns.description: Tax identification code for the business (e.g., VAT or national tax number).

columns.name: Profession
columns.description: Short description of the business activity, profession or industry sector of the business point.

columns.name: Phone1
columns.description: Primary telephone number for the business point (landline preferred).

columns.name: Phone2
columns.description: Secondary telephone number for the business point (optional).

columns.name: Phone3
columns.description: Additional telephone number for the business point (optional).

columns.name: MobilePhone
columns.description: Mobile (cell) phone number for the business contact person or business point.

columns.name: Fax
columns.description: Fax number for the business point (if still used).

columns.name: Email1
columns.description: Primary email address for contacting the business point.

columns.name: Email2
columns.description: Secondary email address for the business point (optional).

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Full street address for the business point (street name, number, etc.).

columns.name: City
columns.description: City or town where the business point is located.

columns.name: PostalCode
columns.description: Postal or ZIP code for the business point's address.

columns.name: LegalForm
columns.description: Legal form or company type (e.g., Ltd, S.A., sole proprietorship) of the business.

columns.name: TaxOffice
columns.description: Name of the local tax office or tax authority associated with the business point.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used by data marts or integrations; mostly null in source.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional downstream table name used by data mart or integration processes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external system mapping; typically empty in this dataset.

columns.name: BillingEmailAddress
columns.description: Email address used for sending invoices and billing communications.

columns.name: BillingTelephone
columns.description: Telephone number used for billing or invoicing contact.

columns.name: ExtraInformation
columns.description: Free-text field for additional information or notes about the business point.

columns.name: CustomerURL
columns.description: Website URL for the customer or business point (if available).

columns.name: Heading
columns.description: Optional long heading or title used for display purposes; seldom populated.

columns.name: GeographicalPositionUrl
columns.description: URL linking to a map or geographical position (e.g., Google Maps link) for the business point.

columns.name: NewBusinessPointCodes
columns.description: Field for storing new or alternative business point codes (e.g., after re-coding); rarely populated.

columns.name: RelatedBPComments
columns.description: Comments about related business points, relationships or internal remarks linking records.

columns.name: RejectionReasonId
columns.description: Optional foreign key to a rejection reason that explains why this business point identification was rejected.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the business point listing record (unique identifier).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Reference to the BusinessPoint entity (the business location or point this listing belongs to).

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Identifier of the classifier node/category assigned to this listing (links to classification taxonomy).

columns.name: HeadingCode
columns.description: Short classification or heading code representing the assigned category (e.g., H3677).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this listing record was created.

columns.name: CreatedByID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the listing record (links to User).

columns.name: CreatedOnLogGroupID
columns.description: GUID that groups log entries related to the creation operation for auditing and traceability.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent modification to this listing record (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedByID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who last modified the listing record (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the audit/log entry (unique identifier).

columns.name: GroupID
columns.description: GUID used to group related log entries for the same change operation (useful for multi-row changes).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Reference to the BusinessPoint affected by this log entry.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Identifier of the classifier node/category referenced in this log entry.

columns.name: HeadingCode
columns.description: Classification/heading code associated with the logged change (e.g., H3846).

columns.name: BusinessPointListingID
columns.description: Identifier of the business point listing row that this log entry pertains to (may reference an external listing table).

columns.name: AttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the specific attribute/field that changed within the listing (metadata reference).

columns.name: ActionID
columns.description: Code indicating the kind of action recorded (for example: 1 = update, 2 = delete, etc.).

columns.name: OldValue
columns.description: The previous value of the field before the change (nullable or empty when not applicable).

columns.name: NewValue
columns.description: The new value of the field after the change (nullable or empty when not applicable).

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the log entry was recorded.

columns.name: PerformerID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who performed the action recorded in this log entry (links to User).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier for the business point (location or organizational unit) to which the default value applies.

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the content attribute definition for which a default value is specified.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: The default value (text) assigned to the specified content attribute for the given business point.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate identifier for the calendar entry (unique row identifier).

columns.name: CalendarDate
columns.description: The date represented by this calendar entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the calendar date (e.g., holiday or event name).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to link this calendar row to a data mart or dimensional model (may be null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart or dimension table associated with this calendar entry (may be null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key used to link this calendar row to external systems or dimensions (may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short campaign code or external identifier used for grouping or lookup.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable campaign name (used as the primary label for the campaign).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text about the campaign and its purpose.

columns.name: CampaignTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign type (FK to dbo.CampaignType.ID).

columns.name: State
columns.description: Campaign lifecycle state (enumeration stored as integer; e.g., active, closed, cancelled).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the campaign record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the campaign record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the campaign record (may be null if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the campaign record (may be null if never modified).

columns.name: StartedOn
columns.description: Actual start date/time of the campaign.

columns.name: StartedBy
columns.description: User who started the campaign (may be null).

columns.name: ClosedOn
columns.description: Date/time when the campaign was closed (if applicable).

columns.name: ClosedBy
columns.description: User who closed the campaign (may be null).

columns.name: CancelledOn
columns.description: Date/time when the campaign was cancelled (if applicable).

columns.name: CancelledBy
columns.description: User who cancelled the campaign (may be null).

columns.name: PlannedStartOn
columns.description: Planned or scheduled start date/time for the campaign (may be null).

columns.name: PlannedCloseOn
columns.description: Planned or scheduled close date/time for the campaign (may be null).

columns.name: SourceCampaignID
columns.description: Optional reference to another campaign that is the source or parent (FK to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SelectedAllocationPlanID
columns.description: Reference to the selected allocation plan for this campaign (FK to dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan.ID).

columns.name: TargetGroupItemNumber
columns.description: Numeric identifier for the target group item used by targeting processes (may be zero or null).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Key used for data-mart or legacy mapping to external DM tables (may be null for many rows).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data-mart or source table associated with the DMKey (may be null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external data-mart mapping (often null).

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to a medium/version entity (FK to dbo.MediumVersion.ID). Often not populated.

columns.name: GeographicDestinationID
columns.description: Reference to the geographic destination or region for the campaign (FK to dbo.GeographicDestination.ID).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the campaign record (used for concurrency or tracking changes).

columns.name: RequiresTargetingRecalculation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether targeting calculations need to be re-run for this campaign.

columns.name: PercentImprovementDeterioration
columns.description: Numeric percentage representing improvement or deterioration compared to a baseline (may be null).

columns.name: PrintedTarget
columns.description: Numeric target value used for printed materials or reporting (may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the allocation plan.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign this allocation plan belongs to (FK to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SubChannelAssigned
columns.description: Identifier or code of the sub-channel assigned to this plan (integer-coded).

columns.name: TargetValueAssigned
columns.description: Assigned numeric target value for this allocation plan.

columns.name: PlanType
columns.description: Type of allocation plan (enumeration stored as integer, e.g., default/alternate types).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the allocation plan used as the label in lists and UIs.

columns.name: TargetUserAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the target user assigned to the plan (may be a user id or lookup value).

columns.name: HandlerUserAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the handler user responsible for the plan execution.

columns.name: SupervisorAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the supervisor assigned to oversee the plan.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Key used for external data-mart mapping for allocation plan (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: External data-mart table name associated with this allocation plan (may be null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for mapping to an external data-mart or legacy system (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying each channel row in a campaign allocation plan.

columns.name: CampaignAllocationPlanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent Campaign Allocation Plan (dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan.ID).

columns.name: SubChannelID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a SubChannel used in the plan (dbo.SubChannel.ID).

columns.name: ULoss
columns.description: Unattributed (U) loss ratio for this sub-channel within the allocation plan (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Closs
columns.description: Calculated (C) loss ratio for this sub-channel — a fractional metric used by the allocation model.

columns.name: TotLoss
columns.description: Total loss ratio aggregated for the channel row (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Renewed
columns.description: Proportion of renewed items attributed to this channel in the plan.

columns.name: Repeat
columns.description: Proportion of repeat items (customers/policies) attributed to this channel.

columns.name: Decr
columns.description: Decrease rate metric used in allocation calculations for this channel (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Incr
columns.description: Increase rate metric used in allocation calculations for this channel (decimal proportion).

columns.name: ClosesLapsed
columns.description: Number or value of closes that are lapsed for this channel (model-specific numeric measure).

columns.name: ClosesOp
columns.description: Operational closes metric (count or monetary value) for this channel within the plan.

columns.name: StrikeLapsed
columns.description: Strike rate for lapsed items for this channel (decimal proportion).

columns.name: StrikeOp
columns.description: Operational strike rate used in allocation calculations for this channel (decimal proportion).

columns.name: ULossAvg
columns.description: Average unattributed loss (ULoss) computed for the channel across relevant segments or periods.

columns.name: ClossAvg
columns.description: Average calculated loss (Closs) for the channel used in modeling and comparisons.

columns.name: DecrAvg
columns.description: Average decrease rate (Decr) for this channel.

columns.name: IncrAvg
columns.description: Average increase rate (Incr) for this channel.

columns.name: NewAvg
columns.description: Average new business metric (NewAvg) for the channel; often a count or monetary average used for planning.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data mart integer key used for downstream reporting or lookup (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data mart table name for reference or staging (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mart lookup or integration (nullable).

columns.name: GroupCO
columns.description: Group-level CO metric (could be count or value) aggregated for the channel group.

columns.name: GroupValuesCO
columns.description: Aggregated value associated with GroupCO (monetary or large-count aggregate) for the channel group.

columns.name: GroupRoCO
columns.description: Group-level RoCO metric (an aggregate used in reporting or allocation calculations).

columns.name: GroupValuesRoCO
columns.description: Aggregated value associated with GroupRoCO for the channel group (monetary or count aggregate).

columns.name: GroupProspect
columns.description: Aggregate prospect-related metric for the group (e.g., prospect count or score sum).

columns.name: GroupValuesProspect
columns.description: Aggregated value related to prospects for the group (nullable or zero in many rows).

columns.name: GroupNew
columns.description: Aggregate new business metric for the group (count or value) used in planning.

columns.name: GroupValuesNew
columns.description: Aggregated numeric value associated with GroupNew (monetary or count aggregate).

columns.name: GroupCI
columns.description: Group-level CI metric (aggregate used for reporting/analysis).

columns.name: GroupValuesCI
columns.description: Aggregated value corresponding to GroupCI (monetary or large-count aggregate).

columns.name: AVOLapsed
columns.description: Average value (AVO) for lapsed items in this channel group.

columns.name: ClosesNP
columns.description: Closes for non-processed (NP) category for this channel (numeric metric).

columns.name: StrikeNP
columns.description: Strike rate for non-processed category for this channel (decimal proportion).

columns.name: AVONP
columns.description: Average value (AVO) for non-processed items in this channel group.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying each user row in a campaign allocation plan.

columns.name: CampaignAllocationPlanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent Campaign Allocation Plan (dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan.ID).

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user or agent associated with this allocation (dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: ULoss
columns.description: Unattributed (U) loss ratio for this user within the allocation plan (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Closs
columns.description: Calculated (C) loss ratio for this user — a fractional metric used by the allocation model.

columns.name: TotLoss
columns.description: Total loss ratio aggregated for the user (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Renewed
columns.description: Proportion of renewed items attributed to this user.

columns.name: Repeat
columns.description: Proportion of repeat items (customers/policies) attributed to this user.

columns.name: Decr
columns.description: Decrease rate metric used in allocation calculations for this user (decimal proportion).

columns.name: Incr
columns.description: Increase rate metric used in allocation calculations for this user (decimal proportion).

columns.name: ClosesLapsed
columns.description: Number or value of closes that are lapsed for this user (model-specific numeric measure).

columns.name: ClosesOp
columns.description: Operational closes metric (count or monetary value) attributed to this user.

columns.name: StrikeLapsed
columns.description: Strike rate for lapsed items attributed to this user (decimal proportion).

columns.name: StrikeOp
columns.description: Operational strike rate for this user used in the allocation model (decimal proportion or rate).

columns.name: ULossAvg
columns.description: Average unattributed loss (ULoss) computed for the user across relevant segments or periods.

columns.name: ClossAvg
columns.description: Average calculated loss (Closs) for the user used in modeling and comparisons.

columns.name: DecrAvg
columns.description: Average decrease rate (Decr) for this user.

columns.name: IncrAvg
columns.description: Average increase rate (Incr) for this user.

columns.name: NewAvg
columns.description: Average new business metric (NewAvg) for the user; often a count or monetary average used for planning.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data mart integer key used for downstream reporting or lookup (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data mart table name for reference or staging (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mart lookup or integration (nullable).

columns.name: GroupCO
columns.description: Group-level CO metric (count or value) aggregated and associated with this user.

columns.name: GroupValuesCO
columns.description: Aggregated value associated with GroupCO (monetary or large-count aggregate) for the user's group.

columns.name: GroupRoCO
columns.description: Group-level RoCO metric aggregated for reporting or allocation for the user's group.

columns.name: GroupValuesRoCO
columns.description: Aggregated value corresponding to GroupRoCO for the user's group (monetary or count aggregate).

columns.name: GroupProspect
columns.description: Aggregate prospect-related metric for the user's group (e.g., prospect count or score sum).

columns.name: GroupValuesProspect
columns.description: Aggregated value related to prospects for the user's group (nullable or zero in many rows).

columns.name: GroupNew
columns.description: Aggregate new business metric for the user's group (count or value) used in planning.

columns.name: GroupValuesNew
columns.description: Aggregated numeric value associated with GroupNew (monetary or count aggregate).

columns.name: GroupCI
columns.description: Group-level CI metric aggregated for the user's group (used in reporting/analysis).

columns.name: GroupValuesCI
columns.description: Aggregated value corresponding to GroupCI for the user's group (monetary or large-count aggregate).

columns.name: AVOLapsed
columns.description: Average value (AVO) for lapsed items attributed to this user or their group.

columns.name: ClosesNP
columns.description: Closes for non-processed (NP) category attributed to this user (numeric metric).

columns.name: StrikeNP
columns.description: Strike rate for non-processed items attributed to this user (decimal proportion).

columns.name: AVONP
columns.description: Average value (AVO) for non-processed items attributed to this user or their group.

columns.name: SubChannelID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing the SubChannel for this user entry (dbo.SubChannel.ID); nullable when user-level mapping is not by subchannel.

entities.name: Campaign Assignment BP Loss Request Detail

display.display_name: Campaign Assignment BP Loss Request Detail

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for the BP loss request detail record.

columns.name: RequestID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing CampaignAssignmentRequest.ID. Identifies the parent campaign assignment request for this BP loss detail.

columns.name: BPID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing BusinessPoint.ID. Identifies the business point (BP) affected by the loss in this request detail.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for the campaign assignment request.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Campaign.ID. Identifies the campaign associated with this request.

columns.name: CreatedByUserID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing User.ID. The user who created/submitted the request.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the request was created.

columns.name: ReasonID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing CampaignAssignmentRequestReason.ID. Categorical reason code for the request.

columns.name: RequestedSalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing User.ID. The salesperson for whom the request was made or who is affected by the request.

columns.name: PerformerID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing User.ID. The user who performed or is assigned to process/resolve the request (nullable).

columns.name: ClosedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the request was closed or resolved (nullable).

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: Textual comment or details provided when creating the request. Often contains free-text explanation in Greek.

columns.name: Outcome
columns.description: Recorded outcome or resolution summary for the request (nullable).

columns.name: RequestType
columns.description: Optional integer code indicating a sub-type or classification of the request (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign assignment request detail record

columns.name: RequestID
columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign assignment request (foreign key to CampaignAssignmentRequest.ID)

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign associated with this detail (foreign key to Campaign.ID)

columns.name: BucketID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign bucket / segment grouping for the record (foreign key to CampaignBucket.ID)

columns.name: OldSalesmanID
columns.description: User ID of the previous assigned salesman/salesperson (foreign key to User.ID)

columns.name: NewSalesmanID
columns.description: User ID of the newly assigned salesman/salesperson (nullable; foreign key to User.ID)

columns.name: OldSegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the segment previously assigned to this bucket/customer group

columns.name: NewSegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the new segment to be assigned (nullable)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the reason entry

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code representing the reason for the campaign assignment request

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the reason (text)

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this reason is currently active (True = active, False = inactive)

entities.name: Campaign Assignment to Business Point Request Detail

display.display_name: Campaign Assignment to BP Request Detail

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this campaign assignment detail record.

columns.name: RequestID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent campaign assignment request (dbo.CampaignAssignmentRequest.ID).

columns.name: BPID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the business point (dbo.BusinessPoint.ID) included in this assignment detail.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign bucket entry.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key to the Campaign this bucket belongs to (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier for the business point associated with this campaign bucket (may map to an external business point table).

columns.name: BussinessPointCode
columns.description: Alphanumeric code for the business point (external or internal business point identifier presented as text).

columns.name: BusinessPointName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the business point (organization or location) targeted by the campaign.

columns.name: ProductMixture
columns.description: Description of the product/media mix assigned to this business point (e.g., Websites+Profile).

columns.name: VerticalsGrouping
columns.description: Industry or vertical grouping classification for the business point.

columns.name: PrintAmount
columns.description: Allocated or recorded print media amount for this bucket (currency).

columns.name: PPCAmount
columns.description: Allocated or recorded pay-per-click budget or spend for this bucket (currency).

columns.name: XOGRAmount
columns.description: Amount attributed to XO.gr channel or a specific medium for this business point (currency).

columns.name: WebSiteAmount
columns.description: Amount allocated to website-related channels for this bucket (currency).

columns.name: TotalAmount
columns.description: Total monetary amount (sum of channels) associated with this campaign bucket (currency).

columns.name: NewChannel
columns.description: Channel classification for the new assignment (e.g., PREMISE).

columns.name: NewChannelID
columns.description: Identifier for the new channel classification applied to this bucket.

columns.name: NewSalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier for the newly assigned salesman for this business point.

columns.name: NewSalesmanCode
columns.description: Alphanumeric code for the newly assigned salesman.

columns.name: NewSalesmanName
columns.description: Name of the newly assigned salesman for this business point.

columns.name: FirstCustomerExpirationMonth
columns.description: The month (date) when the first customer's subscription/contract expires for this business point.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer or market segment assigned to this bucket.

columns.name: SegmentDescription
columns.description: Text description of the customer or market segment.

columns.name: ScoreMainActivity
columns.description: Score value reflecting the importance or fit of the main activity for targeting.

columns.name: ScoreSeniority
columns.description: Score representing seniority-related criteria used in campaign targeting.

columns.name: ScoreValueBillingRange
columns.description: Score based on the billing value or billing range of the business point.

columns.name: ScoreCombinationMedium
columns.description: Score indicating suitability based on the combination of media/mediums.

columns.name: ScoreMaxInvestmentMedium
columns.description: Score representing the maximum investment allowed or expected for a medium.

columns.name: ScoreCombinationProduct
columns.description: Score reflecting product combination suitability for targeting.

columns.name: ScoreCustomerBehavior
columns.description: Score derived from customer behavior signals relevant to this campaign.

columns.name: ScoreSalesmanManagement
columns.description: Score assessing the quality or impact of salesman management for this point.

columns.name: ScoreTotal
columns.description: Aggregate score combining multiple criteria to rank or prioritize the business point.

columns.name: TargetingAmountCalculated
columns.description: System-calculated targeting amount for this business point (currency).

columns.name: TargetingAmountByUser
columns.description: User-provided or overridden targeting amount for this bucket (currency).

columns.name: FileID
columns.description: Reference to an uploaded file record associated with this campaign bucket (dbo.CampaignBucketFileUploadHistory.ID).

columns.name: ItemStatus
columns.description: Numeric status code for the bucket item (workflow or lifecycle state).

columns.name: WorkingStatus
columns.description: Indicator (0/1) representing whether the bucket item is currently active/working.

columns.name: TargetGroupItemValueID
columns.description: Foreign key to the target group item value that identifies the segment or specific targeting value (dbo.TargetGroupItemValue.ID).

columns.name: MediumCombination
columns.description: Numeric code representing the combination of media used for this bucket.

columns.name: ScoreDifferenceToAvg
columns.description: Difference between this bucket's score and the campaign average (positive or negative).

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Categorical code used to further classify the bucket entry (business-specific meaning).

columns.name: MaxInvestmentMedium
columns.description: Text label of the medium where the maximum investment is applied (e.g., XO.gr).

columns.name: ScoreSalesmanManagementType
columns.description: Categorical type related to salesman management scoring logic.

columns.name: ScoreCustomerBehaviorType
columns.description: Categorical code used to classify the customer behavior scoring type.

columns.name: SupervisorID
