columns.description: Identifier for the campaign this snapshot applies to. Foreign key to dbo.Campaign(ID).

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the classifier node (seniority category) used for this snapshot. Foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode(ID).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary value of the seniority score in this campaign snapshot. Stored as DECIMAL(18,3) and represents USD currency.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the billing price range used in campaign scoring.

columns.name: FromPrice
columns.description: Lower bound of the billing price range (USD). Values are in US Dollars with three decimal places.

columns.name: ToPrice
columns.description: Upper bound of the billing price range (USD). Values are in US Dollars with three decimal places and represent the inclusive upper limit for the range.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount (USD) associated with this billing range; represents the score or charge applied for campaigns in this price bracket.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the snapshot record capturing a campaign's billing range at a point in time.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign this snapshot applies to (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID). Identifies which campaign the billing range snapshot belongs to.

columns.name: FromPrice
columns.description: Lower bound of the billing price range for the snapshot (USD). Values are in US Dollars with three decimal places.

columns.name: ToPrice
columns.description: Upper bound of the billing price range for the snapshot (USD). Values are in US Dollars with three decimal places.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount (USD) associated with the snapshot's billing range; represents the score or charge applied for the campaign within this price bracket at snapshot time.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign segment record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the segment used in reporting and selection.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Date and time when the segment becomes active for the campaign.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date and time when the segment stops being active for the campaign.

columns.name: WorkingDays
columns.description: Number of working days within the segment's active period.

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Filter/expression that defines which entities are to be included in this segment.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Calculated or targeted quantity of included items within the segment.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Filter/expression that defines which entities are to be excluded from this segment.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Calculated or targeted quantity of excluded items within the segment.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this segment record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent initialization of the segment process (if any).

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the segment was finalized and no longer editable.

columns.name: AssignmentSalesmanSupervisorFromPreviousPeriod
columns.description: Flag indicating whether salesperson/supervisor assignment is carried over from the previous period.

columns.name: SplitSalesmanSegment
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the segment should be split across salespeople.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to inclusion rules for the segment.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression applied to exclusion rules for the segment.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total quantity associated with the segment (sum or target depending on context).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numeric status code describing the current lifecycle state of the segment (e.g., draft, active, finalized).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that governs assignment inclusion (assignment-level inclusion rules).

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that governs assignment exclusion (assignment-level exclusion rules).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Quantity of 'other' included items not covered by primary included quantity.

columns.name: SubStatus
columns.description: Secondary status code giving more granular state information for the segment.

columns.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary included quantity used for multi-tier inclusion calculations.

columns.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary excluded quantity used for multi-tier exclusion calculations.

columns.name: SecondExcludedExpression
columns.description: Additional exclusion expression for the secondary exclusion rules.

columns.name: SecondIncludeExpression
columns.description: Additional inclusion expression for the secondary inclusion rules.

columns.name: SecondTotalQuantity
columns.description: Secondary total quantity for multi-tier calculations in the segment.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign that this ROCO entry belongs to (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the segment within the campaign (part of the composite primary key).

columns.name: MediumCategory
columns.description: Marketing medium/category (e.g., PPC, Print, XO.gr) for which ROCO is defined; part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: ROCO
columns.description: Return On Campaign Objective (ROCO) value for the specified medium and segment (decimal precision).

columns.name: UserROCO
columns.description: User-specified ROCO override value; when present, it indicates custom ROCO configured by a user.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign-segment-salesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign this segment-salesman assignment belongs to (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the segment within the campaign to which the salesman assignment applies.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman (sales representative) assigned to the campaign segment.

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Text expression or filter that defines which contacts/entities are included for this salesman in the segment.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or contacts included for this salesman based on the include expression.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Text expression or filter that defines which contacts/entities are excluded for this salesman in the segment.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or contacts excluded for this salesman based on the exclusion expression.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this segment-salesman assignment record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last initialization run for this assignment (may indicate when filters were last applied).

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the assignment was finalized (no further changes expected).

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: An additional include expression combined with logical AND to further refine included entities.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: An additional exclude expression combined with logical AND to further refine excluded entities.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total quantity of items/contacts considered for this assignment (after includes/excludes as appropriate).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Assignment-specific include expression that may determine how items are assigned to the salesman.

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Assignment-specific exclude expression that may determine how items are excluded from assignment to the salesman.

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Quantity included that belong to other categories or fallback groups (context-specific).

columns.name: SubStatus
columns.description: Numeric sub-status code indicating intermediate processing or state of this assignment.

columns.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary included quantity (used when there are multiple inclusion passes or tiers).

columns.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary excluded quantity (used when there are multiple exclusion passes or tiers).

columns.name: SecondExcludedExpression
columns.description: Secondary exclusion expression for a second-tier exclusion pass.

columns.name: SecondIncludeExpression
columns.description: Secondary inclusion expression for a second-tier inclusion pass.

columns.name: SecondTotalQuantity
columns.description: Total quantity after second-tier inclusion/exclusion passes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign segment status record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign this segment status belongs to (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the segment within the campaign whose status is recorded.

columns.name: SegmentStatusID
columns.description: Numeric code representing the status of the segment (e.g., active, paused, finalized).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign system criteria record.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPs
columns.description: Flag indicating whether only active business partners (BPs) are included.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPsIsActive
columns.description: Toggle that marks whether the ActiveOnlyBPs rule is currently active.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes
columns.description: Comma- or list-formatted text enumerating customer update types to exclude from the campaign.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypesIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes exclusion rule is active.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis
columns.description: Text field listing solvency analysis results or codes that should be excluded from the campaign.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysisIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the solvency analysis exclusion rule is enabled.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodes
columns.description: List or expression of customer classifier nodes to exclude from targeting.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodesIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether exclusions for classifier nodes are currently applied.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifiers
columns.description: List of customer classifier identifiers or codes to exclude from the campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStates
columns.description: List of contract state codes relevant to preprinted campaigns; used to include or exclude by state.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStatesIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the PreprintedContractStates criterion is active.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStates
columns.description: List of CP (content/provider) state codes used for preprinted campaign filtering.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStatesIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the PreprintedCPStates filter is enabled.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted
columns.description: Flag to include products with a zero print price in preprinted campaign selections.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether inclusion of zero-priced print products in preprinted campaigns is active.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted
columns.description: Flag controlling inclusion of advertisements that ended in year 01 (Y01) for preprinted campaigns.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Indicates if the IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted rule is currently enabled.

columns.name: IncludeRenewable
columns.description: Flag to include renewable items/contracts in campaign targeting.

columns.name: IncludeRenewableIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether renewable inclusion logic is active for the campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctount
columns.description: Flag specifying whether preprinted pricing should consider discounts when evaluating price.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctountIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether discount-aware pricing for preprinted items is currently enabled.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign target group.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign to which this target group belongs (references campaign).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Expression or criteria used to include entities (customers, contracts, etc.) in the target group.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of entities included by the IncludeExpression (count of included members).

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Expression or criteria used to exclude entities from the target group.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of entities excluded by the ExcludedExpression (count of excluded members).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last initialization run for the target group's population process.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group was finalized (no further automatic changes expected).

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of members in the target group after inclusion/exclusion processing.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional exclusion expression combined with logical AND to refine exclusions.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional inclusion expression combined with logical AND to refine inclusions.

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that defines assignment rules for including items or members into the group.

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression that defines assignment rules for excluding items or members from the group.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign targeting new-customer history record.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this history record was created.

columns.name: CreatedByID
columns.description: Reference to the user who created this history record (foreign key to dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign associated with this history entry.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier of the customer segment targeted by the campaign for this history entry.

display.display_name: Campaign Targeting New Customer History Detail

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the detail row in campaign targeting new-customer history.

columns.name: CampaignTargetingNewCustomerHistoryID
columns.description: Foreign key linking this detail row to the parent CampaignTargetingNewCustomerHistory record (dbo.CampaignTargetingNewCustomerHistory.ID).

columns.name: CampaignSalesmanNewCustomerTargetID
columns.description: Identifier for the salesman-specific new-customer target associated with this detail row.

columns.name: Target
columns.description: Planned target value (numeric) for new customers for the associated salesman/campaign. Stored as decimal with 3 fractional digits.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Optional campaign identifier. Field is nullable and often not populated in this dataset.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Optional segment identifier for this detail row. Field is nullable and commonly empty in samples.

columns.name: Salesmanid
columns.description: Optional identifier of the salesman (user) for the target. Field appears nullable and may be unused in current data extracts.

columns.name: DailyTarget
columns.description: Optional per-day target amount derived for the salesman/campaign, stored as decimal. Often null in this detail table.

columns.name: UserDailyTarget
columns.description: Optional per-user daily target amount. Nullable and usually not populated in provided samples.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier for the campaign associated with this monitoring record.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer or market segment within the campaign.

columns.name: SuperVisorID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the supervisor responsible for the sales team.

columns.name: SnapshotDate
columns.description: Date and time when the monitoring metrics snapshot was taken.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the salesperson associated with this record.

columns.name: ReportUserID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who generated or owns this grouped monitoring report.

columns.name: SnapshotWorkingdays
columns.description: Number of working days in the period represented by the snapshot.

columns.name: SupervisorCode
columns.description: Short code for the supervisor (alphanumeric), useful for lookups and filters.

columns.name: SupervisorName
columns.description: Full name of the supervisor responsible for the sales region or team.

columns.name: SalesmanCode
columns.description: Short code or identifier for the salesperson (alphanumeric) used for quick reference.

columns.name: SalesmanName
columns.description: Full name of the salesperson; used as the primary human-readable label for this record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier for the campaign to which these targets and results apply.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer/market segment targeted in the campaign.

columns.name: SuperVisorID
columns.description: Identifier for the supervisor overseeing the salesperson or segment.

columns.name: SnapshotDate
columns.description: Date/time of the snapshot capturing all monitoring metrics and KPIs.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier for the salesperson to whom these targets and results relate.

columns.name: RocoTargetCustomers
columns.description: Target number of returning (ROCO) customers for the campaign/segment.

columns.name: RocoTargetAmount
columns.description: Monetary target amount for returning (ROCO) customers (currency in USD).

columns.name: NewTargetCustomers
columns.description: Target number of new customers to acquire in the campaign/segment period.

columns.name: NewTargetAmount
columns.description: Monetary target amount expected from newly acquired customers (currency in USD).

columns.name: TotalTargetCustomers
columns.description: Total target number of customers (returning + new) for the campaign/segment.

columns.name: TotalTargetAmount
columns.description: Total monetary target (returning + new customers) for the campaign/segment (USD).

columns.name: RocoUpToDateCustomers
columns.description: Number of returning customers that are up-to-date with the expected performance at snapshot time.

columns.name: RocoUpToDateAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount achieved by returning customers up-to-date with targets (USD).

columns.name: NewUpToDateCustomers
columns.description: Number of new customers that have achieved their expected contribution by the snapshot date.

columns.name: NewUpToDateAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount achieved by new customers that are up-to-date with targets (USD).

columns.name: TotalUpToDateCustomers
columns.description: Total customers (new + returning) that are on track or up-to-date with campaign targets.

columns.name: TotalUpToDateAmount
columns.description: Total monetary amount achieved by customers that are up-to-date with campaign targets (USD).

columns.name: RocoSegmentCustomers
columns.description: Number of returning customers within the segment for the snapshot period.

columns.name: RocoSegmentAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount from returning customers in the segment (USD).

columns.name: NewSegmentCustomers
columns.description: Number of newly acquired customers in the segment during the snapshot period.

columns.name: NewSegmentAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount from new customers in the segment (USD).

columns.name: TotalSegmentCustomers
columns.description: Total number of customers in the segment (returning + new) for the snapshot.

columns.name: TotalSegmentAmount
columns.description: Total monetary amount for the segment (returning + new) in the snapshot (USD).

columns.name: RocoTargetPercentageCustomers
columns.description: Percentage of returning customers achieved vs. returning customer target (expressed as decimal fraction).

columns.name: RocoTargetPercentageAmount
columns.description: Percentage of monetary target achieved for returning customers (decimal fraction).

columns.name: NewTargetPercentageCustomers
columns.description: Percentage of new-customer target achieved for customer count (decimal fraction).

columns.name: NewTargetPercentageAmount
columns.description: Percentage of monetary target achieved for new customers (decimal fraction).

columns.name: TotalTargetPercentageCustomers
columns.description: Percentage of overall customer target achieved (returning + new) as a decimal fraction.

columns.name: TotalTargetPercentageAmount
columns.description: Percentage of total monetary target achieved (decimal fraction).

columns.name: RocoUpToDatePercentageCustomers
columns.description: Percentage of returning customers that are up-to-date relative to the expected count (decimal fraction).

columns.name: RocoUpToDatePercentageAmount
columns.description: Percentage of returning customer monetary target that is up-to-date (decimal fraction).

columns.name: NewUpToDatePercentageCustomers
columns.description: Percentage of new customers that are up-to-date with expected contribution (decimal fraction).

columns.name: NewUpToDatePercentageAmount
columns.description: Percentage of monetary contribution from new customers that is up-to-date (decimal fraction).

columns.name: TotalUpToDatePercentageCustomers
columns.description: Overall percentage of customers (new + returning) that are up-to-date with targets (decimal fraction).

columns.name: TotalUpToDatePercentageAmount
columns.description: Overall percentage of monetary targets that are up-to-date (decimal fraction).

columns.name: KpiRocoCustomers
columns.description: KPI metric for returning customers, stored as a decimal/percentage value representing performance.

columns.name: KpiRocoAmount
columns.description: KPI metric for returning customer monetary performance (as a decimal/percentage).

columns.name: KpiAvoNewCustomers
columns.description: KPI metric representing average/new-customer related performance (decimal metric).

columns.name: KpiNewConversionRate
columns.description: KPI representing the conversion rate for new customers (decimal fraction, e.g., 0.1234 = 12.34%).

columns.name: SupervisorCode
columns.description: Short code for the supervisor; useful for filters and joins to supervisor dimensions.

columns.name: SupervisorName
columns.description: Full name of the supervisor overseeing the salesperson or segment.

columns.name: SalesmanCode
columns.description: Short code for the salesperson used for quick reference and lookups.

columns.name: SalesmanName
columns.description: Full name of the salesperson; primary human-friendly label for records in this table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the campaign type (e.g., Internet, Mobile).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used to map this campaign type to an external data mart or system (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/data-mart table associated with DMKey when integrated with other systems (frequently null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external mapping to another system; typically null when no external mapping exists.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the user-defined field (UDF) string entry.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Campaign table (dbo.Campaign.ID). Associates this UDF definition with a specific campaign.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the user-defined string field or slot (human-readable identifier for this UDF).

columns.name: ValueExpression
columns.description: Expression (often encoded or formula) that defines how the UDF's value is derived or calculated.

columns.name: ValueExpressionText
columns.description: Readable/textual representation of the value expression for display and review purposes.

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Expression that defines inclusion criteria for this UDF (who should be included based on this field).

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Numeric count for how many records are included by the IncludeExpression.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Expression that defines exclusion criteria for this UDF (who should be excluded based on this field).

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Numeric count for how many records are excluded by the ExcludedExpression.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this UDF definition/record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last initialization or refresh operation for this UDF definition.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this UDF definition was finalized and marked as ready/locked for use.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional additional 'AND' inclusion expression to be combined with IncludeExpression for more complex rules.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional additional 'AND' exclusion expression to be combined with ExcludedExpression for more complex rules.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total numeric quantity relevant to this UDF, typically the overall count evaluated for the expressions.

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of additional included records not covered by the primary IncludedQuantity (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this UDF string record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the user-defined field (UDF).

columns.name: ValueExpression
columns.description: Stored expression or formula used to compute or filter values for this UDF.

columns.name: ValueExpressionText
columns.description: Readable/textual representation of the value expression (often used for display or logging).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Expression that defines inclusion criteria for this UDF (nullable if not applicable).

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or records included by the include expression for this UDF.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or records excluded by the exclude expression for this UDF.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF was last initialized (nullable if never initialized).

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF was finalized (nullable until finalized).

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression used with IncludeExpression to further refine included records (nullable).

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND expression used with ExcludedExpression to further refine excluded records (nullable).

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of items evaluated for this UDF (includes included, excluded, and other counts).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Quantity of other items included by secondary or auxiliary logic for this UDF (nullable).

columns.description: Unique identifier for the check detail record. This is the primary key of CheckDetail and also a foreign key referencing SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Identifier of the bank associated with the check. Foreign key referencing dbo.Bank.ID.

columns.name: CheckNumber
columns.description: The check's printed number (identifier printed on the check). Used as the user-facing label for the check record.

columns.name: CheckPublisher
columns.description: Name of the person or organization that issued (published/drew) the check.

columns.name: CheckExpirationDate
columns.description: Date after which the check is no longer valid (check expiration / maturity date).

columns.name: CheckTaxCode
columns.description: Tax identification number (tax code / VAT/tax id) of the check publisher.

columns.name: IsSamePublisher
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the publisher of the check is the same as the customer / expected party (true/false).

columns.name: CheckPublishDate
columns.description: The date and time when the check was issued/published.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the classification record (unique classification identifier).

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the business point (location/branch) associated with this classification. Foreign key referencing dbo.BusinessPoint.ID.

columns.name: ClassifierID
columns.description: Identifier of the classifier used for this classification. Foreign key referencing dbo.Classifier.ID.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Identifier of the classifier node (specific category/node) used in this classification. Foreign key referencing dbo.ClassifierNode.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used to link to the target data mart/data model record (data-mart key).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart or data model table that the DMKey maps to (e.g., CM15E_Branches). Used as the human-readable label for this classification mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data mart mapping (alternative to DMKey). Often null in this dataset.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the classifier.

columns.name: ClassifierTreeID
columns.description: References the classifier tree this classifier belongs to (foreign key to ClassifierTree.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable short name of the classifier (e.g., Activity, CustomerIndicator).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description or tooltip for the classifier explaining its purpose or usage.

columns.name: IsMultiValued
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the classifier can have multiple selected values (true) or only a single value (false).

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a value for this classifier is required (true) or optional (false).

columns.name: IsMandatoryOnPOIs
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the classifier is mandatory specifically on Points Of Interest (POIs).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used for data migration mapping or legacy integration; may be null when not used.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or process used during data migration or import for this classifier (if applicable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data migration mapping; frequently null in current data.

columns.name: DefaultNodeId
columns.description: Reference to the default classifier node (foreign key to ClassifierNode.ID) used when a default selection is needed.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the classifier node.

columns.name: ParentNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the parent node in the classifier hierarchy (self-referencing foreign key to ClassifierNode.ID); null for root nodes.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Display name of the node (short label used in UI and lists).

columns.name: CompositeName
columns.description: Concatenated or fully qualified name representing the node's position in the hierarchy (e.g., Parent > Child).

columns.name: LeftIndex
columns.description: Left index used by nested set hierarchy algorithms to represent subtree boundaries; may be null when not set.

columns.name: RightIndex
columns.description: Right index used by nested set hierarchy algorithms to represent subtree boundaries; may be null when not set.

columns.name: ClassifierTreeID
columns.description: Identifier of the classifier tree this node belongs to (foreign key to ClassifierTree.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy or migration integer key for this node used during imports or integrations; often null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table/process used for data migration for this node (if applicable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data migration mapping for this node; frequently null in current data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the ClassifierNodeMasterHeadings record; uniquely identifies the mapping row.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the classifier node (foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode.ID) that groups related master headings.

columns.name: MasterHeadingID
columns.description: Identifier of the master heading associated with the classifier node (foreign key to dbo.MasterHeading.ID). Used as the primary human-readable reference for the mapping.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the relationship type or classification subtype for the mapping row.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data migration processes; often null for manually created rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source or staging table used during data migration or import for this mapping; frequently empty.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key (string) from migration sources used to match or reconcile imported rows; typically null for native entries.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the classifier tree entry; unique identifier for a classifier category or subtree.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the classifier tree node (e.g., 'Geographical', 'Activity'). This is the primary label shown in UIs.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric classification type for the tree node. Values differentiate node kinds or behaviors within the classifier hierarchy.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking this classifier tree node to an external data migration or import dataset; often empty for manual nodes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source table used during data migration or synchronization for this classifier tree node (e.g., 'DataMigration', 'ManualInsertion').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional string key from migration sources used to associate or reconcile classifier tree entries; commonly null.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: TgivID
columns.description: Reference to the TargetGroupItemValue (foreign key to dbo.TargetGroupItemValue.ID)

columns.name: TaskID
columns.description: Reference to the task associated with this call action (foreign key to dbo.Task.ID)

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Identifier of the user/agent who initiated the click-to-call (foreign key to dbo.User.ID)

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Dialed phone number for the call (stored as text, national format digits)

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the click-to-call action was recorded

columns.name: KSCallIdentifier
columns.description: Optional external call identifier from the telephony system (may be null)

display.display_name: Click To Call Harmony History Detail

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the detailed history entry

columns.name: ClickToCallHarmonyHistoryID
columns.description: Foreign key linking this detail row to the parent ClickToCallHarmonyHistory record (dbo.ClickToCallHarmonyHistory.ID)

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when this detail log entry was recorded

columns.name: LogEntryType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type/category of the log entry (small enumerated set)

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Free-text or message associated with the log entry (e.g., status messages, URLs, error text)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for each action history record (unique row identifier).

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: GUID that identifies the processing batch associated with this action history entry.

columns.name: ActionID
columns.description: Identifier for the action performed. Likely references an action definition or lookup of available actions.

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: Numeric code that denotes the type of entity the action applies to (enumeration of entity categories).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for each batch history record (unique row identifier).

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: GUID representing the batch that this history record belongs to.

columns.name: BatchActionType
columns.description: Integer code describing the type of action performed for the batch (enumeration).

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when the batch action was recorded.

columns.name: RowsAffected
columns.description: Number of rows affected by the batch action. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Descriptive message or log text for the batch action. Samples contain localized (Greek) messages and operation details.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Supplementary integer type code for categorizing the record or message (enumeration).

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: Integer code indicating the kind of entity involved in the batch (enumeration of entity categories).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the error action history record.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: Identifier (GUID) of the import or processing batch that generated this history record.

columns.name: ActionID
columns.description: Numeric code representing the specific action taken or recorded for this error event.

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type of entity related to the error (e.g., account, transaction).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric category or subtype for the error action, used for classification or routing.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the company record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code used to identify the company (often used in user interfaces and lookups).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Full legal or display name of the company.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by an external data mart or integration; frequently null if not integrated.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table associated with this company record; may be null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by an external system or data mart for this company; may be null.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the company is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Unique name/key of the configuration parameter (primary identifier for the parameter).

columns.name: Parameter
columns.description: Stored value for the configuration parameter; often a string or comma-separated list of values.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking this parameter to an external data mart record (mostly null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table associated with DMKey (mostly null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external linking to a data mart or legacy system (mostly null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the contact record.

columns.name: ContactAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the contact's address record (foreign key to dbo.Address.ID).

columns.name: Firstname
columns.description: Contact's given name (may be null for many records).

columns.name: Lastname
columns.description: Contact's family name or surname; used as the primary human-readable label for contacts.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website or URL associated with the contact (often present for branch/organization contacts).

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or annotations about the contact (e.g., appearance order notes).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the contact record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the contact record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the contact record (mostly null for many rows).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the contact record (often null).

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Numeric code representing the contact's title/honorific (e.g., Mr, Ms, Dr).

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for linking to external or legacy data sources (mostly null).

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Reference to the Contact table (dbo.Contact.ID). Identifies which contact this email belongs to.

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Email address for the contact. Primary human-readable identifier for this record.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key from a legacy or external data migration/source system. Often null in this dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source table or system where this email record originated. Mostly null for current rows.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key from a legacy or external source identifying the record in that system. Frequently null.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ContactID
columns.description: Reference to the Contact table (dbo.Contact.ID). Identifies which contact this phone number belongs to.

columns.name: Extension
columns.description: Phone extension associated with the number, if applicable.

columns.name: Usage
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the usage or type of the phone number (for example primary, mobile, fax).

columns.description: Numeric key from a legacy or external data migration/source system for this phone record. Present for many rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or system where this phone record originated (example: CM18R_ContactPhones).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key from a legacy or external source identifying the phone record. Typically null in this dataset.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the phone number is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: Mitr11
columns.description: Boolean flag used by internal processes (Mitr11) to mark records for specific handling or segmentation.

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this contact relationship is currently active.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or system identity that created the record (often a service or migration account).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was last modified. Null indicates no modifications after creation.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account or system identity that last modified the record. May be null if never modified.

columns.name: IsContactPerson
columns.description: Indicator whether the linked contact is a contact person (versus, for example, a generic contact entry).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used during data migration or to link back to legacy systems.

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from a legacy system used for migration mapping or cross-reference.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional legacy table name used during data migrations. Often null for lookup/enum tables.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from a legacy system used for migration mapping. Often null for this lookup table.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ProductPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the product part definition that this attribute definition belongs to (dbo.ProductPartDefinition.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute (e.g., 'Customer Name', 'City', 'Phone'). Used as the primary label for the attribute definition.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the data type or control type for the attribute (e.g., text, number, lookup).

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a value for this attribute is required (true) or optional (false).

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value to use when no explicit value is provided for this attribute.

columns.name: MinValue
columns.description: Minimum numeric value allowed for this attribute (when applicable). Null when not applicable.

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value allowed for this attribute (when applicable). Null when not applicable.

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attribute is read-only (true) or editable (false).

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: Bitmask or code string controlling visibility of the attribute across contexts (UI or roles).

columns.description: Name of the external or migration table associated with the DMKey for mapping or migration tasks.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for migration or mapping (text-based mapping key).

columns.description: Numeric ordering value that defines default fill or display order for this attribute within the part definition.

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum allowed length (in characters) for text values of this attribute.

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: Name of the lookup/reference table used when the attribute is a lookup type; null if not a lookup.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validation rules should be applied to values for this attribute.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether keyphrase / keyword generation is enabled for this attribute (used for search/indexing).

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Optional filter expression applied to the lookup table to limit selectable values for this attribute.

columns.name: ProductPartID

columns.name: Value
columns.description: The stored value for the attribute. Can be text, URL, or other content depending on the attribute definition.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number or grouping order for this value within the product part or attribute list.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric migration or mapping key used for imported/migrated values.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional reference to the source table name used during migration or data mapping for this value.

columns.name: Id

columns.name: ID

columns.name: ID

columns.name: BankDepositNumber

columns.name: CompanyId

columns.description: Identifier of the product type. Foreign key referencing dbo.InternalProductType.ID.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the internal product record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or system identity that created the record (username).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used to map this product to an external data mart or integration point. Currently null in samples.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external table or data-mart associated with DMKey. Currently empty in sample data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional textual key for external mapping or integration; sample values are null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the internal product communication record.

columns.name: InternalProductID
columns.description: Reference to the associated internal product (foreign key to dbo.InternalProduct.ID).

columns.name: CommunicationText
columns.description: Body text of the internal communication for the product. Content is typically descriptive (sample data contains Greek-language text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for integration with a document management system (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the document management table or system source (nullable). Used for DMS integration metadata.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional string key used by external document management systems to reference this communication (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the document record associated with an internal product.

columns.name: InternalProductID
columns.description: Reference to the associated internal product (foreign key to dbo.InternalProduct.ID).

columns.name: Filename
columns.description: Stored filename or path of the document (may include folder prefixes and a unique hash).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the document record was created or uploaded.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Username or account name of the person who created or uploaded the document.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for linking this document to an external document management system (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external document management table or source system (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by an external document management system to reference the document (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the internal product type.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or name for the product type (human-friendly short label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Full descriptive text for the product type.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the product type is currently active (true/false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking to an external data mart or legacy system (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table this row corresponds to (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by an external data mart or legacy system (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary unique identifier for the product type role mapping.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Internal Product Type (InternalProductType.ID).

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Role (dbo.Role.ID) that is associated with the product type.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking this mapping to an external data mart or legacy system (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table for this mapping (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by an external system for this mapping (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the invoice payment method record.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the payment method type (e.g., cash, credit card). Foreign key to dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID.

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of payment installments configured for this payment method.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval between installments (unit depends on business rules, typically months).

columns.name: IsExchangeSale
columns.description: Indicates whether the payment is associated with an exchange sale.

columns.name: PaymentPhoneAccount
columns.description: Phone account or phone identifier used for payment (string).

columns.name: PaymentPhoneID
columns.description: Reference to a phone record used for payments. Foreign key to dbo.PointPhone.ID.

columns.name: PaymentCreditTransactionCode
columns.description: Transaction code returned by the credit card processor for this payment.

columns.name: BillingEmailID
columns.description: Reference to the billing email contact. Foreign key to dbo.ContactEmail.ID.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices associated with this payment method entry.

columns.name: UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the payment month was explicitly specified by a user.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Reference to the bank used for check or deposit payments. Foreign key to dbo.Bank.ID.

columns.name: CheckEndDate
columns.description: End or expiration date for a check associated with the payment.

columns.name: CheckPublisherIsSame
columns.description: Indicates whether the check publisher (issuer) is the same as the payer.

columns.name: CheckPublisher
columns.description: Name of the person or organization that issued the check.

columns.name: CheckPublisherTaxCode
columns.description: Tax code / tax identification number of the check publisher (issuer).

columns.name: CheckNumber
columns.description: Number printed on the check associated with the payment.

columns.name: CreditCardTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the credit card type/brand. Foreign key to dbo.CreditCardType.ID.

columns.name: CreditCardNumber
columns.description: Stored credit card number or token (sensitive). Typically stored masked or tokenized.

columns.name: CreditCardEndDate
columns.description: Expiry date of the credit card used for payment.

columns.name: CreditCardOwner
columns.description: Name of the credit card owner as provided for the payment.

columns.name: CreditCardInstallments
columns.description: Number of installments allowed or used for the credit card payment.

columns.name: BlockSeries
columns.description: Series identifier for blocked receipts (if applicable).

columns.name: BlockReceiptNumber
columns.description: Receipt number within a blocked series for manual/block receipts.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data migration or external system key used to correlate records (DM = Data Migration).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external table or source system table used in data migration.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from an external system used in data migration.

columns.name: SystemReceiptNumber
columns.description: Internal system-generated receipt number associated with the payment.

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Reference to the sales collection entity that groups payments. Foreign key to dbo.SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: PaymentMonth
columns.description: The accounting month/date associated with the payment (represents month-of-payment).

columns.name: CheckPublishDate
columns.description: Date when the check was published/issued.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Reference number for the bank deposit associated with this payment.

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date when the payment was deposited in the bank.

columns.name: CollectionDate
columns.description: Date when the payment was collected or recorded as collected.

columns.name: AdvancedPolicyAmount
columns.description: Amount related to an advanced policy applied to this payment (currency).

columns.name: InvoicePolicyID
columns.description: Reference to an invoice policy affecting this payment. Foreign key to dbo.InvoicePolicy.ID.

columns.name: PreInvoice
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this record corresponds to a pre-invoice (not final invoice).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the exception log entry.

columns.name: ContractID
columns.description: Identifier of the contract associated with the invoice payment month exception.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: GUID identifying the processing batch that generated this exception.

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when the exception was recorded in the log.

columns.name: InvoicePaymentMethodID
columns.description: Identifier of the invoice payment method. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod.ID.

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the sales collection. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the invoice policy.

columns.name: PriceFrom
columns.description: Lower bound of the price range for which this invoice policy applies (USD).

columns.name: PriceTo
columns.description: Upper bound of the price range for which this invoice policy applies (USD).

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the payment method type that this policy applies to. Foreign key to dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices generated under this policy.

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments allowed by this invoice policy.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval (in units defined by business rules) between installments or invoice occurrences.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Date when this invoice policy becomes effective.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date when this invoice policy expires.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the associated marketing campaign. Foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the channel type for this policy. Foreign key to dbo.ChannelType.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data model numeric key used for downstream reporting or dimensional joins.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data model table used in downstream reporting or dimensional joins.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key in the data model for linking or reporting.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Identifier of the product this invoice policy applies to. Foreign key to dbo.Product.ID.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium version associated with this policy. Foreign key to dbo.MediumVersion.ID.

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium (channel/placement) associated with this policy. Foreign key to dbo.Medium.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the KEPYO status record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric business code representing the specific status.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the status (stored in Greek).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key linking to an external data mapping; commonly null in this table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external table used for data mapping; commonly null in this table.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for external data mapping; commonly null in this table.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the status is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal form entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short code or human-readable description of the legal form (typically Greek abbreviations or names).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional mapping key linking this legal form to an external data model; mostly populated where mappings exist.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external mapping table (example value: CM11D_CompanyLegalForms); often used to reference the source of DMKey.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string mapping key for external data mapping; frequently null for this dataset.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary unique identifier for the listing (surrogate key).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Human-readable listing code or external identifier used to reference the listing.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Reference to the related BusinessPoint record (dbo.BusinessPoint.ID).

columns.name: MasterHeadingCode
columns.description: High-level classification or master heading code for the listing (categorization).

columns.name: LocalityID
columns.description: Reference to the locality/address record for the listing (dbo.Address.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mining integer key (nullable). Many rows indicate no value in this environment.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Alternate data-mining character key stored as integer (nullable). Sparse population in current data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data-mining table or source associated with the DM keys (nullable).

columns.name: IsPotentialFreelister
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this listing is marked as a potential freelister (true/false).

columns.name: IsPrimary
columns.description: Boolean flag that denotes if this listing is the primary listing for the associated business point.

columns.name: IsSecondary
columns.description: Boolean flag that denotes if this listing is a secondary listing for the associated business point.

columns.name: IsContract
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this listing is under contract (true/false).

columns.name: SourceUdacs
columns.description: Source system or UDAC codes showing origin and partitioning information (often contains coded values).

columns.name: LogInfo
columns.description: Operational or ingestion log code indicating processing/source information for the record (nullable).

display.display_name: Windows User to Application User Mapping

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the mapping record.

columns.name: WinUserName
columns.description: Windows domain username (sAMAccountName or similar) that is mapped to an application user.

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Reference to the application user entity (dbo.User.ID) that the Windows user is mapped to.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the geographic area group (primary key). Not nullable.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code for the geographic area group. Often null for many rows.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the geographic area group. Primary display label for this entity.

columns.name: ParentGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Reference to the parent geographic area group (self-relationship). Nullable when the group has no parent.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used by the source data model to classify origin or mapping type. Nullable for some rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/data model table where this group was defined (e.g., migration or a specific dataset).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from the source data model. In this dataset this column is completely empty (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the geographic area group is active (True) or inactive (False). Not nullable.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version identifier of the geographic model. Links to BroaderAreaLookUp (GeoModelVersion). Nullable for many rows.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Identifier of a broader area that this group belongs to. Foreign key to BroaderAreaLookUp.BroaderAreaID. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the heading (primary key). Not nullable.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or numeric code assigned to the heading. Often used for lookup and matching.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Primary human-readable description of the heading (often in local language). Used as the default label for display.

columns.name: ParentHeadingID
columns.description: Reference to a parent heading (self-referential relationship). Nullable when this heading has no parent.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key indicating the source/data model classification (e.g., migration vs dataset). Not nullable in this table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/data model table related to this heading (e.g., HD06R_Headings).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key from the source data model. This column is empty for all sampled rows (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the heading is active (True) or inactive (False). Not nullable.

columns.name: DescriptionEN
columns.description: English-language description of the heading (where available). Highly sparse (many nulls).

columns.name: IsThematicModule
columns.description: Boolean indicator whether this heading belongs to a thematic module. Not nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the Master Heading Group mapping record. Uniquely identifies each mapping row.

columns.name: MasterHeadingID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the master heading this mapping applies to (references dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.name: GroupID
columns.description: Identifier for the group/category assigned to the master heading. Small set of group codes (e.g., 1..3).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the master section. Primary key used to reference sections.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the section (may contain localized text). Used as the primary display label for sections.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by an external data mart or integration. Currently all values are null in the sampled dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external data mart table associated with this section. Field is nullable and currently empty in samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to external systems or data marts. Nullable in the current dataset.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the section is active (true) or inactive (false). Used to filter available sections.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the medium (primary key).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business code assigned to the medium (short alphanumeric identifier).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the medium (used as the primary display label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text about the medium.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this medium record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the medium record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this medium record was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the medium record.

columns.name: GeographicalDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the geographical definition for this medium (links to GeographicalDefinition.ID).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the medium is currently active (true = active, false = inactive).

columns.name: MediumKindID
columns.description: Reference to the medium kind classification (links to MediumKind.ID).

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the medium type (links to MediumType.ID).

columns.name: CompanyID
columns.description: Reference to the owning company for this medium (links to Company.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart/integration numeric key used for upstream/downstream systems.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart table associated with this medium record (integration metadata).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by external systems for mapping this medium record.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the medium kind (primary key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the medium kind (used as the primary display label).

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the medium type that groups this medium kind (links to MediumType.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart/integration numeric key for external system mappings.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart table used for integration/mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by external systems to identify this medium kind.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the medium type (unique identifier).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the medium type (for example: Internet, Print).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-migration / legacy mapping purposes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the legacy table used during data migration or mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key used for legacy or data-migration mapping.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this medium version record (primary key).

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Medium (foreign key to dbo.Medium.ID).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or numeric code representing the medium version (often used for lookup).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the medium version (primary descriptive label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer textual description of the medium version and its purpose or audience.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: Optional year or year-code associated with this medium version (e.g., publication or edition year).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Name or account that created the record (system user or process).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to this record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Name or account that last modified the record (system user or process).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this medium version is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: ImportContractsStartDate
columns.description: Start date for importing contracts associated with this medium version.

columns.name: ImportContractsEndDate
columns.description: End date for importing contracts associated with this medium version.

columns.name: SalesEndDate
columns.description: Date when sales for this medium version ended (if applicable).

columns.name: ChangesCompletionDate
columns.description: Date when all changes related to this version were completed.

columns.name: PublishDate
columns.description: Date this medium version was published or made publicly available.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for legacy/data-migration mapping for this version.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional legacy table identifier used during data migration for this version.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based legacy key used for mapping this record in migration scenarios.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium version. Part of the composite primary key and references dbo.MediumVersion.ID.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Alphanumeric code for the broader geographic area (e.g., C7, CB1). Part of the composite primary key and references dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp.BroaderAreaID. Chosen as the default human-readable label for this mapping.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version identifier of the geological model (e.g., 3.0). Part of the composite primary key and used to scope the BroaderArea lookup to a specific geo model version.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the MediumVersionColor record.

columns.name: ProductionColorID
columns.description: Identifier of the production color associated with the medium version. References dbo.ProductionColor.ID. Typically denotes a color code used in production.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium version associated with this color. References dbo.MediumVersion.ID.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number used to order colors for a given medium version (1-based ordinal).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the medium version distribution record.

columns.name: MediumVersionPrintVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the print version of the medium (dbo.MediumVersionPrintVersion.ID).

columns.name: PrefectureID
columns.description: Code or identifier for the prefecture (administrative region) associated with this distribution.

columns.name: PrefectureName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the prefecture (administrative region) where the distribution applies.

columns.name: GeoAreaType
columns.description: Type of geographic area (for example: city, municipality, postal zone) for the GeoArea fields.

columns.name: GeoAreaID
columns.description: Identifier or code for the specific geographic area associated with the distribution (corresponds to GeoAreaName).

columns.name: GeoAreaName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the geographic area (for example a city, neighborhood or zone) for this distribution.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Number of items (for example copies or units) distributed to the specified geographic area or prefecture.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional Data Mart integer key used for downstream analytics or mapping to dimensional models.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional Data Mart table name or identifier used to indicate the source/target table in analytics processes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used in the Data Mart for linking or dimensional mapping purposes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the distribution inset record.

columns.name: MediumVersionDistributionID
columns.description: Foreign key linking this inset to the parent Medium Version Distribution (dbo.MediumVersionDistribution.ID).

columns.name: AdvertisementID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing the advertisement placed in the inset (dbo.Advertisement.ID).

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Number of inset items (for example number of inserts or copies) associated with this inset record.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Numeric category code for classifying the inset (business-defined category).

columns.name: QuantityPerCategory
columns.description: Quantity distributed within the specified category for this inset.

columns.name: CategorySummary
columns.description: Summary count or aggregated metric for the category (used for reporting or rollups).

columns.name: HasInset
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this distribution record includes an inset (true) or not (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional Data Mart integer key used for analytics or mapping to dimensional models for the inset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional Data Mart table name or identifier used to indicate the source/target table for inset analytics.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used in the Data Mart for linking or dimensional mapping for the inset record.

columns.name: ID
