columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.ProductionFont.ID. Identifies the production font associated with this medium-version assignment.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.MediumVersion.ID. Links this font record to a specific medium version.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary identifier for the MediumVersionPrintVersion record; unique key for a print-version entry.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.MediumVersion.ID. Associates this print-version entry with a specific medium version.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name for this print version; used as the primary display label for the record.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used for linking to an external data-mapping or reference table (data map identifier).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data-mapping table or source associated with this print version (text identifier).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key used for mapping to external systems or lookup tables (alphanumeric mapping key).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for this MediumVersionPrintVersionSection record. Part of a composite primary key.

columns.name: MediumVersionPrintVersionID
columns.description: Identifier of the parent MediumVersionPrintVersion. Foreign key referencing dbo.MediumVersionPrintVersion.ID; part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: VesrionSectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the related VersionSection. Foreign key referencing dbo.VersionSection.ID. Note: column name contains a known typo 'Vesrion' representing 'Version'. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used to link into an external/data-model table (optional).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-model table that DMKey refers to (text up to 50 characters).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key (string) used to reference an external/data-model record when a non-numeric key is required.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or identifier for the message (stored as text). Useful for programmatic references.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Human-readable title or short name of the message (Greek text in sample data). Primary display label for message records.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer explanatory text or body of the message (Greek text in sample data).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the negation reason (stored in Greek).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this negation reason is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external data management or mapping (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external table used for data management mappings (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external data mappings (often null).

columns.name: NegationType
columns.description: Numeric classification/type of the negation reason (domain code).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the no-communication reason (lookup key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the reason for no communication (stored in Greek).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this no-communication reason is active (True/False).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external data management or mapping (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external table used for data management mappings (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external data mappings (often null).

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the batch run record.

columns.name: BatchSearchId
columns.description: Reference to the batch search definition (foreign key to OBPSBatchSearch.Id).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Execution status code for the run (enumeration indicating queued, running, completed, failed, etc.).

columns.name: CompletedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the batch run finished (null if not completed).

columns.name: ScheduledOn
columns.description: Scheduled date/time for the batch run execution.

columns.name: Priority
columns.description: Priority value controlling run ordering or importance (higher number = higher priority).

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the batch search definition.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the batch search (often descriptive or localized).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Optional longer description of the batch search purpose or behavior.

columns.name: BatchType
columns.description: Code indicating the batch type or category (business-defined enumeration).

columns.name: ExecutionType
columns.description: Execution mode code (e.g., manual, scheduled, recurring).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status of the batch search definition (e.g., active/inactive).

columns.name: Times
columns.description: Optional number of times this batch should run (nullable; often used for limited frequency runs).

columns.name: Frequence
columns.description: Optional frequency code describing how often the batch runs (nullable; business-defined values).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the batch search definition was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or account that created the batch search definition.

columns.name: LastUpdatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last update to the batch search definition (nullable).

columns.name: LastUpdatedBy
columns.description: User or account that last updated the batch search definition (nullable).

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the batch search text record.

columns.name: BatchSearchId
columns.description: Reference to the parent batch search (foreign key to dbo.OBPSBatchSearch.Id). Identifies which batch search this text belongs to.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Searchable text phrase or term (stored in Greek collation) associated with the batch search entry. Primary human-readable label for this record.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for an individual search record.

columns.name: BatchRunId
columns.description: Foreign key linking this individual search to a specific batch run (references dbo.OBPSBatchRun.Id).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type or category of the individual search. Domain-specific enumeration stored as an integer.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Searchable text phrase or term (stored in Greek collation) used for the individual search. The most human-readable field for this record.

columns.name: ResultsCount
columns.description: Number of results returned for this individual search. Useful for quick aggregation and filtering by result volume.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the search result record.

columns.name: IndividualSearchId
columns.description: Reference to the individual search that produced this result (foreign key to OBPSIndividualSearch.Id).

columns.name: BusinessPointId
columns.description: Numeric identifier of the matched business point (nullable). Links to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID when available.

columns.name: IsCurrent
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this search result is the current (most recent/active) match for the individual search.

columns.name: BusinessUniqueId
columns.description: Provider-unique string identifier for the business (e.g., Google Place ID / external unique id).

columns.name: BusinessName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the business or establishment returned by the search.

columns.name: InternationalPhoneNumber
columns.description: Business phone number in international format (includes country code, e.g., +30 ...).

columns.name: NationalPhoneNumber
columns.description: Business phone number in local / national formatting (no leading country code).

columns.name: ComparisonStatus
columns.description: Integer code representing comparison outcome between the searched entity and the returned business (e.g., matched / similar / different).

columns.name: CompletenessScore
columns.description: Human-friendly completeness metric for the returned record (e.g., '8/9') indicating how many expected fields are present.

columns.name: Response
columns.description: Raw JSON payload returned by the external place/search API containing address, location, hours, reviews, photos and other structured metadata.

columns.name: HasMultipleBusinessPoints
columns.description: Boolean flag that indicates whether the search result corresponds to multiple business points (true) or a single point (false).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key identifier for the area header type.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Descriptive name of the area header type (short text label).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the directory entry (primary key).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name or title of the directory entry (e.g., organization or unit name).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to link this entry to an external data model table; many rows are currently null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data model table associated with DMKey when applicable; currently mostly empty.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key that can be used to associate this directory entry to a data model; often null in this dataset.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or identifier (string) assigned to the directory entry, often used for lookups or integration with external systems.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the area header record (primary key).

columns.name: OteDirectoryDakID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent directory (OteDirectoryDak.ID). Identifies which directory/dak this header belongs to.

columns.name: OteAreaHeaderTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the header type (OteAreaHeaderType.ID). Indicates the classification/type of this header line (for example title vs. contact info).

columns.name: Indent
columns.description: Integer indicating indentation level when rendering the header text (used for visual hierarchy).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Primary textual content of the header line (e.g., section title, descriptive label). This is the most human-readable field for the record.

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Telephone number or short contact string associated with this header line; may be null or contain non‑standard formats.

columns.name: CanBreak
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether a line break is allowed after this header line when rendering (true = can break).

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number used to order header lines within the same directory/dak; lower numbers typically appear earlier.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the OteDirectoryDak record; unique identifier for each Dak entry.

columns.name: OteDirectoryID
columns.description: Reference to the parent OteDirectory (foreign key to dbo.OteDirectory.ID). Identifies which directory this Dak belongs to.

columns.name: Dak
columns.description: DAK value (string code) associated with the directory entry; a human-readable code used to identify the specific Dak.

columns.name: OteDirectoryID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key linking to the parent OteDirectory (dbo.OteDirectory.ID).

columns.name: OteShippingPointID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key referencing the OteShippingPoint (dbo.OteShippingPoint.ID). Identifies the shipping point for the directory.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key referencing an external data model or legacy system. Nullable integer used for integration mappings.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external or legacy table related to this mapping. Used for integration and reference.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for integration with external systems or data models. Acts as an alternative human-friendly mapping key.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the directory version record.

columns.name: OteDirectoryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent OteDirectory (dbo.OteDirectory.ID). Identifies which directory this version belongs to.

columns.name: VersionYear
columns.description: Calendar year associated with this directory version (if available).

columns.name: EstimatedPages
columns.description: Estimated number of pages for this version (nullable).

columns.name: ActualPages
columns.description: Actual number of pages for this version (nullable).

columns.name: PaperWeight
columns.description: Paper weight metric for the version (decimal, nullable). Units depend on the application context.

columns.name: ItemWeight
columns.description: Item weight metric for the version (decimal, nullable). Units depend on the application context.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: DataMart key used for external integrations or ETL mapping (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table associated with this record (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for external/data-mart mapping (nullable).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Human-friendly code or short identifier for this directory version. Chosen as the default label for display and searching.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the progress point mapping record.

columns.name: OteDirectoryVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent directory version (dbo.OteDirectoryVersion.ID). Indicates which version this progress point belongs to.

columns.name: OteProgressPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the progress point definition (dbo.OteProgressPoint.ID). Identifies the type of progress milestone.

columns.name: RelatedActualFlag
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the related item uses the actual date/value rather than an estimated one.

columns.name: RelatedID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to another progress point record (self-reference to OteDirectoryVersionProgressPoint.ID) that this point is related to.

columns.name: RelatedDays
columns.description: Number of days offset or dependency expressed relative to the related progress point (nullable).

columns.name: EstimatedDate
columns.description: Estimated date for this progress point to be achieved (nullable).

columns.name: ActualDate
columns.description: Actual date when this progress point was achieved (nullable).

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes about this progress point (nullable). Included as a searchable text field.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: DataMart key used for external integrations or ETL mapping for this progress record (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table associated with this progress record (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for external/data-mart mapping for this progress record (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the Directory Version Shipping record.

columns.name: OteDirectoryVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.OteDirectoryVersion.ID - identifies the directory/version this shipping row belongs to.

columns.name: OteShippingPointID
columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.OteShippingPoint.ID - the shipping point or location associated with this record.

columns.name: Command
columns.description: Short command or instruction code related to the shipping action (nvarchar(20)).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Numeric amount associated with the shipping record (business interpretation may vary).

columns.name: Packages
columns.description: Number of packages included in this shipment.

columns.name: Palets
columns.description: Number of pallets associated with this shipment (note spelling 'Palets' in source).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric mapping key used for dimensional/master-data mapping or analytics joins.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional table name used in dimensional/master-data mapping (nvarchar(50)).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for dimensional/master-data mapping (nvarchar(50)).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the progress point (status step) in a process.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the progress point (for example 'Distribution Start' or 'Files Dispatch').

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for mapping this progress point to a dimensional or master-data table (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of a dimensional/master-data table associated with this progress point (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for mapping this progress point to master-data or reference tables (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the shipping point.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the shipping point or location.

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Street address of the shipping point (may include city/state/postal information).

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Primary phone number for the shipping point or its contact.

columns.name: ContactPerson
columns.description: Name of the person to contact at the shipping point.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional reference key used by downstream data mart or dimensional model.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the dimensional table associated with this record.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for joining to dimensional models or external systems.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the payment date policy entry.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the related campaign (foreign key to Campaign.ID).

columns.name: CustomerType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the customer type or segment this policy applies to.

columns.name: UdacCharacterization
columns.description: Numeric code used for UDAC characterization or classification relevant to the policy.

columns.name: FromDate
columns.description: Start date/time indicating when the policy becomes effective.

columns.name: ToDate
columns.description: End date/time indicating when the policy expires or is no longer valid.

columns.name: OtePaymentFlag
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether OTE payment applies for this policy (true/false).

columns.name: PaymentDate
columns.description: The scheduled payment date associated with this policy entry; used as the primary human-readable identifier.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional dimensional model key for downstream analytics; often null in source extracts.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the dimensional table this record maps to; typically used for ETL mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to dimension tables or external systems; frequently null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the payment method record.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the type of payment method (links to PaymentMethodType.ID).

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments configured for this payment method.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval (in months or configured unit) between installments.

columns.name: PaymentMonth
columns.description: Explicit scheduled month/date for payment when specified (nullable).

columns.name: AdvancedPayment
columns.description: Amount required or recorded as an advanced payment for this method.

columns.name: IsExchangeSale
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment is part of an exchange sale.

columns.name: PaymentPhoneAccount
columns.description: Phone account or identifier used for phone-based payments (may be empty).

columns.name: PaymentPhoneID
columns.description: Reference to a phone record used for payment routing (links to PointPhone.ID).

columns.name: PaymentCreditTransactionCode
columns.description: External or internal transaction code for credit payments (nullable).

columns.name: BillingEmailID
columns.description: Reference to the billing contact email record (links to ContactEmail.ID).

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices generated or associated with this payment method.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-migration numeric key used to track origin when records were imported.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or mapping used during data migration or import.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used by data-migration processes (nullable).

columns.name: UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth
columns.description: Indicates whether the payment month was explicitly set by a user.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the payment method type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the payment method type.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment method type is active and available for use.

columns.name: InstallmentSequence
columns.description: Comma-separated sequence of allowed installment counts (e.g., '1,2,3').

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentPermited
columns.description: Indicates whether advanced/prepayments are permitted for this payment type.

columns.name: PaymentWay
columns.description: Numeric code representing the payment channel or way (business-defined taxonomy).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used during data migration for mapping purposes (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name or mapping reference used during data migration (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used in data-migration mapping (nullable).

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentAvailable
columns.description: Indicates whether advanced payment functionality is available for this type.

columns.name: SubscriptionPaymentMethodTypeId
columns.description: Optional reference to another PaymentMethodType used for subscription-specific mapping.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the payment policy record.

columns.name: UdacCharacterization
columns.description: Categorization code (UDAC) used to characterize this policy. Integer-coded classification.

columns.name: PriceFrom
columns.description: Lower bound of applicable price range for this policy (currency USD). Nullable when policy applies regardless of minimum price.

columns.name: PriceTo
columns.description: Upper bound of applicable price range for this policy (currency USD). Nullable when policy applies regardless of maximum price.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the payment method type (dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID). Identifies which payment method this policy applies to.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices associated with this payment policy (e.g., 1 for single invoice).

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments allowed by this payment policy.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional reference key for an external data-mart or reporting system. Currently unused (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data-mart table associated with this policy. Nullable and often empty in current data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by a data-mart or reporting system to identify the policy. Nullable in current dataset.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval code (integer) representing the recurrence or billing interval for this payment policy.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pending reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the pending reason (stored in Greek in sample data). Used as the primary display label for this entity.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the pending reason is active (true) or inactive (false). Nullable in the source but typically used to filter active reasons.

columns.name: Number
columns.description: Raw stored phone number value (often contains country and area code together). Values may include leading/trailing spaces or punctuation and represent the full phone string used as the record key.

columns.name: CountryCode
columns.description: International country dialing code portion of the phone (e.g., '0030' for Greece). Stored as text to preserve leading zeros and formatting.

columns.name: AreaCode
columns.description: Local area or city dialing code associated with the phone number. May contain whitespace or special markers for missing values.

columns.name: SubscriberNumber
columns.description: The subscriber portion of the phone number (local number excluding country and area codes). This is the most human-readable part of the phone for display and search.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer reference key used by downstream matching or data-management processes to join to the DMTable (source reference). Frequently null when no match exists.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or reference table associated with DMKey. Used to indicate the origin of the DMKey linkage (for example 'GL16E_PhoneData').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for data-management referencing. Appears unused in this dataset (all values null) but reserved for alternate keyed references.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the email record (primary key). Represents the record id for this point's email entry.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.BusinessPoint.ID; links this email to the associated business point/location.

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Contact email address for the business point. Used as the primary human-readable identifier for contact information and for searching.

columns.name: Usage
columns.description: Integer code indicating usage or purpose classification of the email (e.g., 1 = primary contact). Stored as integer values representing usage categories.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used by data management or matching processes to link to external reference tables. Typically used together with DMTable/DMCharKey.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the reference or source table associated with DMKey (e.g., 'UsageDatafix'). Identifies the origin of the DMKey link.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string-based key for data-management referencing. Not populated in this dataset but reserved for alternate reference keys.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the phone record at a business point.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the business location/branch associated with this phone; foreign key to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID.

columns.name: Number
columns.description: Telephone number assigned to the business point (stored as text, often national format); foreign key to dbo.Phone.Number.

columns.name: Extension
columns.description: Telephone extension associated with the number when applicable; many values are null.

columns.name: Usage
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the usage type of the phone (examples: primary, secondary, other usage classifications).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key from the source data mart linking back to the originating system record.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/data-mart table where this phone record originated (helps trace lineage).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from the source data mart (text identifier); frequently empty in this dataset.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this phone record is currently active.

columns.name: ProjectionFirst
columns.description: Boolean flag used to indicate projection priority or if this record was the first projected entry.

columns.name: Mitr11
columns.description: Boolean flag used for Mitr11 classification or internal categorization.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the source business point in the relationship; foreign key to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID.

columns.name: TargetBussinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the target or related business point; foreign key to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code representing the relationship type between the source and target business points (example values: 9, 10).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key from the source data mart linking to the underlying branch or relationship record for traceability.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source data mart table name from which the relationship was derived (e.g., CM15E_Branches).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from the source data mart (text identifier); typically empty in this dataset.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the PointUrl record.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the BusinessPoint table (BusinessPoint.ID) — identifies the business location or point associated with this URL.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website or link address associated with the business point (e.g., www.example.com).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the URL type or category (example convention: 0 = primary website, 1 = social media, etc.).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the postpone reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the reason for postponement (typically a short phrase).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this postpone reason is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream/data model mappings. Currently null for existing rows in the sample.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external data model table related to this postpone reason; often null in the current dataset.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external/data model mapping; present for compatibility with integrations and often null in current data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the presale form record

columns.name: TargetGroupItemValueID
columns.description: Reference to the TargetGroupItemValue table (foreign key). Links this presale form to a specific target group value.

columns.name: AmountXO
columns.description: Monetary amount related to XO (currency in USD). Many rows are null when not provided.

columns.name: CommentsXO
columns.description: Free-text comments specific to the XO section. Stored as NVARCHAR and may contain Greek text.

columns.name: AmountWebsite
columns.description: Monetary amount related to the website (currency in USD). Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: IsAplh
columns.description: Boolean flag (bit) indicating the 'Aplh' status for the presale form. May be null if not set.

columns.name: IsCatalogProduct
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the item is a catalog product.

columns.name: IsEshop
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the product or request is for an e-shop presence.

columns.name: MinBudgetPPC
columns.description: Minimum suggested budget for PPC campaigns (currency). Nullable for many records.

columns.name: MaxBudgetPPC
columns.description: Maximum suggested budget for PPC campaigns (currency). Nullable for many records.

columns.name: IsInfoSufficientPPC
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether provided information is sufficient for PPC planning.

columns.name: CommentsPPC
columns.description: Descriptive comments for PPC (text field). Often contains planning notes and is the most human-readable field for this table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the pricelist item record

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Foreign key to VersionSection table identifying the version/section this pricelist item belongs to.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Foreign key to Product table identifying which product the pricelist item applies to.

columns.name: ApplyToSection
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the pricelist item applies to the entire section.

columns.name: ApplyToSubSection
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the pricelist item applies to subsections inside the section.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key reserved for data-mart integration. Currently null for all sampled rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data-mart table name for integration. Nullable and often empty in this dataset.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart integration. Nullable in current records.

columns.name: IsInactive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the pricelist item is inactive.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the pricelist item detail record.

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Identifier of the parent pricelist item (references dbo.PricelistItem.ID).

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Identifier of the product for this pricelist detail (references dbo.Product.ID).

columns.name: ProductPartID
columns.description: Identifier of a specific product part or variant (references dbo.ProductPart.ID). Nullable when no specific part is used.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Identifier for a product kit if the pricelist item applies to a kit (references dbo.ProductKit.ID). Often null for non-kit items.

columns.name: MeasurementType
columns.description: Type of measurement or pricing unit used for this detail (references dbo.PriceListMeasurementType.ID).

columns.name: UnitAmount
columns.description: Numeric amount or price associated with a single measurement unit for this pricelist detail.

columns.name: ComplexPrice
columns.description: Serialized/structured text (often JSON or formula) describing complex pricing rules. Frequently empty.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart key used for downstream reporting or integration. Mostly null in this dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external or reporting table associated with DMKey. Typically null in records.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart integrations. Often unused and null.

columns.name: AllowableQuantities
columns.description: Serialized list or range of allowable quantities for this pricelist detail (e.g., '1,5,10'). Nullable.

columns.name: AmountsPerAllowableQuantities
columns.description: Serialized map of amounts corresponding to AllowableQuantities (e.g., '1:10;5:45'). Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the price range entry for a pricelist item detail.

columns.name: PriceListItemDetailID
columns.description: Reference to the pricelist item detail this price range applies to (references dbo.PricelistItemDetail.ID).

columns.name: PriceFrom
columns.description: Lower bound for the price range (inclusive). Numeric value representing price or quantity threshold depending on configuration.

columns.name: PriceTo
columns.description: Upper bound for the price range (inclusive where specified). Nullable when the range has no upper limit.

columns.name: OneTimeAmount
columns.description: One-time amount or fee applied for the given price range. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: ExtraFeePercentage
columns.description: Percentage surcharge or extra fee applied for this price range (stored as decimal percent, e.g., 40.00 = 40%).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the price list measurement type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human readable name or description of the measurement type (may contain localized text).

columns.name: AdvertisementEndDateFactor
columns.description: Numeric factor used to compute the advertisement end date for this measurement type (business multiplier).

columns.name: CalculateUsingQuantity
columns.description: Flag indicating whether pricing/calculation should use quantity for this measurement type.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the measurement type is active and available for use.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the product record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric product code used for lookup and display (may be a SKU or catalog code).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Primary, human-readable product name.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text about the product, used in catalog and detail views.

columns.name: IsComposite
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the product is a composite/bundled product composed of other items.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the product record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system identity that created the product record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the product record was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system identity that last modified the product record.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the product type. Links to ProductType table; may be null when type is unspecified.

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Reference to an associated discount policy. May be null when no discount policy applies.

columns.name: MinMembers
columns.description: Minimum number of members/items required for this product when used as a bundle or group.

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum number of members/items allowed for this product when used as a bundle or group.

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Numeric code describing the type/category of the target value (business-defined enumeration).

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Reference to the specific business target entity (links to ProductPart).

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Indicates whether the product bundle contains optional members that are not required.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product is dependent on another product or configuration.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag: true if the product is logically deleted and should be excluded from active lists.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Reference to the UDAC (external classification) record for the product.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the medium/version entity that this product is associated with.

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Reference to a planning group used in canvas/placement planning; often null if not planned.

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the product characterization or category for reporting/analytics.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Key used by downstream data mart or reporting systems to identify product groups.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart or staging table associated with this product for reporting processes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the data mart to further classify the product for reporting.

columns.name: NameCIAI
columns.description: Alternate product name stored with case-insensitive collation for comparisons and lookups.

columns.name: CodeCIAI
columns.description: Alternate product code stored with case-insensitive collation for comparisons and lookups.

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Flag indicating whether line-level editing is enabled for this product in the UI/editor.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of allowed changes to the product configuration or lines (business rule).

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag to enable validation rules for this product during edit or save operations.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag that controls whether keyphrases can be automatically created for this product.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Indicates whether the product supports price ranges (tiered or ranged pricing).

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product's amounts should be excluded from budget calculations.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product associated with this export template. Also acts as the primary key for this table. Maps to dbo.Product.ID.

columns.name: Template
columns.description: XML document that defines the export/print template for the product. Contains printed fields, entries and artwork references. This is the main payload field and can be large (multi-line XML).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-mart or ETL mapping. May be null when not used.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target data-mart table used in ETL or reporting mappings. Often null when no mapping exists.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data-mart or ETL mapping (string-based). May contain an alternate key value for external systems.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the ProductionCaseProduct record. Uniquely identifies the association between a production case and a pricelist item.

columns.name: CaseID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the production case that this product entry belongs to (maps to dbo.Case.ID).

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the pricelist item (product/pricing definition) included in the case (maps to dbo.PricelistItem.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-mart / ETL mapping for this case-product association.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target data-mart table for ETL mapping related to this record.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by ETL or reporting systems to map or tag this record. Useful when an alphanumeric external key is required.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the production color.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly name or description of the color (e.g., Black, Orange, Red).

columns.name: Cyan
columns.description: Cyan component of the color expressed as an integer percentage (0-100).

columns.name: Yellow
columns.description: Yellow component of the color expressed as an integer percentage (0-100).

columns.name: Magenta
columns.description: Magenta component of the color expressed as an integer percentage (0-100).

columns.name: Black
columns.description: Black (key) component of the color expressed as an integer percentage (0-100).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the color is currently active and available for production.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is the system/default choice for new items.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the production font entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Font family or internal font identifier used in production (e.g., UBHelveticaCondeuro).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the font is active and available to use in production.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is the default font for new productions.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the production workflow record.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the production workflow (Greek language content).

columns.name: Output
columns.description: Short code or classification for the workflow output (single-character / short text).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product-kit membership record.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Identifier of the kit product (references Product.ID). Indicates which product is the kit container.

columns.name: MemberID
columns.description: Identifier of the product that is a member of the kit (references Product.ID).

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the kit member is mandatory (true) or optional (false).

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Identifier of the version/section context for this kit member (references VersionSection.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external data-mart integration. Currently null for sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external/data-mart table associated with this membership row. Often null in current data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for external integration. Currently null for sample data.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Numeric ordering value used when filling or processing kit members. Default/sample value is 0.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product part record.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Reference to the parent product (foreign key to dbo.Product.ID).

columns.name: ProductPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the part definition that describes this part (foreign key to dbo.ProductPartDefinition.ID).

columns.name: IsAddon
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this part is an optional addon to the product.

columns.name: MinOccurence
columns.description: Minimum number of times this part must appear for the product. Null allowed but typically 1.

columns.name: MaxOccurence
columns.description: Maximum number of times this part may appear for the product (upper bound).

columns.name: PriceMode
columns.description: Indicator for how pricing is applied to this part (enumeration stored as integer).

columns.name: ContentAttributePermittedValues
columns.description: List or specification of permitted values for a content attribute associated with this part (stored as text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mapping integer key used to link to external or legacy data sources (may be null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external or legacy table used in data mapping for this part (text identifier, may be null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key for data-mapping to external systems (alternative mapping key, may be null).

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Integer indicating the display or fill order of this part within the product. Lower numbers display first.

columns.name: ColumnNames
columns.description: Optional comma-separated list of column names or content fields associated with this part (text, may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product part definition.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or abbreviation for the part definition (useful for lookups and quick references).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the product part definition (primary display label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description of the product part definition (used for display and search).

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the UDAC part definition (foreign key to dbo.UdacPartDefinition.ID) used for domain-specific mappings.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the medium version this definition applies to (foreign key to dbo.MediumVersion.ID).

columns.name: SingleAppearance
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this part definition should appear at most once (true) or can repeat (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used to map this part definition to external or legacy systems (may be null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/legacy table used for mapping this definition (may be null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string mapping key used to join or identify the definition in external systems.

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Integer code indicating which editor or UI mode should be used when editing content for this part definition.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the product type (often localized, e.g., Greek).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key referencing a legacy data mart record (sparsely populated; many nulls).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the legacy data mart table related to this product type (rarely populated).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key used by legacy systems for this product type (seldom populated).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the rejection reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Text describing the reason for rejection (may be localized, e.g., Greek).

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the rejection reason has been soft-deleted (True/False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this RelatedContract record.

columns.name: ContractID
columns.description: Reference to the primary Contract (maps to dbo.Contract.ID).

columns.name: RelatedContractID
columns.description: Identifier for the related/associated contract (likely refers to a Contract record).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Human-friendly type of the relationship between the two contracts (e.g., renewal, amendment).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the role.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Textual description or name of the role (user-facing title).

columns.name: Permissions
columns.description: Serialized permissions bitmask or encoded permissions string that controls access rights for this role.

columns.name: MaxDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount value permitted for users with this role (decimal).

columns.name: DiscountIsFixedAmount
columns.description: Flag indicating whether MaxDiscount is a fixed amount (true) or a percentage (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external/data-mart integrations (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name used by data-mart or ETL processes (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart/ETL mapping (often null).

columns.name: ForwardFromContractChange
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this role should forward items generated from contract changes.

columns.name: ForwardInternalProduct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether items related to internal products should be forwarded for this role.

columns.name: ForwardTicketType
columns.description: Flag indicating whether ticket-type items should be forwarded for users with this role.

columns.name: LoginUrl
columns.description: Optional login or landing URL associated with this role (may be used to route users to a role-specific page).

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Reference to a parent Role (hierarchical role relationship; maps to dbo.Role.ID).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the role is active and available for assignment.

columns.name: InboxViewType
columns.description: Numeric code that indicates the preferred inbox view type for users with this role (enumeration).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the rule condition record.

columns.name: RuleMasterID
columns.description: Reference to the parent rule (RuleMaster). Links this condition to the rule definition in the RuleMaster table.

columns.name: FromValue
columns.description: Lower or single value used by the condition (often a code or numeric identifier represented as text).

columns.name: FromText
columns.description: Human-readable text or label corresponding to FromValue. Typically a descriptive name or lookup text.

columns.name: ToValue
columns.description: Upper bound or target value for range-based conditions (stored as text). May be null when condition is single-valued.

columns.name: ToText
columns.description: Human-readable text corresponding to ToValue. Present when the condition uses a range or target label.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the rule condition definition (RuleConditionDefinition) that describes the type and semantics of this condition.

columns.name: Expression
columns.description: Pre-rendered or computed expression/description for the condition. Often a human-readable sentence explaining the condition.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand/operator used by the condition (references RuleConditionOperand). Indicates the comparison operator or operand type for the condition.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the rule condition definition record.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the parent rule definition (RuleDefinition). Associates this condition definition with a higher-level rule definition.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short machine-friendly name or code for the condition definition (used as an identifier or key in UI or logic).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable description or label for the condition definition, often localized (used for display to end users).

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the SQL column (SQLColumn table) that this condition applies to. Indicates the data column evaluated by the condition.

columns.name: ConditionType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the category or type of condition (e.g., equality, range, lookup).

columns.name: LookupTableID
columns.description: Optional reference to a lookup table/object (SQLObject) that provides valid values or labels for this condition definition.

columns.name: FromDefaultValue
columns.description: Default starting value for this condition when no explicit value is provided. Stored as text to accommodate codes or labels.

columns.name: ToDefaultValue
columns.description: Default ending value for range conditions when no explicit upper value is provided. May be null for non-range types.

columns.name: ConditionCategory
columns.description: Optional numeric category to group or classify condition definitions for UI organization or processing rules.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this join record that links a rule condition definition to SQL columns.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID; identifies which rule condition this join belongs to.

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.SQLColumn.ID for the left-hand column (left operand) used in the condition.

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.SQLColumn.ID for the right-hand column (right operand) or value used in the condition.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the operand type used in rule conditions.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Internal name or code for the operand (example values: EQUALS, NOT EQUALS, IN). Used as the primary human-readable label for the operand.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: User-facing, localized text for the operand. Sample values are in Greek and intended for display in UI.

columns.name: OperandAsSQL
columns.description: Integer code that indicates how this operand should be translated to SQL or interpreted by the rules engine.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the rule definition (unique identifier).

columns.name: RuleType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type of rule (system-defined classification).

columns.name: SourceObjectID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.SQLObject.ID — identifies the source object associated with this rule.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short human-friendly name or code for the rule definition (used as the primary label).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Localized display text or description of the rule (often contains user-facing wording; sample values in Greek).

columns.name: RuleDefinitionCategory
columns.description: Numeric category or classification for the rule definition used for grouping and filtering.

columns.name: RuleEditor
columns.description: Identifier of the editor or user who created/last modified the rule (user id or system account id).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional expression or logic body for the rule. Frequently null in this dataset; when present contains the rule logic or formula.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the rule master record (unique identifier).

columns.name: RuleCategory
columns.description: Numeric category grouping for this master rule (used to classify rule behavior).

columns.name: RuleContextEntityID
columns.description: Identifier of the context entity (business entity or domain) that this rule applies to.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key linking to dbo.RuleDefinition.ID to associate the master entry with its rule definition.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short machine-friendly code or key for the rule (used in lookups and logic references).

columns.name: Expression
columns.description: Full textual expression, token, or value evaluated by the rule; may include localized strings or identifiers.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Numeric quantity associated with the rule (meaning depends on rule type, e.g., expected occurrences or weight).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID referencing a stored SQL command associated with this rule.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Numeric state flag for the master rule record (e.g., active/inactive or other lifecycle states).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the sales collection record

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Business Point (location or POS) where the collection occurred; refers to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID

columns.name: PaymentType
columns.description: Code indicating the payment method/type used for the collection (e.g., cash, card)

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Monetary amount collected for this transaction

columns.name: BlockSeries
columns.description: Receipt block series identifier (string) used for grouped/numbered receipts

columns.name: BlockReceiptNumber
columns.description: Receipt number within the block/series; human-facing receipt identifier

columns.name: TransferDateToERP
columns.description: Timestamp when this collection record was transferred to the ERP/system (null if not yet transferred)

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the sales collection record was created in the system

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the record was last modified (often null if never modified)

columns.name: CreatedByID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user who created the record; refers to dbo.User.ID

columns.name: SystemReceiptNumber
columns.description: Internal/system-assigned receipt number for this collection

columns.name: ContractID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the customer contract associated with this collection; refers to dbo.Contract.ID

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Indicator code for collection subtype or classification (e.g., regular, adjustment)

columns.name: ModifiedByID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user who last modified the record; refers to dbo.User.ID (often null)

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag indicating whether the record is logically deleted (true/false)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart integer key used for downstream ETL or reporting (mostly null in this dataset)

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data-mart table name indicator used by ETL processes (mostly null)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart linking or ETL mapping (mostly null)

columns.name: CollectionDate
columns.description: Actual date and time when the payment/collection occurred

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the salesman targeting record

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign associated with this targeting entry; refers to dbo.Campaign.ID

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign segment targeted; refers to dbo.CampaignSegment.ID

columns.name: GroupID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign group for this targeting row; refers to dbo.CampaignGroup.ID

columns.name: SalesManID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the salesperson/user assigned to this targeting; refers to dbo.User.ID

columns.name: SuperVisorID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the supervising user for the salesperson; refers to dbo.User.ID

columns.name: TotalWorkingDays
columns.description: Total working days in the measurement period for this targeting entry

columns.name: TotalVisits
columns.description: Total number of visits recorded (decimal to allow fractional/weighted visits); unit_hint: currency field hint not applicable despite source hint

columns.name: COVisits
columns.description: Visits of type CO (collection office or categorized visit type) measured for the targeting

columns.name: NewVisits
columns.description: Number (decimal) of new visits in the period attributed to this targeting

columns.name: COCustomers
columns.description: Count of customers of type CO for the targeting period

columns.name: COAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with CO customers/visits (currency)

columns.name: LossCustomers
columns.description: Number (decimal) of customers lost during the period

columns.name: LossAmount
columns.description: Monetary value associated with lost customers (currency)

columns.name: IncreaseCustomers
columns.description: Number (decimal) of customers increased (gained) during the period

columns.name: IncreaseAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with customer increases (currency)

columns.name: ReductionCustomers
columns.description: Number (decimal) of customers with reduced activity during the period

columns.name: ReductionAmount
columns.description: Monetary value associated with reductions in customer activity (currency)

columns.name: NoChangesCustomers
columns.description: Number (decimal) of customers with no change during the period

columns.name: NoChangesAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount for customers with no change in the period (currency)

columns.name: ROCOCustomers
columns.description: ROCO customers count (decimal) — a domain-specific customer category metric

columns.name: ROCOAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount associated with ROCO customers (currency)

columns.name: NewCustomers
columns.description: Number (decimal) of newly acquired customers in the targeting period

columns.name: NewAmount
columns.description: Monetary value attributable to newly acquired customers (currency)

columns.name: TotalCustomers
columns.description: Total customer count (decimal) aggregated for the targeting entry

columns.name: TotalAmount
columns.description: Total monetary amount (currency) aggregated for this targeting record

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the sales tree history record.

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the sales segment or territory associated with this history record.

columns.name: SalesmanID

columns.name: SupervisorID

columns.name: ManagerID
