columns.name: Year
columns.description: The year that this sales tree configuration applies to (e.g., 2017).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this history record was created.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data management numeric key used for integration or ETL processes (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data management table name used by integration/ETL processes (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by integration/ETL processes (often null).

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag indicating whether the record is considered deleted (True/False).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Unique code that identifies the sequence generator entry (primary key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly description of what this sequence is used for.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Current numeric value of the sequence (next or last used sequence number depending on usage).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for external data-management or ETL mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional table name used by integration or ETL processes associated with this sequence.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by integration or ETL processes associated with this sequence.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the column record.

columns.name: SQLObjectID
columns.description: Reference to the parent SQL object (table or view) this column belongs to; foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The column's technical name as defined in the database (e.g., BusinessPointID). Used as the primary human-readable label for the column.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Display text or alternate name for the column; often the same as Name but used where a caption or user-friendly label is needed.

columns.name: ColumnType
columns.description: Data type of the column (e.g., INT, NVARCHAR). Describes how values are stored for this column.

columns.name: Length
columns.description: Declared length or precision for the column when applicable (for example NVARCHAR length or numeric precision).

columns.name: UserDataType
columns.description: Additional user-defined type information or constraints for the column (e.g., NOT NULL or specific user data type).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL command record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the SQL command; primary label used in lists and UI.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer textual description of what the command does or when to use it.

columns.name: CommandType
columns.description: Numeric code classifying the command type (application-specific enumeration).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the command record was created.

columns.name: CommandCategory
columns.description: Category or grouping for the command (application-specific classification).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Primary key for the SQL command text record. Also a foreign key reference to dbo.SQLCommand(ID).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: The full SQL text (NVARCHAR) for the command; human-readable SQL statement or batch associated with SQLCommandID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the job history entry.

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: Identifier (GUID) for the batch or execution group this history record belongs to.

columns.name: TimeStamp
columns.description: Date and time when the job history event occurred (server timestamp).

columns.name: RowsAffected
columns.description: Number of rows affected by the operation recorded in this history entry. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable message or short description of the job event (e.g., 'Begin UpdateCustomerSolvency', 'Finished UpdateCustomerSolvency').

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Numeric status code for the history entry (e.g., 1 = success, other codes for different outcomes).

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric type code categorizing the history record (different numbers indicate different kinds of job events).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the join condition record.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent SQL command (dbo.SQLCommand.ID) this join condition belongs to.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL text that represents the join condition (e.g., ON clause or join expression).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the join condition rule.

columns.name: SQLJoinConditionID
columns.description: Foreign key linking this rule to its parent join condition (dbo.SQLJoinCondition.ID).

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the left-side column (dbo.SQLColumn.ID) used in the rule.

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Alias or short identifier used for the left object (table or subquery) in the join expression.

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the right-side column (dbo.SQLColumn.ID) used in the rule.

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Alias or short identifier used for the right object (table or subquery) in the join expression.

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: The operand or operator expression applied between the left and right columns (e.g., '=', '<>', 'LIKE').

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL object.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: System name of the SQL object (compact, machine-friendly identifier).

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-readable description or display text for the SQL object.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the type/category of the SQL object.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Short alias or shorthand identifier for the SQL object used in references.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the search condition record.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Reference to the associated SQL command (foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL fragment or expression used as the search condition.

columns.name: PlaceHolderName
columns.description: Name of the placeholder or parameter used in the SQL condition; human-friendly identifier.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional short alias for the search condition used in references or UI.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this search condition rule.

columns.name: SQLSearchConditionID
columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.SQLSearchCondition.ID. Associates this rule with a parent search condition.

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID representing the left-hand column used in the rule.

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Alias/name used for the left object (table or derived object) in the SQL expression (as used in the query).

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID representing the right-hand column used in the rule.

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Alias/name used for the right object (table or derived object) in the SQL expression (as used in the query).

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: Operator or expression applied between left and right operands (examples: '=', '<', '>', 'LIKE', 'BETWEEN').

columns.name: WhearSearchValue
columns.description: Literal search value used in the WHERE clause for this rule (single-value search). NOTE: column name contains a typographical variant 'WhearSearchValue'.

columns.name: WhereSearchValueForBetween
columns.description: Search value(s) used when the OperandExpression is BETWEEN (may contain range or multi-part values).

columns.name: SQLSelctStatementID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key for this select-list entry. Foreign key to dbo.SQLSelectStatement.SQLCommandID identifying the parent select statement. (Note: column name contains a typographical variant 'SQLSelctStatementID'.)

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key for this select-list entry. Foreign key to dbo.SQLColumn.ID referencing the selected column.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias assigned to the selected column (the AS clause value) as it appears in the select list.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Primary key identifying the select statement; also a foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: RowsToFetch
columns.description: Optional limit for number of rows to fetch (TOP / FETCH N). Nullable when no explicit row limit is applied.

columns.name: SelectDistinct
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the SELECT uses DISTINCT to remove duplicate rows.

columns.name: IsCountSelect
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the SELECT is a COUNT aggregate (e.g., SELECT COUNT(...)).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Freeform SQL SELECT text for the statement. Human-readable representation of the query; useful for search and display.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Identifies the parent SQL command and references dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: ObjectID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Identifier of the referenced SQL object (table/view); foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias assigned to the table source within the SELECT statement (the name used to qualify columns in the query).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Primary key for the update statement row. Also relates to dbo.SQLCommand.ID (foreign key reference). Not nullable.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL text or expression for the update statement. Stored as NVARCHAR(1024) and may contain Greek collation characters.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the sub-channel. Integer surrogate key used as the table primary key.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Identifier for the parent channel type. Foreign key referencing dbo.ChannelType.ID. Not nullable.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or name of the sub-channel (e.g., 'Premise-Major'). NVARCHAR(100), used as the primary display label.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the sub-channel is active (True) or inactive (False). Stored as BIT.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for downstream data mart mappings. High null rate indicates many rows are not mapped.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart table associated with this sub-channel. Nullable; when present indicates mapping destination.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data mart mapping. Nullable and currently shows no distinct values in sampled data.

columns.name: DefaultSalesmanID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID representing the default salesperson for this sub-channel. Nullable in schema but sample rows show a default value.

columns.name: diagram_id
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the diagram within the database

columns.name: name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the diagram

columns.name: principal_id
columns.description: Identifier of the database principal (owner) associated with the diagram

columns.name: version
columns.description: Version number of the diagram definition; used for tracking updates

columns.name: definition
columns.description: Binary serialized definition of the diagram (stored diagram data)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Auxiliary integer key used internally for data model relationships or mapping

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of an associated table related to the diagram (if applicable)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key or identifier used for mapping or lookup in diagram metadata

columns.name: ID
columns.description: System-generated unique integer value used as a sequential/unique number

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier value for the row (surrogate or imported ID). Values are non-null and appear numeric; used as the primary identifier for this simple lookup table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the TargetChannel record; unique identifier for the target channel configuration.

columns.name: TargetSettingCriteriaID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the TargetSetting criteria that this target channel row belongs to (links to dbo.TargetSetting.ID).

columns.name: SubChannelID
columns.description: Foreign key to the SubChannel table (dbo.SubChannel.ID). Identifies the specific sub-channel associated with this target channel.

columns.name: OnSiteStart
columns.description: Start date when on-site service or coverage begins for this channel configuration. Nullable when no on-site period is defined.

columns.name: OnSiteEnd
columns.description: End date when on-site service or coverage ends for this channel configuration. Nullable when open-ended or not applicable.

columns.name: OffSiteStart
columns.description: Start date for any off-site service period associated with this channel. Frequently null for rows without off-site assignments.

columns.name: OffSiteEnd
columns.description: End date for any off-site service period associated with this channel. Frequently null for rows without off-site assignments.

columns.name: OnSiteTotalAgents
columns.description: Total number of agents assigned on-site during the defined on-site period. Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: OffSiteTotalAgents
columns.description: Total number of agents assigned off-site during the defined off-site period. Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: OnSiteWorkingDays
columns.description: Number of working days counted for on-site operations in the measurement period. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: OffSiteWorkingDays
columns.description: Number of working days counted for off-site operations in the measurement period. Often null when off-site not used.

columns.name: OnSiteGrossManDays
columns.description: Gross man-days on-site measured before adjustments (e.g., headcount * working days). Nullable for rows where not calculated or not applicable.

columns.name: OffSiteGrossManDays
columns.description: Gross man-days off-site measured before adjustments. Often null for records without off-site activity.

columns.name: OnSiteNetManDays
columns.description: Net man-days on-site after adjustments (for example after sickness or leave deductions). Nullable where not applicable.

columns.name: OffSiteNetManDays
columns.description: Net man-days off-site after adjustments. Often null for records without off-site activity.

columns.name: OnSiteIllnessRate
columns.description: Illness or sickness rate for on-site agents expressed as a percentage (e.g., 13.61). Nullable when rate not available.

columns.name: OffSiteIllnessRate
columns.description: Illness or sickness rate for off-site agents expressed as a percentage. Typically null for many rows.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Dimension model key placeholder (likely used by downstream data mart). Currently often null for records.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the downstream dimension table (string). Present as NVARCHAR and often null in the current data set.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for dimension mapping (string). Used for descriptive dimension lookups; frequently null in the source.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the Target Channel Area record.

columns.name: TargetChannelID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Target Channel (foreign key to dbo.TargetChannel.ID).

columns.name: AreaType
columns.description: Categorical code describing the kind of area (e.g., CC for customer center).

columns.name: AreaID
columns.description: Short code identifier for the geographic or sales area (e.g., CC1).

columns.name: Area
columns.description: Human-readable name of the area or region covered by this target channel entry.

columns.name: SalesMenMultitude
columns.description: Number of sales representatives assigned to this area (on-site).

columns.name: SalesMenOffSiteMultitude
columns.description: Number of off-site (remote or field) sales representatives for this area.

columns.name: OffSiteAreaType
columns.description: Type code for an associated off-site area when applicable (often null if none).

columns.name: OffSiteAreaID
columns.description: Identifier code for the off-site area linked to this record (nullable).

columns.name: OffSiteArea
columns.description: Human-readable name of the off-site area associated with this target channel area (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart integer key — reserved for downstream ETL or reporting mapping (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data mart table name used for ETL or integration mapping (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for external mapping in the data mart (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the target group item record.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the associated Business Point (foreign key to dbo.BusinessPoint.ID).

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this item belongs to (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SourceCampaignID
columns.description: Optional reference to the originating campaign (nullable foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: CaseID
columns.description: Optional link to a Case record (nullable foreign key to dbo.Case.ID).

columns.name: CustomerName
columns.description: Registered customer or organization name for this business point (display label).

columns.name: Brandname
columns.description: Commercial brand or trading name associated with the customer or business point.

columns.name: Prefecture
columns.description: Administrative prefecture (region) where the business point is located.

columns.name: Municipality
columns.description: Municipality for the address of the business point (nullable).

columns.name: City
columns.description: City and postal locality associated with the business point (often includes postal code text).

columns.name: StreetName
columns.description: Street name portion of the business point address (nullable).

columns.name: StreetNumber
columns.description: Street number portion of the business point address (nullable).

columns.name: NumberExtension
columns.description: Extension for the street number (e.g., building/entrance) — reserved but typically null.

columns.name: ZipCode
columns.description: Postal / ZIP code for the business point location.

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Primary phone number for the customer or business point (as stored, may be local format).

columns.name: CustomerProfession
columns.description: Description of the customer's profession or primary business activity (nullable).

columns.name: ReliabilityStatus
columns.description: Quality or reliability flag for the customer record (e.g., RED) used for risk or data quality indication.

columns.name: MainHeadingID
columns.description: Identifier for the primary business heading or category assigned to this customer (categorization).

columns.name: MainHeadingCode
columns.description: Short code for the primary business heading/category (nullable).

columns.name: MainHeadingName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the primary business heading or category for this customer.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business-specific code for this target group item (often used as a short lookup or reference).

columns.name: ProcessID
columns.description: Identifier for processing workflows or batches related to this record (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart integer key used for downstream ETL/reporting mapping (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data mart table name used for integration mappings (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key for mapping to external systems or data marts (nullable).

columns.name: PaymentRefusal
columns.description: Flag indicating if the customer has refused payment (nullable boolean).

columns.name: Disappeared
columns.description: Indicator that the customer/business point has disappeared or is no longer reachable (nullable boolean).

columns.name: PrecariousnessLegal
columns.description: Flag for legal precariousness status (e.g., legal risk or issues) for the customer (nullable boolean).

columns.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusal
columns.description: Indicates repeated or continuous refusals of payment by the customer (nullable boolean).

columns.name: SealedCheck
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether the account has a sealed (restricted) check status (nullable boolean).

columns.name: TargetGroupItemValueID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the target group item value; primary key and references TargetGroupItemValue.ID

columns.name: BalanceValue
columns.description: Current balance value for this target group item (monetary amount)

columns.name: DueBalanceValue
columns.description: Amount of balance that is due (outstanding amount)

columns.name: SettlementBalanceValue
columns.description: Balance value used for settlement calculations (monetary amount)

columns.name: SettlementWay
columns.description: Description of the way/method used for settlement or payment

columns.name: HigherSpendingHeadingCode
columns.description: Code for the higher-level spending heading or category

columns.name: HigherSpendingHeadingName
columns.description: Human-readable name/title of the higher-level spending heading or category

columns.name: SubHeadingCode
columns.description: Code for a sub-heading under the higher spending heading

columns.name: SubHeadingName
columns.description: Name of the sub-heading under the higher spending heading

columns.name: FullHeadingDescription
columns.description: Full descriptive text for the heading or category

columns.name: HasOnline
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this item has an online offering or presence

columns.name: HasGraphicFile
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a graphic file is associated with this item

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the task transition record.

columns.name: SourceTaskTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the originating TaskType (foreign key to dbo.TaskType.ID). May be null for transitions that apply from any source.

columns.name: TargetTaskTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the target TaskType for this transition (foreign key to dbo.TaskType.ID). Identifies the task type that will be created or moved to.

columns.name: Condition
columns.description: Optional workflow condition or rule expression (often XAML/RuleExpressionCondition) that must be satisfied for the transition to occur.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-mart / external mapping purposes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of an external or dimensional table used for reporting/mapping of this transition.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart or external mapping; often unused (null).

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this transition is the default path when multiple transitions are available.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the transition configuration; used for compatibility and migration tracking.

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional free-form options or serialized settings for the transition (nvarchar typically used for small config blobs).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the task type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or name of the task type (often localized).

columns.name: CaseTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the CaseType this task belongs to (foreign key to dbo.CaseType.ID).

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Fully-qualified editor/viewmodel class name used to render or edit the task in the client application.

columns.name: Outcomes
columns.description: Comma-separated or serialized list of possible outcomes for the task (may be null if none).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or identifier for the task type (e.g., 'T01'); intended for compact display and referencing.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: Single-character activity type code indicating the category or behavior of the task.

columns.name: TargetCaseTypeID
columns.description: Optional reference to a CaseType that is created or targeted by this task (foreign key to dbo.CaseType.ID).

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional serialized settings or configuration for the task type (free-text or key/value blob).

columns.name: Initiator
columns.description: Fully-qualified class name used to initiate or trigger this task type in the workflow engine.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-mart or external reporting mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional table name used for data-mart or reporting mappings for this task type.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external mapping (commonly unused).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the task type is active and available for use.

columns.name: OutcomeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression or rule that computes or constrains the outcome for this task type.

columns.name: Renderings
columns.description: Optional serialized rendering configuration for the UI representation of this task type.

columns.name: InVariableExpressions
columns.description: Optional serialized definitions of input variable expressions for the task (rarely populated).

columns.name: OutVariableExpressions
columns.description: Optional serialized definitions of output variable expressions produced by the task.

columns.name: MultiInstance
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this task type supports multiple concurrent instances.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Version number for the task type definition; used for compatibility and migrations.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the Task Type Assignment record; unique identifier for each assignment mapping.

columns.name: RoleID

columns.name: AssignmentType
columns.description: Integer code representing the kind of assignment (e.g., primary, secondary, automatic). Values are small set enumerations (distinct_count = 3).

columns.name: TaskTypeID
columns.description: Reference to dbo.TaskType.ID identifying which task type this assignment applies to; non-nullable.

columns.name: SpecialType
columns.description: Optional integer flag indicating a special subtype or exception for the assignment; many rows are null when not applicable.

columns.name: Options
columns.description: Optional free-text or serialized options/parameters for this assignment (up to 512 chars). Used for custom behavior or configuration.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional legacy character key for external data mapping; typically null for most rows.

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum allowed number of members in a composite Udac (if applicable).

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Type code describing the kind of target value (enum); currently all null in sample data.

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Reference to UdacPart.ID or other target entity identifying a specific target value; nullable.

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Flag indicating the Udac allows optional members in its composition.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Udac is dependent on other records or contexts.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag; true means the record is marked deleted and typically omitted from active lists.

columns.name: UdacType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the Udac subtype/category (business enum).

columns.name: NewUdacID
columns.description: Reference to another Udac.ID (e.g., successor or related Udac); often null when not applicable.

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Reference to CanvasPlanningGroup.ID for planning/grouping purposes; frequently null.

columns.name: OldUdacCode
columns.description: Legacy/previous code value for the Udac, retained for historical mapping; nullable.

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Classification or characterization code used by the business to group Udacs.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data-mart or reporting mappings; frequently null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart/reporting table associated with this Udac; nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for reporting joins; often null in current data.

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a line-editor UI is enabled for this Udac.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of allowed changes for the Udac (business rule); default/sample is 0.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether validation rules are applied for this Udac.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag controlling whether keyphrase creation is permitted for this Udac.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Flag indicating if the Udac supports multiple price ranges.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Business category code for the Udac (small set of possible values).

columns.name: ProdWorkflowID
columns.description: Reference to ProductionWorkflow.ID to indicate the production process associated with this Udac; nullable.

columns.name: Deadline
columns.description: Numeric deadline indicator (business-defined units), often zero in sample data.

columns.name: IsAddOn
columns.description: Indicator (0/1) showing if the Udac is an add-on product; stored as integer in this schema.

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Udac's amount is excluded from budget calculations.

columns.name: NewSubscriptionUdacId
columns.description: Reference to Udac.ID used when this Udac maps to a subscription product; frequently null.

columns.name: CanBeSubscribed
columns.description: Flag indicating whether customers can subscribe to this Udac.

columns.name: IsDirProduct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Udac is a direct product (business-specific meaning).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the content attribute definition.

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to UdacPartDefinition.ID indicating which part definition this attribute belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the content attribute (e.g., 'Description', 'Customer Name').

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric type code for the attribute (e.g., text, number, lookup); small enumerated set.

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this attribute must be provided (true = required).

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value for the attribute when none is supplied; often null for many attributes.

columns.name: MinValue
columns.description: Minimum numeric value allowed for the attribute (if applicable); nullable.

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value allowed for the attribute (if applicable); nullable.

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attribute is read-only in the UI or business flows.

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: 4-character mask controlling attribute visibility across contexts (e.g., '1100').

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional data-mart/reporting key associated with this attribute definition; nullable.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of reporting/data-mart table for this attribute; often null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for reporting or joins; nullable for most records.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Display or fill order for the attribute within the part definition; lower numbers appear earlier.

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum allowed length for the attribute value (characters) when applicable.

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: Name of a lookup table used to populate possible values for this attribute; usually null.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validation rules are enforced for this attribute.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag controlling whether keyphrase creation is enabled for this attribute.

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression or reference used to limit lookup values for the attribute; nullable.

columns.name: DDLLookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression specifically for drop-down list (DLL) lookups; typically null in sample data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: Decription
columns.description: Human readable description of the discount policy (note: column name contains a typo 'Decription').

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used for mapping or integration to a data model or external system.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external or dimensional table associated with DMKey for this policy.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key used for mapping or integration to an external system or dimension.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the discount policy item (row-level identifier).

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Reference to the parent discount policy (UdacDiscountPolicy.ID).

columns.name: RangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower bound of the range for which this discount item applies (inclusive).

columns.name: RangeUpLimit
columns.description: Upper bound of the range for which this discount item applies (inclusive).

columns.name: EnableLimit
columns.description: Indicator or threshold value that determines whether range limits are enforced for this item (implementation-specific integer flag or count).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed amount to discount for this item (monetary value).

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage discount to apply for this item (stored as numeric percent value).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used for mapping or integration to a data model or external system for this item.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/dimensional table associated with DMKey for this discount item.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key used for mapping or integration to an external system or dimension for this item.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the export template. Also a foreign key referencing dbo.Udac.ID.

columns.name: Template
columns.description: XML payload that defines the export/print template for a UDAC entry (contains <template> / <Entry> definitions and printed field specs).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream data mart or ETL processes. Nullable and often empty.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart or ETL target table associated with this template. Nullable; used for integration mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used by external systems or ETL to map this template record. Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the UdacKit record.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Identifier of the parent UDAC kit/bundle. Foreign key referencing dbo.Udac.ID; represents the kit that contains the member UDAC.

columns.name: MemberID
columns.description: Identifier of the UDAC that is a member of the kit. Foreign key referencing dbo.Udac.ID.

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the member UDAC is mandatory in the kit (true) or optional (false).

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Optional reference to a specific VersionSection (dbo.VersionSection.ID). Nullable; groups kit-members by versioned section.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data mart or ETL mappings. Typically null in source table.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target data-mart table for ETL/analytics purposes (e.g., 'DPSSBundleUdac'). Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for external mapping or ETL. Nullable in most records.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Numeric sort/order value used when filling or rendering kit members. Default 0 in sample data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this Udac part record.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent Udac (dbo.Udac.ID) to which this part belongs.

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Udac part definition (dbo.UdacPartDefinition.ID) that defines the type of this part.

columns.name: IsAddon
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this part is an add-on (true) or a core part (false).

columns.name: MinOccurence
columns.description: Minimum number of times this part may occur for the parent Udac (nullable).

columns.name: MaxOccurence
columns.description: Maximum number of times this part may occur for the parent Udac (nullable).

columns.name: PriceMode
columns.description: Integer code representing the pricing mode for this part (nullable). Possible values are defined by application logic.

columns.name: ContentAttributePermittedValues
columns.description: Serialized list or description of permitted values for a content attribute associated with this part (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data model numeric key used for integration with downstream systems (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/integration table associated with DMKey (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key version for external/integration mapping (nullable).

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Integer order used to determine display or fill sequence of parts; lower values appear first.

columns.name: ColumnNames
columns.description: Optional serialized list of column names associated with this part (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the Udac part definition.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code for the part definition (often used for lookup and compact displays).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the Udac part definition; primary label for this entity.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description explaining the part definition and its intended use.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this part definition record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user/system that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to this record (nullable).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user/system that last modified the record (nullable).

columns.name: SingleAppearance
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this part definition may appear only once (true) or multiple times (false).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used for integration with external data models; maps this definition to an external identifier.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/integration table that DMKey refers to (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key for external/integration mapping (nullable).

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Integer code indicating the editor type or UI widget used for this part definition in the application.

columns.name: UdacID

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Identifier of the role assigned to the UDAC. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key to dbo.Role.ID.

columns.name: DMKey

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the downstream data model table associated with this mapping. Nullable and sparsely populated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by a downstream data model. Nullable and currently not populated in sample data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the UDAC relationship record.

columns.name: SourceUdacID
columns.description: Identifier of the source UDAC in the relationship. Foreign key referencing dbo.Udac.ID.

columns.name: TargetUdacID
columns.description: Identifier of the target UDAC in the relationship. Foreign key referencing dbo.Udac.ID.

columns.name: RelationshipType
columns.description: Numeric code describing the type of relationship between the source and target UDACs (e.g., parent/child, association).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the relationship is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: InsertionDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the relationship record was created/inserted.

columns.name: DeactivationDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the relationship was deactivated. Null indicates the relationship has not been deactivated.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Description

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the unit record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the unit record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to the unit record (nullable).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the unit record (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the unit is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to ChannelType: categorizes the unit by channel type.

columns.name: LeftIndex

columns.name: RightIndex
columns.description: Nested-set right index for hierarchical ordering of units (used with LeftIndex).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data migration or legacy mapping.

columns.name: DMCharKey

columns.name: ID

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: User's given/first name (nullable).

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: User's family/last name — selected as the primary human-readable label for users.

columns.name: CreatedOn

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Account or user that created this user record (nullable).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to the user record (nullable).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Account or user that last modified this user record (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this user account is active.

columns.name: UnitID

columns.name: SalesCode

columns.name: IsUnitManager
columns.description: Indicates whether the user is marked as a manager for their unit.

columns.name: SalesTeleCode

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Free-text comments or notes about the user (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data migration or legacy system mapping (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: StopSales

columns.name: Phone

columns.name: Email

columns.name: IsPaused

columns.name: Timestamp

columns.name: PC

columns.name: IP

columns.name: Action

columns.name: User_Version

columns.name: DMKey

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that is being replaced. Typically refers to an existing keyword identifier in the source dataset.

attributes.description: Possible outcomes for the task (nullable)

attributes.name: Options
attributes.description: Serialized options for the task (nullable)

attributes.name: Initiator
attributes.description: Type that initiates the task (CLR type string, nullable)

attributes.name: DMKey
attributes.description: Optional external/DM integer key (nullable)

attributes.name: DMTable
attributes.description: Optional external/DM table name (nullable)

attributes.name: DMCharKey
attributes.description: Optional external/DM character key (nullable)

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates whether the task type is active

attributes.name: OutcomeExpression
attributes.description: Expression used to compute the task outcome (nullable)

attributes.name: Renderings
attributes.description: Rendering definitions (UI) for the task (nullable)

attributes.name: InVariableExpressions
attributes.description: Input variable expressions for the task (nullable)

attributes.name: OutVariableExpressions
attributes.description: Output variable expressions for the task (nullable)

attributes.name: MultiInstance
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the task type supports multi-instance execution (nullable)

attributes.name: Version
attributes.description: Version number for the task type

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate / natural identifier for the ticket type

attributes.name: ParentID
attributes.description: Reference to parent ticket type (self-join)

attributes.name: ParentDescription
attributes.description: Derived: description/name of the parent ticket type (from ParentID). Used for hierarchical drill-down display

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Human-readable name/description of the ticket type

attributes.name: IsSerial
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the ticket type is handled in serial flow

attributes.name: IsParallel
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the ticket type supports parallel handling

attributes.name: NeedsSupervisor
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether tasks of this type require supervisor approval

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicator if the ticket type is active (available for use)

attributes.name: SecretarySupervisorByPass
attributes.description: Flag for bypassing supervisor review when secretary acts

attributes.name: IsEditContractType
attributes.description: Flag indicating if contract type can be edited for this ticket type

attributes.name: IsEditAdvertisementType
attributes.description: Flag indicating if advertisement type can be edited for this ticket type

attributes.name: WebProductType
attributes.description: Web product category mapping (sparse, many nulls)

attributes.name: CanSellWebChanges
attributes.description: Permission flag: can sell web changes for this ticket type

attributes.name: IsCampaignLeadIdEditable
attributes.description: Flag indicating if campaign lead id is editable for this ticket type

attributes.name: SLA
attributes.description: Service level agreement value (all sampled rows are null)

attributes.name: DMKey
attributes.description: Data mart key mapping (sparse / not populated in samples)

attributes.name: DMTable
attributes.description: Data mart table name for DMKey (sparse)

attributes.name: DMCharKey
attributes.description: Character key mapping for data mart (sparse)

measures.name: BucketCount
measures.description: Number of campaign bucket rows (unique buckets)

measures.name: TotalAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount across buckets (monetary total per bucket)

measures.name: XOgrAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of XO.gr amounts (digital/XO channel spend)

measures.name: WebSiteAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of Website amounts (website channel spend)

measures.name: PPCAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of PPC amounts (paid search/ads spend)

measures.name: PrintAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of Print amounts (offline/print channel spend)

measures.name: TargetingAmountCalculated_Sum
measures.description: Sum of calculated targeting amounts (system-calculated suggested spend)

measures.name: TargetingAmountByUser_Sum
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts set by users (manual user-provided targeting spend)

measures.name: TargetingAmountCalculated_Avg
measures.description: Average calculated targeting amount per bucket

measures.name: ScoreTotal_Avg
measures.description: Average composite score assigned to buckets

measures.name: ScoreTotal_Min
measures.description: Minimum composite score among buckets

measures.name: ScoreTotal_Max
measures.description: Maximum composite score among buckets

measures.name: ScoreDifferenceToAvg_Avg
measures.description: Average difference of bucket score to campaign average (points)

measures.name: ModifiedRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsModified = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of buckets that have been modified (IsModified = true)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Count of distinct business points represented in the selected buckets

measures.name: UploadCount
measures.description: Total number of upload records (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctFileCount
measures.description: Number of distinct file names uploaded in the selected scope.

measures.name: ActiveUploaderCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who performed uploads in the selected scope.

measures.name: FirstUploadDate
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest upload in the selected scope.

measures.name: LastUploadDate
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent upload in the selected scope.

measures.name: AvgUploadsPerFile
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT FileName) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST(COUNT(ID) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT FileName) END
measures.description: Average number of upload rows per distinct file name (uploads / distinct files) in the selected scope.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the detail table

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the current filter context

measures.name: Files (Distinct)
measures.description: Number of distinct upload files represented in the current filter context

measures.name: Total Print Amount
measures.description: Sum of print spend/price (PrintAmount). Nulls ignored.

measures.name: Total PPC Amount
measures.description: Sum of PPC spend/price (PPCAmount). Nulls ignored.

measures.name: Total XOGR Amount
measures.description: Sum of XOGR (other) amount

measures.name: Total Website Amount
measures.description: Sum of website-related amount (WebSiteAmount)

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount — the aggregated total amount for each row (primary revenue/amount measure)

measures.name: Average Total Amount (per row)
measures.description: Average of TotalAmount across the current filter context

measures.name: Row Share of File Total (%)
measures.description: Each row's TotalAmount as a share of the TotalAmount for the same FileID (useful to see relative contribution within an upload file)

measures.name: Print Share of Total (%)
measures.description: Share of PrintAmount relative to TotalAmount in the current aggregation context

measures.name: PPC Share of Total (%)
measures.description: Share of PPCAmount relative to TotalAmount in the current aggregation context

measures.name: Website Share of Total (%)
measures.description: Share of WebSiteAmount relative to TotalAmount in the current aggregation context

measures.name: AssociationCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign-to-business-point association rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of unique business points represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: BusinessPointCountPerCampaign
measures.description: Count of business points for each campaign. Use when grouping by CampaignID (i.e., one row per Campaign).

measures.name: CampaignCountPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Count of campaigns associated with each business point. Use when grouping by BusinessPointID (i.e., one row per BusinessPoint).

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of rows (customer items) in the campaign dataset.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique business points (stores/outlets) targeted in the campaign.

measures.name: Distinct Brands
measures.description: Number of distinct business point brand names reported (nulls excluded).

measures.name: Action Count
measures.description: Number of recorded actions for campaign customer items (counts non-null Action values).

measures.name: Distinct Action Salesmen
measures.description: Number of different salespeople who recorded actions (ActionSalesmanID).

measures.name: First Action Date
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp recorded for the set (min of ActionDateTime).

measures.name: Last Action Date
measures.description: Most recent action timestamp recorded for the set (max of ActionDateTime).

measures.name: Days Since Last Action
measures.description: Number of days between the most recent action and today. Useful for recency reporting.

measures.name: Percent With Phone
measures.description: Share of records that include a phone number (non-null Phone) as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: Percent Missing Status
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Status IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows where Status is NULL. Helpful to detect missing status metadata.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows / assignments in this fact table (one row represents a customer/business point targeted by a campaign rule and assigned to a salesman).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (business points) targeted across the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmanCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen associated with the targeted customers in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctRuleCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerSalesman
measures.description: Average number of distinct customers (business points) per salesman. NULL if there are no salesmen in the scope.

measures.name: AssignmentsPerCustomerAvg
measures.description: Average number of assignment rows per distinct customer (useful to detect duplicates or multiple rules targeting same customer).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in this fact at the defined grain

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of unique business points represented in the filtered set

measures.name: Sum_SubrTotalAmountDiscount
measures.description: Sum of subscription total amount discounts for the campaign/market item

measures.name: Sum_NoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription total amount discounts

measures.name: Sum_RenewalTotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of renewal total amounts

measures.name: Avg_SubrTotalAmountDiscount_PerRecord
measures.description: Average subscription discount per record (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Count_Bundles
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records flagged as bundle

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of records with a payment refusal flag

measures.name: SealedCheckRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of records with sealed checks

measures.name: Avg_ActiveDays
measures.description: Average number of days between AdvBeginDateSubr and AdvEndDate (nulls ignored). Useful as a proxy for campaign exposure duration

measures.name: Count_SubscriptionBased
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records flagged as subscription-based CP

measures.name: Count_Renewable
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records flagged as renewable CP

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of source rows (records) in the pivot report

measures.name: NumberOfCases
measures.description: Total number of cases associated with the campaign pivot rows

measures.name: LossQuantity
measures.description: Sum of loss quantities recorded for the campaign pivot

measures.name: NewQuantity
measures.description: Sum of new quantities recorded for the campaign pivot

measures.name: COQuantity
measures.description: Sum of 'CO' quantities recorded for the campaign pivot

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Combined total of LossQuantity, NewQuantity and COQuantity

measures.name: LossQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) END
measures.description: Loss quantity as a percentage of NumberOfCases, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: NewQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(NewQuantity,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) END
measures.description: New quantity as a percentage of NumberOfCases, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: COQuantityPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(NumberOfCases,0)) END
measures.description: CO quantity as a percentage of NumberOfCases, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: ContractAmount
measures.description: Total contract amount associated with the pivot rows (currency assumed USD)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total subscription amount associated with the pivot rows (currency assumed USD)

measures.name: RenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amount associated with the pivot rows (currency assumed USD)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total non-subscription amount associated with the pivot rows (currency assumed USD)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Subscription amount as a percentage of total ContractAmount, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: RenewalAmountPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Renewal amount as a percentage of total ContractAmount, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage (calculated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Non-subscription amount as a percentage of total ContractAmount, computed from aggregated totals

measures.name: AvgStored_LossQuantityPercentage
measures.description: Average of the stored LossQuantityPercentage values (useful to compare with the calculated percentage)

measures.name: AvgStored_SubscriptionAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average of the stored SubscriptionAmountPercentage values (compare with the calculated percentage of amounts)

display.notes: Many percentage columns exist in-source; the model provides calculated percentages from aggregated totals for accuracy and comparison (look at AvgStored_* measures vs calculated measures). Amount measures assume USD; adjust currency if source differs.

measures.description: Number of rows in the report (useful for validation and completeness checks).

measures.name: NumberOfCustomers_Total
measures.description: Total number of customers covered by the campaign segments/sales assignments in the filtered set.

measures.name: NumberOfCustomers_AveragePerRow
measures.description: Average number of customers per report row (segment/salesman combination).

measures.name: TotalCoAmount
measures.description: Sum of 'Co' amounts (company amounts) across rows. Source column provided with currency hint USD.

measures.name: TotalRoCoAmount
measures.description: Sum of 'RoCo' amounts (possibly rounded or reconciled company amounts) across rows. Source column provided with currency hint USD.

measures.name: TotalNew
measures.description: Sum of 'New' amounts (new business) across rows. Source column provided with currency hint USD.

measures.name: AverageCoPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average Co amount per customer (TotalCoAmount divided by NumberOfCustomers). Null when there are no customers.

measures.name: AverageNewPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalNew) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average New amount per customer (TotalNew divided by NumberOfCustomers).

measures.name: RoCoToCoRatio
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCoAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalRoCoAmount) / SUM(TotalCoAmount) END
measures.description: Ratio of TotalRoCoAmount to TotalCoAmount expressed as a percentage. Shows reconciliation/adjustment factor between RoCo and Co amounts.

foreign_keys.note: Explicit foreign key provided in source metadata.
Inferred relationship by naming convention; validate existence in source model before enforcing.

default_filters.note: Exclude rows with no target defined by default to surface populated records.
Ensure results are tied to a parent history record.

measures.name: Total Customers (derived)
measures.expression: SUM(LossCustomers) + SUM(ΙncreaseCustomers) + SUM(ReductionCustomers) + SUM(NoChangesCustomers) + SUM(ROCOCustomers) + SUM(NewCustomers) + SUM(CICustomers)
measures.description: Derived total customers across all customer-change categories (sums the category columns). Use with care — verify categories are mutually exclusive.

measures.name: Total Amount (derived)
measures.expression: SUM(LossAmount) + SUM(ΙncreaseAmount) + SUM(ReductionAmount) + SUM(NoChangesAmount) + SUM(ROCOAmount) + SUM(NewAmount) + SUM(CIAmount)
measures.description: Derived total monetary amount across all amount categories (sums category amount columns). Excludes CO-specific AmountOfCO unless explicitly required.

measures.description: Total working days represented in the data

measures.name: Salesmen Count
measures.description: Total number of salesmen for the records

measures.name: Mandays
measures.description: Total mandays

measures.name: Number Of Visits Total
measures.description: Total number of visits (aggregate metric)

measures.name: Number Of CO Visits Total
measures.description: Total number of CO visits (aggregate metric)

measures.name: Number Of Visits New
measures.description: Total number of visits for new customers

measures.name: TotalItems
measures.description: Total number of target group items (rows) in the table.

measures.name: UniqueCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (by CustomerName) represented in the target group.

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by BusinessPointID.

measures.name: PaymentRefusals
measures.description: Count of items where a payment was refused.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.description: Share of target items that have a payment refusal (PaymentRefusal / TotalItems).

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.description: Count of items marked as disappeared.

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.description: Count of items flagged with a sealed check.

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount
measures.description: Count of items flagged as precariousness (legal).

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.description: Count of items with continuous payment refusal.

measures.name: ReliabilityRedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where ReliabilityStatus is 'RED'.

measures.name: AddressCompletenessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of items that have both StreetName and StreetNumber populated.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of rows (target group item value records)

measures.name: Sum Target Value
measures.description: Total target value allocated for the target group item (numeric measure aggregated across rows).

measures.name: Average Target Value
measures.description: Average target value per record.

measures.name: Sum Channel Target Value
measures.description: Total of channel-level target values.

measures.name: Sum User Target Value
measures.description: Total of user-level target values.

measures.name: Requested Discount Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of requested discount amounts (monetary). Currency assumed EUR — verify with source system.

measures.name: Average Requested Discount % (avg)
measures.description: Average requested discount percentage across records.

measures.name: Sum Fix Offer Difference
measures.description: Aggregate difference value for fixed offers (monetary).

measures.name: Total Visits
measures.description: Total number of visits recorded across these records.

measures.name: Total Loss Printed (new)
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values (business-specific integer counter).

measures.name: Distinct Target Users
measures.description: Number of distinct target users referenced in the fact.

measures.name: Released Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as released.

measures.name: Closed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsClosed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as closed.

measures.name: Target Values Need Refresh Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetValuesNeedRefresh = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where target values are flagged to be refreshed.

measures.name: BP Identity Confirmed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where BP identity was confirmed.

measures.name: Percent Released
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of records that are released out of total records in the current filter/context.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of target group item rows (useful for aggregates and validation).

measures.name: BalanceValue
measures.description: Current balance value for the target group item.

measures.name: DueBalanceValue
measures.description: Amount of balance that is due.

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue
measures.description: Balance value designated for settlement.

measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PBD contracts value aggregated across years Y01..Y12 (print/brand/display contracts).

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PAD contracts value aggregated across years Y01..Y12 (advertising PAD values).

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IBD contracts value aggregated across years Y01..Y12 (internet/business directory B-type).

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue (Y01..Y12)
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IAD contracts value aggregated across years Y01..Y12 (internet/ad related IAD values).

measures.name: TotalAllContractsValue
measures.expression: (SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue))
measures.description: Sum of all contract values across PBD, PAD, IBD and IAD for years Y01..Y12.

measures.name: ExpirationValueInternet
measures.description: Total expiration value from internet-related contracts.

measures.name: SubscriptionValue
measures.description: Total subscription value for the target group item.

measures.name: CancelAmount
measures.description: Total amount canceled.

measures.name: CancelContract
measures.description: Sum of canceled contract values.

measures.name: CreditInvoiceValue
measures.description: Total value of credit invoices associated with the item.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleValue
measures.description: Value of exchange sales for the item.

measures.name: PrintPreprintedValue
measures.description: Value of print preprinted items.

measures.name: InternetPreprintedValue
measures.description: Value of internet preprinted items.

measures.name: MultimediaPreprintedValue
measures.description: Value of multimedia preprinted items.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Total preprinted value (print + internet + multimedia where applicable).

measures.name: TotalEntries (Y01 + Y02)
measures.description: Total number of entries across Y01 and Y02 (useful for simple activity counts).

measures.name: TotalDirectoriesSections (Y01 + Y02)
measures.description: Total number of directories/sections across Y01 and Y02.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of rows (target group item assignments) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctContractProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct ContractProductIDs represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItemValues
measures.description: Number of distinct target group item values represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: AveragePeriod
measures.description: Average Period value for the rows in the current filter context. Period is typically 1-12.

measures.name: MinPeriod
measures.description: Minimum Period value present in the current filter context.

measures.name: MaxPeriod
measures.description: Maximum Period value present in the current filter context.

measures.name: ItemsPerContractProduct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ContractProductID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT ContractProductID) END
measures.description: Average number of target group item rows per distinct contract product in the current filter context.

measures.name: PctOfItems
measures.description: Share of items represented by the current grouping relative to the overall selection (works in analytical engines that support windowed SUM over the full set).

display.notes: DMKey / DMTable / DMCharKey are currently nullable and unused in samples. Join to dbo.ContractProduct and dbo.TargetGroupItemInfo for descriptive attributes (product name, target group labels).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of collected amounts for the collection records (amount values appear with 3 decimal precision in source; formatted to 2 decimals for reporting). Currency assumed EUR based on source locale.

measures.name: CollectionsCount
measures.description: Number of collection transactions (rows) in this fact.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerCollection
measures.description: Average collected amount per collection record.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest single collected amount in the selected set.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest single collected amount in the selected set.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the selected collections.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceipts
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers in the selected set.

measures.name: PendingERPTransferCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of collections that have not been transferred to ERP (TransferDateToERP is NULL).

measures.name: ERPTransferredCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of collections that have been transferred to ERP (TransferDateToERP is not NULL).

measures.name: ERPTransferRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of collections that have been transferred to ERP. Calculated as transferred_count / total_collections.

measures.name: CollectionsWithBlockInfoCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BlockSeries IS NOT NULL AND BlockReceiptNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of collections that include block series and block receipt number (both non-null).

measures.name: DistinctBlockReceipts
measures.description: Count of distinct block-series + block-receipt combinations (treats NULLs as empty string). Useful to detect unique receipt identifiers issued.

measures.name: AverageCollectionsPerBusinessPoint
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID),0) END
measures.description: Average number of collections per business point in the current context (total collections divided by distinct business points).

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Total number of contract records (row count).

measures.name: Signed Contracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a SignedDate (i.e., signed).

measures.name: Total Final Price
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice across contracts. Nulls are ignored — represents gross contracted revenue captured in this table.

measures.name: Average Final Price
measures.description: Average FinalPrice per contract (ignores contracts with NULL FinalPrice).

measures.name: Total User Discount Amount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by users on contracts.

measures.name: Average User Discount Percent
measures.description: Average of UserDiscountPercent across contracts (expressed as a percentage, e.g., 5.0 = 5%).

measures.name: Total PPC Discount (UserDiscountAmountPPC)
measures.description: Sum of PPC-specific user discounts (monetary), stored with 4 decimal precision in source.

measures.name: Subscription Contracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Contracts Cancelled
