measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that have a cancellation date (CancelledOn).

measures.name: Average Days to Release
measures.description: Average number of days between contract creation (CreatedOn) and ReleaseDate. Null ReleaseDate rows are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Average Days to EBS Transfer
measures.description: Average days between creation and transfer to EBS (TransferDateToEBS). Useful to track operational latency; TransferDateToEBS nulls are excluded.

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract product rows (records)

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented by these contract products

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of product quantities across contract products

measures.name: TotalListPrice
measures.description: Total list price (unit price multiplied by quantity) before discounts

measures.name: AverageUnitPrice
measures.description: Average unit price of products on contract products

measures.name: TotalDiscounts
measures.description: Combined sum of explicit discounts and discount components applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalNetRevenue
measures.expression: SUM((Price * Quantity) - (Discount + RulesDiscount) - COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) - COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) - COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0))
measures.description: Net revenue after subtracting known discount components from list price

measures.name: AverageDiscountPct
measures.expression: SUM(Discount + RulesDiscount + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0)) / NULLIF(SUM(Price * Quantity),0)
measures.description: Average discount as a percentage of list price (total discounts divided by total list price)

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts (adjustments) applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts associated with contract products

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees associated with contract products

measures.name: TotalActualSpentBudget
measures.description: Sum of actual spent budget values recorded on contract products

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products flagged as subscription-based

measures.name: SubscriptionPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products marked as renewed

measures.name: RenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products marked as renewable

measures.name: InterruptedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInterruptedFromCRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products flagged as interrupted from CRM

measures.name: CancelledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract products that have a cancellation date

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Total number of relationship rows. Each row represents a relationship between a source Contract and a RelatedContract.

measures.name: DistinctSourceContracts
measures.description: Number of unique source contracts that have at least one related contract.

measures.name: DistinctRelatedContracts
measures.description: Number of unique contracts that appear as a related contract.

measures.name: DistinctRelationshipPairs
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(CAST(ContractID AS NVARCHAR(100)), '-', CAST(RelatedContractID AS NVARCHAR(100))))
measures.description: Number of unique (ContractID, RelatedContractID) pairs. Useful to detect duplicates where multiple rows represent the same pair.

measures.name: AvgRelatedPerContract
measures.description: Average number of related-contract rows per source contract.

measures.name: UniqueRelatedToSourceRatio
measures.description: Ratio of unique related contracts to unique source contracts (expressed as a percentage). Values above 100% indicate more unique related contracts than source contracts in the filtered scope.

recommended_visualizations.description: Summary of relationship counts and averages by type.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of product rows in the production case product table (each row represents a product entry on a case).

measures.name: DistinctPricelistItems
measures.description: Number of distinct pricelist items represented in the current scope.

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases represented in the current scope.

measures.name: ProductsPerCase_Avg
measures.description: Average number of product rows per case (RowCount divided by number of distinct cases). NULL when there are no cases in scope.

measures.name: MappedToDimension_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of product rows that have a data-mart/dimension mapping (either DMKey or DMCharKey populated).

measures.name: MappedToDimension_Percentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of product rows that are mapped to a data-mart/dimension (DMKey or DMCharKey present).

measures.name: Item Count
measures.description: Number of pricelist items (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Product Count
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by these pricelist items.

measures.name: Distinct VersionSection Count
measures.description: Number of distinct version sections represented in this set of pricelist items.

measures.name: Applied To Section Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of pricelist items that apply to the whole section (ApplyToSection = true).

measures.name: Applied To SubSection Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSubSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of pricelist items that apply to subsections (ApplyToSubSection = true).

measures.name: Active Item Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 0 OR IsInactive IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items considered active. Null values in IsInactive are treated as active.

measures.name: Inactive Item Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items explicitly marked inactive (IsInactive = true).

measures.name: Percent Active
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 0 OR IsInactive IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of items that are active (Active Item Count / Item Count). Null IsInactive values treated as active.

measures.name: Percent Applied To Section
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of items that apply to the whole section.

measures.name: Percent Applied To SubSection
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSubSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of items that apply to subsections.

default_filters.description: By default include items that are active. Null IsInactive values are treated as active.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of pricelist item detail rows

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by these pricelist item details

measures.name: SumUnitAmount
measures.description: Sum of the UnitAmount values for these pricelist item details. Currency is defined at the pricelist level and not stored on this row.

measures.name: AvgUnitAmount
measures.description: Average UnitAmount across these pricelist item detail rows

measures.name: MinUnitAmount
measures.description: Minimum UnitAmount observed in the set

measures.name: MaxUnitAmount
measures.description: Maximum UnitAmount observed in the set

measures.name: RowsWithComplexPrice
measures.description: Number of rows that have a non-empty ComplexPrice value

measures.name: PctWithComplexPrice
measures.description: Share of rows that include a ComplexPrice (Complex pricing rules) relative to total rows

measures.name: RowsWithAllowableQuantities
measures.description: Number of rows that specify AllowableQuantities (typically non-null when quantity-based pricing applies)

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of price ranges (records) in this table

measures.name: DistinctPriceListItemCount
measures.description: Number of distinct price list item details represented by these ranges

measures.name: OneTimeAmountTotal
measures.description: Total one-time amount across all price ranges

measures.name: OneTimeAmountAverage
measures.description: Average one-time amount per price range

measures.name: OneTimeAmountMin
measures.description: Minimum one-time amount across ranges

measures.name: OneTimeAmountMax
measures.description: Maximum one-time amount across ranges

measures.name: AverageExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Average extra fee percentage applied for ranges

measures.name: MinExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Minimum extra fee percentage in the dataset

measures.name: MaxExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Maximum extra fee percentage in the dataset

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Lowest starting price (PriceFrom) across ranges

measures.name: MaxPriceFrom
measures.description: Highest starting price (PriceFrom) across ranges

measures.name: MinPriceTo
measures.description: Minimum upper bound (PriceTo) across ranges (excludes NULLs)

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Maximum upper bound (PriceTo) across ranges (excludes NULLs)

measures.name: AverageRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN PriceTo - PriceFrom ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average width of closed price ranges (PriceTo - PriceFrom). Open-ended ranges (PriceTo IS NULL) are excluded from this average

measures.name: OpenEndedRangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of ranges that are open-ended (PriceTo is NULL)

measures.name: OpenEndedRangePct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of ranges that are open-ended (PriceTo is NULL)

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment-method records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: TotalInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with the payment-method records.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types used.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentPhones
measures.description: Count of distinct payment phone references used (nullable field — excludes nulls).

measures.name: AverageInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment-method record.

measures.name: AverageInterval
measures.description: Average interval value per payment-method record (domain-specific interval unit).

measures.name: PreInvoiceRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payment-method records that are marked as pre-invoices.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of payment-method records that are exchange sales.

measures.name: CreditCardUsageCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardTypeID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment-method records that reference a credit card type (credit card payments).

measures.name: BankPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment-method records associated with a bank reference (bank/check/bank deposit).

measures.name: SalesCollectionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SalesCollectionID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment-method records linked to a sales collection record.

measures.name: LatestPaymentMonth
measures.description: Most recent PaymentMonth value observed for the selected slice.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of membership/assignment rows linking invoice payment methods to sales collections. Each row represents one association between an InvoicePaymentMethod and a SalesCollection.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollectionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct SalesCollection entities referenced by these associations.

measures.name: DistinctInvoicePaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of distinct InvoicePaymentMethod entities referenced by these associations.

measures.name: Total Working Days
measures.description: Sum of working days for the sales person in the campaign period

measures.name: Total Visits
measures.description: Total number of visits recorded (sum of TotalVisits)

measures.name: CO Visits
measures.description: Sum of COVisits (context-specific visit category)

measures.name: New Visits
measures.description: Sum of NewVisits (visits identified as new)

measures.name: Total Customers
measures.description: Total customers aggregated for the sales person in the campaign

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Aggregate monetary amount (TotalAmount) across the grain

measures.name: CO Customers
measures.description: Count of CO customers (category-specific customer count)

measures.name: CO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount for CO customers (COAmount)

measures.name: New Customers
measures.description: Count of new customers acquired during the campaign

measures.name: New Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount attributable to new customers

measures.name: Loss Customers
measures.description: Count of customers lost during the campaign period

measures.name: Loss Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with lost customers

measures.name: Increase Customers
measures.description: Count of customers with increased activity/value

measures.name: Increase Amount
measures.description: Amount representing increases in customer value

measures.name: Reduction Customers
measures.description: Count of customers with reduced activity/value

measures.name: Reduction Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount representing reductions in customer value

measures.name: No Changes Customers
measures.description: Count of customers with no change in activity/value

measures.name: No Changes Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount for customers with no change

measures.name: ROCO Customers
measures.description: Count of ROCO customers (campaign-specific category)

measures.name: ROCO Amount
measures.description: Amount associated with ROCO customers

measures.name: Net Customer Change
measures.description: Net change in customer count (increase minus reductions and losses)

measures.name: Average Amount per Customer
measures.description: Average monetary amount per customer (TotalAmount / TotalCustomers)

measures.name: Average Visits per Working Day
measures.description: Average number of visits per working day

measures.name: New Customer Share
measures.description: Share of new customers as a percentage of total customers

measures.name: Loss Rate
measures.description: Percentage of customers lost relative to total customers

measures.name: CO Customer Share
measures.description: Share of CO customers relative to total customers

measures.name: ROCO Rate
measures.description: ROCO customers as a percentage of total customers

measures.name: New Customer Conversion per Visit
measures.description: New customers divided by visits — conversion rate from visit to new customer

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Total number of tickets (row count)

measures.name: Completed Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a completion timestamp

measures.name: Open Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that do not have a completion timestamp (still open)

measures.name: Percent Completed
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of tickets that are completed (CompletedOn not null)

measures.name: Average Resolution Time (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average time from ticket creation (CreatedOn) to completion (CompletedOn), in days. Tickets without CompletedOn are excluded.

measures.name: Median Resolution Time (days) - approx
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Approximate median resolution time in days (requires DB support for percentile functions). Excludes tickets without CompletedOn.

measures.name: Average Time to Receive (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ReceivedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, ReceivedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average time between CreatedOn and ReceivedOn in hours for tickets where ReceivedOn is populated.

measures.name: NeedEval Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as requiring evaluation

measures.name: NeedSupervisor Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as requiring a supervisor

measures.name: NeedCancelContractEval Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedCancelContractEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged for contract cancellation evaluation

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of ticket task result records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Tickets
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in the result set.

measures.name: Distinct Performers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who performed tasks (PerformedByID).

measures.name: Successful Results
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results marked as successful (Result = 1).

measures.name: Success Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that are successful (Result = 1) out of all results.

measures.name: Pending Review Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingReview = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results that are flagged as pending review.

measures.name: Customer-Reported Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that were initiated/marked by the customer (ResultCustomer = 1).

measures.name: Communication Recorded Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that have a communication flag (ResultComm = 1).

measures.name: Communication Date Availability Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCommDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of results that have a non-null ResultCommDate. Note: this column is sparsely populated (high null rate).

measures.name: Average Time to Communication (hours)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in hours between when the task was performed (PerformedOn) and when a communication was recorded (ResultCommDate). Computation ignores rows where either timestamp is null; ResultCommDate has high null rate.

measures.name: Average Tasks per Ticket
measures.description: Average number of task-result records per ticket in the result set.

measures.name: Earliest PerformedOn
measures.description: Earliest task performed timestamp in the filtered result set.

measures.name: Latest PerformedOn
measures.description: Most recent task performed timestamp in the filtered result set.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of ticket-advertisement history records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctTickets
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets associated with history records.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced by history records.

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks linked to these history records.

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of history records where work was performed in production.

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionPercent
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), COUNT(*))
measures.description: Share of records for which work was performed in production (WorkDoneInProductionCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: AvgRecordsPerTicket
measures.description: Average number of history records per ticket (useful to understand how many advertisements/tasks are recorded per ticket).

measures.name: Total Tasks
measures.description: Total number of task records (one row per task)

measures.name: Open Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have not been completed (CompletedOn is NULL)

measures.name: Completed Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not NULL)

measures.name: Task Completion Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (Completed Tasks / Total Tasks)

measures.name: Average Completion Time (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn in hours (excludes tasks not yet completed)

measures.name: Median Completion Time (hours)
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) / 3600.0
measures.description: Median elapsed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn in hours (excludes tasks not yet completed). Uses continuous percentile calculation.

measures.name: Completed Within 24 Hours (count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(HOUR, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) <= 24 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks completed within 24 hours of being created

measures.name: Completed Within 24 Hours (rate)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(HOUR, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) <= 24 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Share of tasks completed within 24 hours of creation (CompletedWithin24Hours / Total Tasks)

measures.name: LogCount
measures.description: Number of log entries (rows) in the TaskLog fact.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the selected set of log entries.

measures.name: AverageLogsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of log entries per task. NULL when there are no tasks in the filter context.

measures.name: UniqueOutcomeCount
measures.description: Count of distinct outcome values recorded in TaskLog (excludes NULL).

measures.name: OutcomePresentCount
measures.description: Number of log entries with a non-null Outcome.

measures.name: OutcomeRate
measures.description: Share of log entries that have a recorded Outcome (non-null) as a percentage of total logs.

measures.name: TextPresentCount
measures.description: Number of log entries that contain non-null Text.

measures.name: EarliestLogTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest Timestamp value among the selected log entries.

measures.name: LatestLogTimestamp
measures.description: Latest Timestamp value among the selected log entries.

measures.name: AverageTimeToOutcomeDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN OutcomeDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, Timestamp, OutcomeDate) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time in days from the log Timestamp to the OutcomeDate. Returns NULL when OutcomeDate is not populated.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of assignment rows (one row per assignment).

measures.name: Distinct Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one assignment.

measures.name: Distinct Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users referenced by assignments (excludes null UserID).

measures.name: Assignments with User
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments that are associated with a non-null UserID.

measures.name: Assignments with Role
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RoleID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments that are associated with a non-null RoleID.

measures.name: Distinct DMKey
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values referenced by assignments (useful for linking to the data-mart table).

measures.name: Percent Assigned to User
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of assignments that are assigned to a user (non-null UserID).

measures.name: Average Assignments per Task
measures.description: Average number of assignment rows per distinct task.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of task-to-target-case assignment rows

measures.name: Distinct Task Count
measures.description: Number of unique tasks represented in this table

measures.name: Distinct Target Case Count
measures.description: Number of unique target cases represented in this table

measures.name: Unmapped Rows (DM missing)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NULL AND DMTable IS NULL AND DMCharKey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have no dimension mapping information (DMKey, DMTable and DMCharKey all null). Useful to identify unmapped assignments.

measures.name: Unmapped Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NULL AND DMTable IS NULL AND DMCharKey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows that are unmapped (DM fields all null) as a percentage of total rows

display.notes: This is a link/bridge table between tasks and target cases. DMKey/DMTable/DMCharKey appear to be unused (always null) in the sampled data; use the Unmapped measures to monitor mapping coverage.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of action log rows (each row represents one recorded action on a task).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have one or more actions recorded in the log.

measures.name: ActionsPerTaskAvg
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per task (total actions divided by number of distinct tasks).

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp for the aggregation window.

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Latest action timestamp for the aggregation window.

measures.name: ActionType1Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions recorded with Action = 1.

measures.name: ActionType2Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions recorded with Action = 2 (if present).

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Total number of case records (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Open Cases
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have not been completed (CompletedOn is null).

measures.name: Completed Cases
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of cases that are completed out of total cases in the filter context.

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in days from CreatedOn to CompletedOn for completed cases. Excludes cases without CompletedOn.

measures.name: Total Time to Complete (days)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Aggregate elapsed time in days for all completed cases (sum of durations CreatedOn→CompletedOn).

measures.name: Average Age of Open Cases (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, GETUTCDATE()) / 86400.0 END)
measures.description: Average number of days open for cases that are not yet completed (measured from CreatedOn to current UTC time).

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique PointCode values represented in the current filter context (distinct business/service points).

measures.name: Attachment Count
measures.description: Total number of attachment records

measures.name: Distinct Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have one or more attachments

measures.name: Deleted Attachment Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments marked as deleted

measures.name: Percent Deleted
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of attachments that are marked deleted (of total attachments)

measures.name: Last-Version Attachment Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsLast = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments flagged as the latest version (IsLast = true)

measures.name: Average Attachments per Case
measures.description: Average number of attachments per case (total attachments divided by distinct cases)

measures.name: Unique FileName Count
measures.description: Number of distinct stored file paths (FileName)

measures.name: External Managed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments with an external/DM key (managed externally)

measures.name: Recent Attachments (30d)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments created in the last 30 days (rolling)

measures.name: Most Recent Attachment Date
measures.description: The most recent CreatedOn timestamp among the attachments

measures.name: Earliest Attachment Date
measures.description: The earliest CreatedOn timestamp among the attachments

measures.name: Comment Count
measures.description: Total number of comment records (one row per comment).

measures.name: Distinct Cases with Comments
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have at least one comment.

measures.name: Comments per Case (avg)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of comments per case (total comments divided by distinct cases).

measures.name: Comments Linked to Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of comments that are associated with a Task (TaskID is not null).

measures.name: Percent Comments Linked to Tasks
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of comments that are linked to a task.

measures.name: Average Comment Length (chars)
measures.description: Average length of the comment text measured in characters.

measures.name: Max Comment Length (chars)
measures.description: Maximum comment text length (characters) observed.

measures.name: Min Comment Length (chars)
measures.description: Minimum comment text length (characters) observed.

measures.name: Comments by CommentType
measures.description: Count of comments; intended to be used with CommentType as a breakdown/filter to get counts per type.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer task records (row count).

measures.name: PendingImportCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks marked as pending import.

measures.name: PendingImportPercent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of tasks that are pending import.

measures.name: PermitCallCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks where calling is permitted.

measures.name: RequiresSynchronizationCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks flagged as requiring synchronization.

measures.name: NotFoundCount
measures.description: Sum of the NotFound field (counts of not-found occurrences).

measures.name: NotFoundRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NotFound > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks where NotFound is greater than zero.

measures.name: DistinctDialerCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct dialer campaigns referenced by these tasks (nulls excluded).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceLastSync
measures.description: Average number of days between LastSynchDate and today (nulls excluded from the average).

measures.name: MinLastSynchDate
measures.description: Earliest LastSynchDate for the filtered set of tasks.

measures.name: MaxExportDate
measures.description: Most recent export date across the tasks.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceExport
measures.description: Average number of days since the ExportDate (nulls excluded).

default_filters.description: Show tasks synchronized within the last 12 months by default.

measures.name: RequestCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer request log entries (rows).

measures.name: DistinctUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who appear in the log. Null UserID values are excluded from the count.

measures.name: StatusZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of entries where Status = 0. (Commonly used to represent a successful/completed status in many systems; confirm mapping with application owners.)

measures.name: StatusNonZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of entries where Status is not zero (often indicates failures, errors, or non-standard outcomes).

measures.name: FailureRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of requests with non-zero Status (possible failures). Interpreting 'failure' requires validating status codes with domain owners.

measures.name: EntriesPerUserAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT UserID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT UserID) END
measures.description: Average number of log entries per distinct user (useful to detect heavy users or bots).

display.notes: Validate integer Status code semantics with application owners to create explicit status dimension or replace StatusZero/NonZero measures with semantically named measures (e.g., SuccessCount, ErrorCount). Consider adding a foreign-key to a Users dimension if one exists.

measures.name: TotalResults
measures.description: Total number of search result rows (records returned by the search).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointId values represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessUniqueIds
measures.description: Count of distinct business unique identifiers (BusinessUniqueId) found in responses.

measures.name: CurrentResults
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results flagged as current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: PercentCurrentResults
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of results that are current (IsCurrent) as a percentage of total results.

measures.name: ResultsWithPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results that include an international phone number.

measures.name: ResultsWithNationalPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(NationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results that include a national phone number.

measures.name: ResultsWithMultipleBusinessPoints
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results marked as having multiple business points.

measures.name: AvgRating
measures.description: Average place rating extracted from the Response JSON (JSON path $.rating). Nulls ignored when rating not present or not numeric.

measures.name: AvgUserRatingCount
measures.description: Average number of user ratings per place as reported in the Response JSON (JSON path $.userRatingCount).

measures.name: AvgCompletenessRatio
measures.expression: AVG( CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) > 0 THEN TRY_CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)-1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)+1, 10) AS FLOAT), 0) ELSE NULL END )
measures.description: Average completeness ratio parsed from CompletenessScore (e.g. '8/9' -> 8/9). Returned as fraction of 1 and presented as a percentage.

display.notes: Response is a JSON blob. Measures that extract rating and userRatingCount use JSON_VALUE and may return null when fields are absent or malformed. CompletenessScore is parsed from a 'N/M' pattern; rows that don't match are ignored for that measure.

measures.name: SearchCount
measures.description: Total number of individual search records (one row per search).

measures.name: DistinctSearchTextCount
measures.description: Number of unique search texts entered in the dataset.

measures.name: TotalResults
measures.description: Total number of results returned across all searches (sum of ResultsCount).

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MedianResultsPerSearch
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ResultsCount) OVER ()
measures.description: Median (50th percentile) of results returned per search. Implementation uses DB percentile function and may be approximate depending on SQL dialect.

measures.name: MaxResultsPerSearch
measures.description: The largest ResultsCount value observed for a single search.

measures.name: MinResultsPerSearch
measures.description: The smallest ResultsCount value observed for a single search.

default_filters.description: Only include the single recorded Type value (dataset contains only Type = 1).
Exclude any negative or invalid result counts (defensive filter).

measures.name: Run Count
measures.description: Total number of batch runs (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Completed Runs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of batch runs that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn).

measures.name: Pending Runs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of batch runs that have not completed (CompletedOn is null).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of runs that have completed (CompletedOn present) expressed as a percentage of all runs.

measures.name: Average Completion Time (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END) / 3600.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time from ScheduledOn to CompletedOn for runs that have completed, expressed in hours. Nulls are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Total Completion Time (hours)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END) / 3600.0
measures.description: Sum of elapsed time from ScheduledOn to CompletedOn across all completed runs, expressed in hours.

measures.name: High Priority Runs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Priority = 1000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs marked with the high-priority code (1000).

display.notes: Use Status and BatchSearchId as primary breakdowns for operational dashboards. ScheduledOn/CompletedOn are useful as date hierarchies (year/month/day).

measures.name: TotalBatches
measures.description: Total number of batch search definitions (rows) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctBatchNames
measures.description: Number of distinct batch search names.

measures.name: ActiveBatches
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches with Status = 1 (interpreted as active).

measures.name: InactiveBatches
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches with Status not equal to 1 (interpreted as inactive).

measures.name: ScheduledBatches
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Times IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches that have scheduling details (Times is not null).

measures.name: PctScheduled
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Times IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of batches that are scheduled (have Times defined) out of total batches.

measures.name: TotalTimes
measures.description: Sum of the Times values across all batches. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: AverageTimesPerScheduledBatch
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Times IS NOT NULL THEN Times END)
measures.description: Average Times value calculated only for batches that have Times defined.

measures.name: TotalFrequency
measures.description: Sum of Frequence values across all batches. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: AverageFrequency
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Frequence IS NOT NULL THEN Frequence END)
measures.description: Average Frequence value calculated only for batches that have Frequence defined.

measures.name: ExecutionType_ScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches where ExecutionType = 1 (interpreted as one execution type; use ExecutionType breakdown for other values).

measures.name: FirstCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp in the dataset.

measures.name: LastCreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent CreatedOn timestamp in the dataset.

measures.name: MaxNameLength
measures.description: Maximum length (in characters) of the Name column values.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount for receipts (sum of Amount). Amount stored in local currency (assumed EUR).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the buffer.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(SystemReceiptID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(SystemReceiptID) END
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.description: Number of receipts that have a bank deposit number (non-null BankDepositNumber).

measures.name: CreditCardReceiptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts paid with a credit card (non-null CreditCardNumber).

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Distinct customer codes represented in the current result set.

measures.name: TotalErrors
measures.description: Total number of post-check error records in the table.

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches (BatchID) that contain one or more error records.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes observed in the dataset.

measures.name: ErrorsWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of error records that include non-null XML payload in EntityData.

measures.name: PercentWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of error records that include EntityData (EntityData not null) as a percentage of all errors.

measures.name: AvgErrorsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of errors per batch (total errors divided by number of distinct batches).

measures.name: EarliestErrorDate
measures.description: Earliest ErrorDate found in the filtered result set.

measures.name: LatestErrorDate
measures.description: Latest ErrorDate found in the filtered result set.

measures.name: ErrorsByTypePercent
measures.description: When broken down by ErrorType, this measure yields the percent of total errors represented by each ErrorType. Implemented as the count for the current partition divided by the overall count.

default_filters.description: Show errors from the last 90 days by default (relative filter).

measures.name: OperationsExecuted
measures.description: Number of recorded bridge operations (one row per operation).

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Total number of rows affected by all recorded operations.

measures.name: AverageRowsAffectedPerOperation
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per operation (ignores operations with NULL RowsAffected).

measures.name: DistinctOperationCount
measures.description: Number of distinct operation types observed in the history.

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds
measures.description: Average duration in seconds between operation start (TimeStamp) and completion (CompletedOn). NULL CompletedOn values are excluded.

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of operations marked as successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: FailedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of operations not marked as successful (Status not equal to 1).

foreign_keys.note: Inferred likely batch table — verify existence before enabling foreign key relationship.

measures.name: Total Net Amount
measures.description: Sum of NetAmount for the contract line rows (base revenue value before adjustments).

measures.name: Total Advanced Payment
measures.description: Total advanced payments applied to these contract lines.

measures.name: Total Altered Amount
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount (manual adjustments). Nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: Total Billed Amount (Net + Altered)
measures.description: Combined billed amount summing NetAmount and any AlteredAmount adjustments.

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of bridge buffer rows (contract line records).

measures.name: Distinct Advertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced by these contract lines.

measures.name: Total Invoices (Quantity)
measures.description: Sum of InvoiceQuantity across rows — total number of invoices implied by the lines.

measures.name: Average Net per Invoice
measures.description: Average NetAmount per invoice (total net divided by total invoice quantity). Returns NULL when total invoices = 0.

measures.name: Average Net per Installment
measures.description: Average NetAmount allocated to each installment (total net divided by total number of installments). NULL if denominator is 0.

measures.name: Renewable Lines
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of lines flagged as renewable.

measures.name: Average Contract Duration (days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate. Rows with NULL dates are excluded by typical SQL semantics.

measures.name: Contracts
measures.description: Number of contract records (one row per ContractID). Useful as the baseline row-count for this fact/bridge.

measures.name: DistinctBillingCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct billing customers referenced by contracts in the current filter context.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmount Total
measures.description: Total amount of contract alterations. Nulls are ignored; use with care because column has high null rate.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmount Average
measures.description: Average altered amount per contract where an alteration amount exists.

measures.name: Contracts With Alterations
measures.description: Count of contracts that have a non-null ContractAlteredAmount (i.e., contracts with recorded alterations).

measures.name: PctContractsWithAlterations
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ContractID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ContractAlteredAmount)*1.0/COUNT(ContractID) END
measures.description: Share of contracts that have a recorded alteration amount. Computed as Contracts With Alterations / Total Contracts.

measures.name: AverageDaysBetweenSignedAndLastModified
measures.description: Average number of days between SignedDate and LastModifiedDate. Null SignedDate values are excluded from the calculation.

foreign_keys.description: Owner company for the contract (single company observed in the sample).
Primary billing customer for the contract.
Billing customer reference; often the same as MainCustomerBillingID.
Shipping address for the contract (very sparse in this table).
Marketing/offer campaign associated with the contract.
Salesperson code responsible for the contract.
Channel through which the contract was sold (e.g., direct, partner).
Optional link to a support/service ticket related to this contract.
Optional external/data-mart key. DMTable and DMCharKey indicate target; not a strict DB foreign key.

measures.name: Receipt Count
measures.description: Number of receipt records (one per SystemReceiptID)

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts collected on receipts

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Smallest receipt amount

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Largest receipt amount

measures.name: Payoff Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoff

measures.name: Payoff Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount collected for receipts marked as payoff

measures.name: Percent Payoffs
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID),0))
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (Payoff Count / Receipt Count)

measures.name: Cash Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentChannel = N'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount collected via cash (PaymentChannel = 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ')

measures.name: Credit Card Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount where credit card details are present

measures.name: Credit Card Transactions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL OR TransactionID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts with credit-card related information (TransactionID or CreditCardNumber present)

measures.name: Checks Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount attributed to receipts that include a check number

measures.name: Bank Deposit Count
measures.description: Count of receipts that have an associated bank deposit number (non-null)

measures.name: Average Deposit Lag (days)
measures.description: Average number of days between collection date and bank deposit date (only records with BankDepositDate)

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of rows / records in the detail file

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the file

measures.name: TotalPrintAmount
measures.description: Sum of print-related spend captured in the upload

measures.name: TotalPPCAmount
measures.description: Sum of PPC (pay-per-click) spend captured in the upload

measures.name: TotalXOGRAmount
measures.description: Sum of XOGR amount (primary spend field) captured in the upload

measures.name: TotalWebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of website-related spend captured in the upload

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount from the upload. Use this as canonical total spend when available

measures.name: AvgTotalAmountPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per row (useful to approximate typical spend per business point / row)

measures.name: XOGRShareOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(XOGRAmount) / SUM(TotalAmount) END
measures.description: Share of XOGRAmount relative to TotalAmount (XOGRAmount / TotalAmount). Null when TotalAmount is zero or missing

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of records (rows) in the CampaignNewLossCustomer table.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointID values represented in the selected set.

measures.name: Distinct Rules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules (RuleID) represented in the selected set.

measures.name: Requested To Suspend Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where a suspend request was made.

measures.name: Requested To Suspend Rate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of records that have IsRequestedToSuspend = true.

measures.name: Suspended Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where the BusinessPoint is currently suspended.

measures.name: Suspended Rate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of records where IsSuspended = true.

measures.name: New Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records flagged as new records.

measures.name: New Record Rate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of records marked as new (IsNewRecord = true).

measures.name: Requested To Resume Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where a resume request was made.

measures.name: Requested To Resume Rate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of records that have IsRequestedToResume = true.

measures.name: Batch Assigned Count
measures.description: Number of records associated with a non-null BatchID (i.e., assigned to a batch).

measures.name: Batch Assigned Rate
measures.description: Percent of records that have a BatchID assigned.

measures.name: Dialer Action Assigned Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerAction IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where a dialer action value is present (non-null).

measures.name: Dialer Action Non-Zero Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerAction IS NOT NULL AND DialerAction <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where DialerAction is present and not equal to zero (indicates actionable dialer value).

measures.name: ActionResult Not-Null Count
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null ActionResult text value.

measures.name: RuleCount
measures.description: Number of rule records (one row per rule definition).

measures.name: CustomerTotalCount
measures.description: Sum of total customers associated with the rule (pre-calculated in source). Use this to measure total reach of the rule.

measures.name: CustomerRegionCount
measures.description: Sum of customer-region counts associated with the rule (source-provided). May represent aggregated customers by region.

measures.name: CustomerMainActivityCount
measures.description: Sum of customers meeting the rule's main activity criteria (pre-aggregated in source).

measures.name: CustomerIndicatorCount
measures.description: Sum of customers flagged by the rule's indicator(s).

measures.name: CustomerSourceCount
measures.description: Sum of customers attributed to the rule by source (pre-aggregated).

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerRule
measures.description: Average total customers per rule record.

measures.name: IndicatorRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CustomerTotalCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CustomerIndicatorCount) * 1.0 / SUM(CustomerTotalCount) END
measures.description: Proportion of customers flagged by indicators relative to total customers for the rule. NULL when total is zero.

measures.name: MainActivityShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CustomerTotalCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CustomerMainActivityCount) * 1.0 / SUM(CustomerTotalCount) END
measures.description: Share of customers that meet the main activity criteria out of total customers for the rule. NULL when total is zero.

default_filters.description: Only show active rules by default.

measures.name: RegionRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the fact — each row represents a single rule-to-region assignment.

measures.name: DistinctBroaderAreas
measures.description: Number of unique broader areas represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctRules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign/new-loss rules referenced by the rows in the selected scope.

measures.name: AverageRegionsPerRule
measures.description: Average number of broader areas (regions) associated per rule across the selected scope. Computed as total rows divided by number of distinct rules.

measures.name: PercentOfAllRegions
measures.description: Share of rows (regions) in the current filter context compared to the entire table (useful for distribution analysis).

display.notes: This table maps campaign/new-loss rules to broader geographical areas. GeoModelVersion historically appears as '3.0' in the current data; include version filter to limit to a specific geography model when appropriate.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of salesman-to-campaign assignment records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the filtered dataset or aggregation context.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen represented in the filtered dataset or aggregation context.

measures.name: Average Assignments per Salesman
measures.description: Average number of campaign assignments per salesman in the aggregation scope. NULL-safe division.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Number of salesman-to-campaign assignment records (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: Active Assignment Count
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= GETDATE() THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments that are currently active (no EndDate or EndDate is in the future). Uses server current date (GETDATE()).

measures.name: Open Assignment Share
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share (percentage) of assignments that have no EndDate (still open).

measures.name: Total Assignment Days
measures.description: Sum of the lengths (in days) of all assignments where both BeginDate and EndDate are present. Rows with null BeginDate or EndDate are excluded from the DATEDIFF calculation by the database DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: Average Assignment Length (Days)
measures.description: Average length in days of assignments where both BeginDate and EndDate are present. Null BeginDate/EndDate rows are ignored.

measures.name: DailyTarget (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the configured daily new-customer targets for the stored rows. Use to aggregate planned daily new-customer targets across campaigns, segments and salespeople.

measures.name: DailyTarget (avg)
measures.description: Average configured daily new-customer target per row. Useful to understand typical daily expectations.

measures.name: UserDailyTarget (sum)
measures.description: Sum of user-specific daily targets where set. Nulls are ignored by SUM; use Effective Daily Target to include fallbacks.

measures.name: EffectiveDailyTarget (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the effective daily target using UserDailyTarget when present and falling back to DailyTarget when user override is missing. Represents the operational daily target to be achieved by salespeople.

measures.name: Target (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the period (campaign/segment) new-customer targets. Represents the total planned new customers for the record aggregation.

measures.name: Target (avg)
measures.description: Average period target per row. Useful to compare target levels across segments or salespeople.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the selection. Use for basic cardinality checks.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salespeople represented in the current selection.

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of rows (segment-salesman assignment records)

measures.name: Included Quantity
measures.description: Total quantity explicitly included for the salesman within the campaign segment

measures.name: Excluded Quantity
measures.description: Total quantity explicitly excluded for the salesman within the campaign segment

measures.name: Included Others Quantity
measures.description: Total quantity included for other categories (nullable)

measures.name: Total Quantity
measures.description: Total quantity considered for the assignment (primary total)

measures.name: Net Included Quantity
measures.description: Net included quantity after subtracting exclusions

measures.name: Inclusion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of the total that was included (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity)

measures.name: Exclusion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ExcludedQuantity) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalQuantity) END
measures.description: Share of the total that was excluded (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity)

measures.name: Second Included Quantity
measures.description: Secondary included quantity (alternate or secondary pass)

measures.name: Second Excluded Quantity
measures.description: Secondary excluded quantity (alternate or secondary pass)

measures.name: Second Total Quantity
measures.description: Secondary total quantity (alternate or secondary pass)

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of campaign range records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctRangeTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct range types present for the campaign ranges.

measures.name: RangeWidth_Average
measures.description: Average width of the range (upper limit minus lower limit). Note: RangeUpLimt column name preserved as in source.

measures.name: RangeWidth_Sum
measures.description: Sum of all range widths (useful for aggregate span calculations).

measures.name: RangeUpMaximum
measures.description: Maximum upper limit across ranges.

measures.name: RangeDownMinimum
measures.description: Minimum lower limit across ranges.

measures.name: Pct_WithUpperLimit
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RangeUpLimt IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percent of ranges that have an upper limit defined.

measures.name: Total Assignments
measures.description: Number of campaign-region assignment rows (one row per Campaign x BroaderArea mapping).

measures.name: Distinct Regions
measures.description: Number of distinct BroaderArea regions referenced in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: Average Regions per Campaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT_DISTINCT(CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT_DISTINCT(CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of BroaderArea assignments per campaign within the current filter context.

display.description: Fact-level mapping of campaigns to geographic BroaderArea regions. Use to measure campaign geographic reach and assignments.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of action history rows (events) recorded.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the action history.

measures.name: DistinctActionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct actions referenced in the history.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch_Avg
measures.description: Average number of actions (rows) per batch.

measures.name: DistinctActionsPerBatch_Avg
measures.description: Average number of distinct actions per batch.

measures.name: EntityType2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where EntityType = 2 (most common entity type in this table sample).

measures.name: EntityType2_Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of rows that have EntityType = 2.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded events (rows) in the fact table for the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches observed in the filtered result set.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across events. Represents the total number of rows changed by the recorded actions.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAverage
measures.description: Average rows affected per event.

measures.name: BatchesWithRowsAffectedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RowsAffected > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where RowsAffected is greater than zero.

measures.name: PercentBatchesWithRowsAffected
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RowsAffected > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID), 0)
measures.description: Share of distinct batches that have at least one event with RowsAffected > 0 (expressed as percentage of distinct batches).

measures.name: EventsPerBatchAverage
measures.description: Average number of events recorded per batch (events / distinct batches).

measures.name: DistinctTextMessages
measures.description: Number of distinct Text message variants recorded in the filtered result.

measures.name: FirstEventTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest event timestamp in the filtered result.

measures.name: LastEventTimestamp
measures.description: Latest event timestamp in the filtered result.

foreign_keys.note: Suggested reference to a batch header/master table if available.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded actions (row count) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct processing batches represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctActionTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct action identifiers observed (distinct ActionID values) in the selected scope.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(COUNT_BIG(ID) AS FLOAT) / CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) AS FLOAT) END
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per batch in the selected scope.

measures.name: CallCount
measures.description: Total number of click-to-call events (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctPhoneCount
measures.description: Number of unique phone numbers that were called.

measures.name: DistinctUserCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who initiated click-to-call events.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with click-to-call events.

measures.name: CallsWithKSIdentifier
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KSCallIdentifier IS NOT NULL AND KSCallIdentifier <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of calls that have a non-empty KSCallIdentifier (call tracking identifier).

measures.name: CallsMissingKSIdentifier
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KSCallIdentifier IS NULL OR KSCallIdentifier = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of calls without a KSCallIdentifier (missing call tracking identifier).

measures.name: AverageCallsPerUser
measures.description: Average number of calls per active user in the selected scope.

measures.name: FirstCallTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest call timestamp in the selected scope.

measures.name: LastCallTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent call timestamp in the selected scope.

measures.name: EntryCount
measures.description: Total number of log entries in this table (one row per log entry).

measures.name: SessionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct click-to-call sessions referenced by ClickToCallHarmonyHistoryID.

measures.name: UniqueTextCount
measures.description: Count of distinct Text values observed (useful to measure variety/verbosity of log messages).

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log entries classified as errors (LogEntryType = 2). This mapping is inferred from sample values (e.g., '03: AGENT COMMUNITATION ERROR'); verify LogEntryType semantics in source system.

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log entries marked as completed (LogEntryType = 3). Mapping inferred from observed LogEntryType values; validate against source documentation.

measures.name: ErrorRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of entries that are errors (ErrorCount / EntryCount). Useful to monitor failure rate in logged sessions.

measures.name: AvgEntriesPerSession
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ClickToCallHarmonyHistoryID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT ClickToCallHarmonyHistoryID) END
measures.description: Average number of log entries per click-to-call session (EntryCount / SessionCount).

measures.name: MostRecentEntryTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent log entry recorded in the table.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows in the result set (one row per ContractID + ContractProductID)

measures.name: NoSubr Total Before Discount
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription total amounts before discounts for the contract product

measures.name: NoSubr Total After Discount
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription total amounts after discounts for the contract product

measures.name: NoSubr Discount Amount
measures.description: Total discount applied to non-subscription amounts (Before - After)

measures.name: NoSubr Discount % (of before)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) - SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount)) / SUM(NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) END
measures.description: Percentage discount applied to non-subscription amounts relative to the before-discount total

measures.name: Subscription Total Before Discount
measures.description: Sum of subscription total amounts before discounts for the contract product

measures.name: Subscription Total After Discount
measures.description: Sum of subscription total amounts after discounts for the contract product

measures.name: Subscription Discount Amount
measures.description: Total discount applied to subscription amounts (Before - After)

measures.name: Subscription Discount % (of before)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) - SUM(SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount)) / SUM(SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) END
measures.description: Percentage discount applied to subscription amounts relative to the before-discount total

measures.name: Renewal Total Before Discount
measures.description: Sum of renewal total amounts before discounts for the contract product

measures.name: Renewal Total After Discount
measures.description: Sum of renewal total amounts after discounts for the contract product

measures.name: Renewal Discount Amount
measures.description: Total discount applied to renewal amounts (Before - After)

measures.name: Renewal Discount % (of before)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) - SUM(RenewalTotalAmountAfterDiscount)) / SUM(RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount) END
measures.description: Percentage discount applied to renewal amounts relative to the before-discount total

measures.name: Pre-Printed Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of pre-printed total amounts associated with the contract product

measures.name: Final Price
measures.description: Sum of the final price recorded for the contract product (post discounts and adjustments)

measures.name: Earliest Signed Date (per row)
measures.description: Earliest signed date recorded for the contract product (minimum of MinSignedDate)

measures.name: Latest Signed Date (per row)
measures.description: Latest signed date recorded for the contract product (maximum of LastSignedDate)

measures.name: Earliest Advertisement End Date (per row)
measures.description: Earliest advertisement end date associated with the contract product (minimum of MinAdvEndDate)

measures.name: DetailCount
measures.description: Number of detail rows (row count)

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the result set

measures.name: SumContractAmount
measures.description: Total contract amount (sum of ContractAmount). NULL values are ignored by SUM.

measures.name: AvgContractAmount
measures.description: Average contract amount per detail row (ignores NULL ContractAmount values)

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contract details flagged as bundles

measures.name: SumCPAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of CPAlteredAmount where present (treated as 0 when NULL). Column has no declared type in source; validate type before trusting results.

measures.name: SumAdvAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of AdvAlteredAmount where present (treated as 0 when NULL). Column has no declared type in source; validate type before trusting results.

measures.name: TotalAdvertisementDays
measures.description: Total number of advertisement days across details (AdvEndDate - AdvBeginDate). Rows with NULL begin or end dates will contribute NULL to the DATEDIFF and should be handled by the reporting layer if needed.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Total number of business points (records) in the stage-1 snapshot.

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points marked as active.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(BusinessPointID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(BusinessPointID) END
measures.description: Share of business points that are active (ActiveBusinessPointCount / BusinessPointCount).

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points flagged with a payment refusal.

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points marked as disappeared.

measures.name: PrecariousLegalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points flagged for legal precariousness.
