measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with continuous payment refusal.

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a sealed check flag.

measures.name: ProspectCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ProspectCreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points that have a ProspectCreatedOn timestamp (i.e., were created as prospects).

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BrandName values represented in the business points.

measures.name: AverageDaysSinceLastModified
measures.description: Average number of days since each business point was last modified (uses GETDATE()). Null LastModifiedOn values are ignored.

measures.name: MaxLastModifiedOn
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedOn timestamp for business points in the current filter context.

measures.name: BusinessPoint Count
measures.description: Number of unique business points (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Primary Phones
measures.description: Number of distinct non-empty values in the primary Phone column.

measures.name: Total Phone Numbers (all columns)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone1,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone2,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone3,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone4,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN NULLIF(Phone5,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total count of non-empty phone number entries across Phone, Phone1..Phone5 (measures phone coverage / inventory).

measures.name: Contactable Count (PhoneM11)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points flagged as contactable by the PhoneM11 indicator.

measures.name: Percent Contactable (PhoneM11)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(BusinessPointID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(BusinessPointID) END
measures.description: Share of business points that are contactable (PhoneM11 = true).

measures.name: Sum Y01AD Total Preprinted Value
measures.description: Aggregate of Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue (preprinted ad value). Data hints indicate USD for this column.

measures.name: Sum Subscription Value

measures.name: Snapshot Working Days (Total)
measures.description: Total number of working days recorded in the snapshot across the grouping. Use this to understand aggregate working-day capacity in the snapshot.

measures.name: Snapshot Working Days (Average)
measures.description: Average working days per record within the grouping. Useful for per-salesman or per-segment comparisons.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the grouping. Useful as a denominator for rate calculations and data quality checks.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen represented in the grouping for the snapshot.

display.notes: Grain is at Campaign + Segment + Supervisor + Salesman + SnapshotDate + ReportUser. SnapshotWorkingdays is treated as the primary metric (working days) and aggregated with SUM/AVG. If ReportUserID should not be part of the uniqueness for your reporting needs, consider removing it from the grain to roll up across report creators.

measures.name: HistoryRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the CampaignScoreAvgROCOHistory table (history records).

measures.name: SumTotalScore
measures.description: Total (sum) of TotalScore across history rows. Monetary measure in USD.

measures.name: SumNumberOfRecords
measures.description: Sum of NumberOfRecords across rows — total records evaluated for the campaign segments.

measures.name: AvgOfAvgScore
measures.description: Average of the AvgScore field across history rows (arithmetic mean of AvgScore values).

measures.name: WeightedAvgScorePerRecord
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfRecords) = 0 OR SUM(NumberOfRecords) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalScore) / SUM(NumberOfRecords) END
measures.description: Weighted average score per record computed as SUM(TotalScore) / SUM(NumberOfRecords). Uses totals to produce a per-record monetary average (USD). NULL when NumberOfRecords is zero or missing.

measures.name: Avg_XOGR_ROCO
measures.description: Average XOGR_ROCO value across history rows (channel-level ROCO).

measures.description: Average PPC_ROCO value across history rows (channel-level ROCO for PPC).

measures.name: Avg_Print_ROCO
measures.description: Average Print_ROCO value across history rows (channel-level ROCO for print).

measures.name: Avg_XOGR_ROCO_User_pct
measures.description: Average user-level XOGR ROCO expressed on a 0-100 scale (e.g. 88.2 means 88.2%).

measures.name: Avg_PPC_ROCO_User_pct
measures.description: Average user-level PPC ROCO expressed on a 0-100 scale.

measures.name: Avg_Print_ROCO_User_pct
measures.description: Average user-level Print ROCO expressed on a 0-100 scale. Many values are null; aggregation ignores nulls.

measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the filtered set of history rows.

measures.description: Number of distinct behaviour name variants captured in the snapshots (distinct Name values).

measures.name: Snapshot Count
measures.description: Number of snapshot records (rows) represented by the current aggregation. At the base grain this will be 1 per ID.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values for the selected slice. Amount represents the score/weight assigned to the activity group in the snapshot.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average Amount per snapshot within the current filter context.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Lowest Amount value in the current aggregation.

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Highest Amount value in the current aggregation.

measures.name: Distinct Campaign Count
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: Share of Campaign Total (by Amount)
measures.description: The proportion of the campaign's total Amount contributed by the current group(s). Computed as the group's Amount divided by the campaign's total Amount.

measures.name: TotalInvestment
measures.description: Sum of recorded investment amounts in this snapshot (sums all rows in the current query context). Useful for campaign-level rollups of investment across media.

measures.name: AverageInvestment
measures.description: Average investment amount across the selected rows or media. Helpful to understand typical investment size per medium in the snapshot.

measures.name: MaximumInvestment
measures.description: Maximum recorded investment amount among the selected rows. For a given campaign this often represents the largest medium investment captured in the snapshot.

measures.name: MinimumInvestment
measures.description: Minimum recorded investment amount among the selected rows. Useful to identify smallest medium investments in the snapshot.

measures.name: InvestmentRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (media entries) in the current result set or filter context. At the grain each row represents one medium snapshot entry.

measures.name: DistinctMediumCount
measures.description: Count of distinct media names (e.g., Print, PPC, Websites) present in the current context. Useful to see how many different media are recorded for a campaign.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total amount (score/spend) for the medium combination in the snapshot.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per record for this medium combination.

measures.name: MinimumAmount
measures.description: Minimum recorded amount for this medium combination.

measures.name: MaximumAmount
measures.description: Maximum recorded amount for this medium combination.

measures.name: CombinationCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot rows (combinations) represented by the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctMediumTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct medium type codes present for the selected campaign or context.

measures.name: PercentOfCampaignAmount
measures.description: Share of this medium combination's total amount relative to the total amount across the same Campaign (partitioned by CampaignID). Useful to understand contribution within a campaign.

measures.name: Total Amount

measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements marked as verified.

measures.name: VerifiedPercent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of advertisements that are verified.

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements that are subscription-based.

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedPercent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of advertisements that are subscription-based.

measures.name: WithAttachmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CaseAttachmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements that have a case attachment.

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute value rows (row count).

measures.name: PopulatedValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the Value column is populated (not NULL).

measures.name: PopulatedRate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows with a non-null Value expressed as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: QAFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked for QA (QA = true).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeDefinitions
measures.description: Count of distinct content attribute definitions represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctProductParts
measures.description: Count of distinct product parts referenced by these attribute values.

default_filters.description: Commonly useful to focus on populated attribute values

measures.name: TargetValue (sum)
measures.description: Sum of TargetValue for the target group item value rows. Values provided at three decimal places in source.

measures.name: ChannelTargetValue (sum)
measures.description: Sum of Channel-level target value assigned to the item.

measures.name: UserTargetValue (sum)
measures.description: Sum of User-specific target value for the item.

measures.name: RequestedDiscountAmount (sum)
measures.description: Total requested discount amount. Currency assumed EUR based on system locale; validate if different.

measures.name: RequestedDiscountPercentage (avg)
measures.description: Average requested discount percentage across rows. Use average rather than sum because this is a percentage measure.

measures.name: FixOfferDiffValue (sum)
measures.description: Sum of the difference value for fixed offers (monetary).

measures.name: Visits (sum)
measures.description: Total number of visits recorded for these target items.

measures.name: LossPrintedNew (sum)
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew (integer-coded loss/print metric).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (target item value records) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Released Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as released.

measures.name: Closed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsClosed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as closed.

measures.name: BP Identity Confirmed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where business partner identity was confirmed.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of target group item info rows (distinct TargetGroupItemValueID)

measures.name: BalanceValue
measures.description: Aggregate current balance value for the item

measures.name: DueBalanceValue
measures.description: Aggregate due balance value

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue
measures.description: Aggregate settlement balance value

measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue + Y02PBDContractsValue + Y03PBDContractsValue + Y04PBDContractsValue + Y05PBDContractsValue + Y06PBDContractsValue + Y07PBDContractsValue + Y08PBDContractsValue + Y09PBDContractsValue + Y10PBDContractsValue + Y11PBDContractsValue + Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Sum of PBD contracts values across all Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue + Y02PADContractsValue + Y03PADContractsValue + Y04PADContractsValue + Y05PADContractsValue + Y06PADContractsValue + Y07PADContractsValue + Y08PADContractsValue + Y09PADContractsValue + Y10PADContractsValue + Y11PADContractsValue + Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Sum of PAD contracts values across all Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue + Y02IBDContractsValue + Y03IBDContractsValue + Y04IBDContractsValue + Y05IBDContractsValue + Y06IBDContractsValue + Y07IBDContractsValue + Y08IBDContractsValue + Y09IBDContractsValue + Y10IBDContractsValue + Y11IBDContractsValue + Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Sum of IBD contracts values across all Y01..Y12 periods (internet/business directory related)

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue + Y02IADContractsValue + Y03IADContractsValue + Y04IADContractsValue + Y05IADContractsValue + Y06IADContractsValue + Y07IADContractsValue + Y08IADContractsValue + Y09IADContractsValue + Y10IADContractsValue + Y11IADContractsValue + Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Sum of IAD contracts values across all Y01..Y12 periods (internet/ad related)

measures.name: TotalContractValue
measures.expression: SUM((Y01PBDContractsValue + Y02PBDContractsValue + Y03PBDContractsValue + Y04PBDContractsValue + Y05PBDContractsValue + Y06PBDContractsValue + Y07PBDContractsValue + Y08PBDContractsValue + Y09PBDContractsValue + Y10PBDContractsValue + Y11PBDContractsValue + Y12PBDContractsValue) + (Y01PADContractsValue + Y02PADContractsValue + Y03PADContractsValue + Y04PADContractsValue + Y05PADContractsValue + Y06PADContractsValue + Y07PADContractsValue + Y08PADContractsValue + Y09PADContractsValue + Y10PADContractsValue + Y11PADContractsValue + Y12PADContractsValue) + (Y01IBDContractsValue + Y02IBDContractsValue + Y03IBDContractsValue + Y04IBDContractsValue + Y05IBDContractsValue + Y06IBDContractsValue + Y07IBDContractsValue + Y08IBDContractsValue + Y09IBDContractsValue + Y10IBDContractsValue + Y11IBDContractsValue + Y12IBDContractsValue) + (Y01IADContractsValue + Y02IADContractsValue + Y03IADContractsValue + Y04IADContractsValue + Y05IADContractsValue + Y06IADContractsValue + Y07IADContractsValue + Y08IADContractsValue + Y09IADContractsValue + Y10IADContractsValue + Y11IADContractsValue + Y12IADContractsValue))
measures.description: Total contracts value across PBD, PAD, IBD and IAD across all Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Aggregate of total preprinted value (combined channels)

measures.name: PrintPreprintedValue
measures.description: Aggregate preprinted value for print channel

measures.name: InternetPreprintedValue
measures.description: Aggregate preprinted value for internet channel

measures.name: ExpirationValueInternet
measures.description: Aggregate expiration value for internet-related items

measures.name: SubscriptionValue
measures.description: Aggregate subscription value

measures.name: CancelAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount canceled

measures.name: CreditInvoiceValue
measures.description: Aggregate credit invoice value

measures.name: ExchangeSaleValue
measures.description: Aggregate value related to exchange sales

measures.name: Entries_Y01
measures.description: Sum of entries for period Y01

measures.name: Entries_Y02
measures.description: Sum of entries for period Y02

measures.name: DirectoriesSections_Y01
measures.description: Sum of directories/sections for period Y01

measures.name: DirectoriesSections_Y02
measures.description: Sum of directories/sections for period Y02

measures.name: HasOnline_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasOnline = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items marked as having online presence

measures.name: HasLogo_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Y01HasLogo = 1 OR Y02HasLogo = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items with logo in either Y01 or Y02 (quick indicator)

measures.name: ROI_Items_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Y01HasROI = 1 OR Y02HasROI = 1 OR Y03HasROI = 1 OR Y04HasROI = 1 OR Y05HasROI = 1 OR Y06HasROI = 1 OR Y07HasROI = 1 OR Y08HasROI = 1 OR Y09HasROI = 1 OR Y10HasROI = 1 OR Y11HasROI = 1 OR Y12HasROI = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items that have any ROI flag set across Y01..Y12

display.notes: Many monetary columns use period-prefixed columns (Y01..Y12). Default currency is set to EUR — validate against source system if different. Consider adding a consolidated date dimension or period mapping for Y01..Y12 for time-series reporting.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of history records (row-level count).

measures.name: Active Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of non-deleted (active) history records.

measures.name: Deleted Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as deleted.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salespeople represented in the history set.

measures.name: Distinct Supervisors
measures.description: Number of unique supervisors referenced in the history set.

measures.name: Distinct Managers
measures.description: Number of unique managers referenced in the history set.

measures.name: Distinct Segments
measures.description: Number of distinct segments present in the history.

measures.name: Years Covered
measures.description: Count of distinct years represented in the history table.

measures.name: Earliest CreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp among the selected records.

measures.name: Latest CreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent CreatedOn timestamp among the selected records.

display.notes: This table represents historical snapshots of sales organization assignments. Use IsDeleted to filter out tombstoned rows. DMKey/DMTable/DMCharKey are unused in the current dataset (all null).

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of logged events (row count)

measures.name: DistinctEventGroups
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers represented in the selected set

measures.name: TotalRowsProcessed
measures.description: Sum of RowCountVal - total rows affected/processed across events

measures.name: AvgRowsPerEvent
measures.description: Average RowCountVal per event

measures.name: TotalDataSizeBytes
measures.description: Total DataSize in bytes summed across events

measures.name: AvgDataSizeBytes
measures.description: Average DataSize in bytes per event

measures.name: TotalLogSizeBytes
measures.description: Total LogSize in bytes summed across events

measures.name: AvgLogSizeBytes
measures.description: Average LogSize in bytes per event

measures.name: FirstEventDate
measures.description: Earliest event timestamp in the selected set

measures.name: LastEventDate
measures.description: Latest event timestamp in the selected set

measures.name: AvgEventsPerEventGroup
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT EventGroup)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID)*1.0/COUNT(DISTINCT EventGroup) END
measures.description: Average number of events per distinct EventGroup in the selection

default_filters.description: Only include events that have a timestamp

display.notes: EventGroup appears to be a session/process identifier; if a dimension for EventGroup exists (e.g., DimEventGroup) consider adding a foreign key for richer reporting. Descr is a free-text description and is suitable for drill/context but not ideal as a primary grouping due to high cardinality (distinct_count ~238).

measures.name: Events
measures.description: Number of archive rows (event groups). At the table grain each row represents a logged event group identified by ID.

measures.name: RecordsProcessed
measures.description: Total number of records (Recs) aggregated across the selected rows. Recs is the per-event count stored in the Recs column.

measures.name: AverageRecordsPerEvent
measures.description: Average number of records (Recs) per archived event group.

measures.name: DistinctEventGroups
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers represented in the result set.

measures.name: IDSpan
measures.description: Cumulative span of ID ranges across rows (EndID - StartID). Useful as a crude measure of how many ID positions were covered by the archived batches.

measures.name: MinEventDate
measures.description: Earliest EventDate in the filtered set — useful for bounding the time range of archived events.

measures.name: MaxEventDate
measures.description: Latest EventDate in the filtered set — useful for bounding the time range of archived events.

measures.name: MinStartID
measures.description: Minimum StartID across the selected rows.

measures.name: MaxEndID
measures.description: Maximum EndID across the selected rows.

measures.name: Event Count
measures.description: Total number of log events (one row per event).

measures.name: Unique Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users who generated events in the selected scope.

measures.name: Events per User (avg)
measures.description: Average number of events per distinct user (Event Count divided by Unique Users).

measures.name: Action = 1 Events
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Action equals 1. (Action semantics not provided; this is the binary "1" bucket.)

measures.name: Action = 0 Events
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Action equals 0. (Action semantics not provided; this is the binary "0" bucket.)

measures.name: Unique PCs
measures.description: Number of distinct PC identifiers observed in the events.

measures.name: Unique IPs
measures.description: Number of distinct IP addresses observed in the events.

measures.name: Events per PC (avg)
measures.description: Average number of events per distinct PC.

measures.name: First Event Timestamp
measures.description: Earliest event timestamp in the selected scope.

measures.name: Last Event Timestamp
measures.description: Latest event timestamp in the selected scope.

measures.name: Event Rate (per day)
measures.description: Average number of events per day across the period defined by the earliest and latest event in the selection.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of text rows (one row per Id).

measures.name: Distinct Text Count
measures.description: Number of distinct text values stored in the batch search text table.

measures.name: Distinct BatchSearch Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchSearch records referenced by these text rows.

measures.name: Average Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Average length of the Text column in characters.

measures.name: Maximum Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Maximum length (in characters) observed for Text.

measures.name: Minimum Text Length (chars)
measures.description: Minimum length (in characters) observed for Text.

measures.name: Average Word Count
measures.description: Estimated average number of words per Text (simple space-delimited heuristic).

measures.name: Duplicate Text Count
measures.description: Number of rows whose Text value is a duplicate of another row's Text.

measures.name: Percent Duplicate Text
measures.description: Share of rows that are duplicates by Text (0-1 expressed as percentage).

measures.name: Unique Text Ratio
measures.description: Share of rows that are unique by Text (complement of Percent Duplicate Text).

measures.name: SearchCount
measures.description: Number of individual search records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: UniqueSearchPhrases
measures.description: Count of distinct search text phrases submitted.

measures.name: TotalResultsReturned
measures.description: Total number of result items returned across all searches.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MaxResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Maximum number of results returned for a single search.

measures.name: MinResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Minimum number of results returned for a single search.

measures.name: NullResultsCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN ResultsCount IS NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of searches where ResultsCount is NULL (no recorded result count).

measures.name: ResultCoverageRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultsCount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Share of searches that returned at least one result (percentage of searches with ResultsCount > 0).

measures.name: ResultCount
measures.description: Number of search result records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Distinct number of BusinessPointId values observed in the result set.

measures.name: CurrentResultCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results flagged as current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: MultipleBusinessPointsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results where HasMultipleBusinessPoints is true.

measures.name: HasPhoneNumberCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that include an international phone number.

measures.name: TotalUserRatings
measures.description: Sum of userRatingCount extracted from the Response JSON (total number of Google user ratings across results).

measures.name: AverageRating
measures.description: Average rating (JSON $.rating) extracted from Response JSON; nulls ignored.

measures.name: AverageCompletenessPercent
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) > 0 THEN TRY_CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)-1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)+1, 10) AS FLOAT), 0) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average completeness derived from CompletenessScore (format like '8/9') expressed as a fraction (e.g. 0.888 -> 88.8%).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount across receipts. Amount is cast to decimal to ensure numeric aggregation.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the dataset.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum single receipt amount.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum single receipt amount.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(IsPayoff AS INT) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoffs (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(SystemReceiptID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(IsPayoff AS INT) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(SystemReceiptID) END
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the buffer (based on CustomerCode).

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts whose Status is COMPLETED.

measures.name: CashAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentChannel = N'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' THEN TRY_CAST(Amount AS DECIMAL(18,3)) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount collected where the payment channel is cash (PaymentChannel = 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ').

measures.name: BankDepositAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CAST(Amount AS DECIMAL(18,3)) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts that have an associated bank deposit number (indicates a bank deposit has been recorded).

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts with an associated bank deposit number.

measures.name: CreditCardTransactionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransactionID IS NOT NULL OR CreditCardTypeID IS NOT NULL OR CreditCardNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts that appear to be credit card transactions (presence of TransactionID or credit card fields).

display.notes: Amounts are stored in local currency (assumed EUR). CollectionDate is the primary date for reporting receipts. Consider joining DimCustomer and DimDate for meaningful labels and hierarchies.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount across receipts (sum of Amount).

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the collection.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of unique customers represented by MainCustomerCode in the dataset.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: AverageReceiptAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: MaxReceiptAmount
measures.description: Largest single receipt amount.

measures.name: MinReceiptAmount
measures.description: Smallest single receipt amount.

measures.name: CreditCardTransactionCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CreaditCardTransactionID) - COUNT(NULLIF(CreaditCardTransactionID, CreaditCardTransactionID)) + SUM(CASE WHEN CreaditCardTransactionID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts with a credit card transaction identifier (non-null CreaditCardTransactionID). Note: credit card fields have high null rate.

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts that have a bank deposit number (indicates a bank deposit was recorded).

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.description: Number of failure rows (each row represents one detected renewal failure event)

measures.name: UniqueContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one renewal failure in the selected set

measures.name: RowsWithErrors
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(Errors, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Rows where the Errors text column is not empty

measures.name: IsInvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of failures flagged as invalid (IsInvalid = 1)

measures.name: IsInvalidPercent
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of failure rows that are marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target contract product id is marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target advertisement version section id is marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target advertisement product id is marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target advertisement heading id is marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the target advertisement geo area id is marked invalid

measures.name: Invalid_Adv_EndDate_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Adv_EndDate = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures where the advertisement end date is considered invalid

measures.name: MissingTargetProductCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_Prid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of failures flagged because the target product id is missing/invalid

measures.name: RowsBySalesman
measures.description: Alias measure (same as FailureCount) useful when breaking down by SalesMan (use with SalesMan dimension)

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of target group item rows (count of TargetGroupItemValueID)

measures.name: TotalContractValue_AllYears_AllTypes

measures.name: TotalContractValue_Year1_AllTypes
measures.description: Total contract value for year Y01 across all contract types.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Total preprinted value (print + internet + multimedia) for the item.

measures.name: PrintPreprintedValue
measures.description: Monetary value of print preprinted items.

measures.name: InternetPreprintedValue
measures.description: Monetary value of internet preprinted items.

measures.name: MultimediaPreprintedValue
measures.description: Monetary value of multimedia preprinted items.

measures.name: BalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of balance value for the target group items.

measures.name: DueBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of due balance value.

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of settlement balance value.

measures.name: CancelAmount
measures.description: Total cancelled amount.

measures.name: CreditInvoiceValue
measures.description: Sum of credit invoice values.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleValue
measures.description: Sum of exchange sale values.

measures.name: ExpirationValueInternet
measures.description: Total expiration value related to internet contracts.

measures.name: SubscriptionValue
measures.description: Sum of subscription values.

measures.name: ChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of channel target values (planned target per channel).

measures.name: UserTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of user target values (planned target per user).

measures.name: TargetValue

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of campaign bucket rows (buckets) in the result set.

measures.name: ActiveBucketCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ItemStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets marked as active (ItemStatus = 1).

measures.name: WorkingBucketCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets currently in working state (WorkingStatus = 1).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_TotalAmount
measures.description: Aggregate of TotalAmount across buckets (sum of all included medium amounts).

measures.name: Sum_XOGRAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount spent on XO.gr medium for the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_WebSiteAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount spent on website medium for the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_PPCAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount spent on PPC for the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_PrintAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount spent on print for the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amounts for the buckets.

measures.name: Sum_TargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts entered/overridden by users. Nulls are ignored by SUM.

measures.name: Avg_TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Average calculated targeting amount per bucket.

measures.name: Avg_ScoreTotal
measures.description: Average of computed total score (ScoreTotal) across buckets.

measures.name: Min_ScoreTotal
measures.description: Minimum ScoreTotal observed in the aggregated buckets.

measures.name: Max_ScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal observed in the aggregated buckets.

measures.name: Avg_ScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average difference of a bucket's score to the campaign average.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the extract (business points returned by the dialer extract).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of unique business points (distinct BusinessPointID).

measures.name: SumSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Total subscription value. Source column has scale 3; currency not specified in source metadata.

measures.name: SumY01ADTotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Total preprinted ad value (Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue). Source metadata indicates USD.

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Total count of new printed losses (sum of LossPrintedNew).

measures.name: ContactablePhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND Phone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that include at least one primary phone number (Phone is populated).

measures.name: ContactablePhonePercent
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND Phone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(*),0))
measures.description: Percentage of rows with a primary phone number (ContactablePhoneCount / RowCount).

measures.name: Phone1AvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND Phone1 <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with Phone1 populated.

measures.name: PhoneM11TrueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where PhoneM11 flag is true. Useful for measuring phone-match / consent flags captured by the dialer.

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Brandname values in this extract.

measures.name: DistinctZipCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct postal codes represented in the extract.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business points (rows).

measures.name: SumSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Total subscription value. Source column contains a DECIMAL(18,3). Currency assumed EUR (local); verify if another currency is required.

measures.name: SumY01ADTotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Total preprinted ad value for year Y01. Source metadata indicated USD for this column.

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values — represents the total 'loss printed' occurrences recorded per business point.

measures.name: AvgLossPrintedPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew per business point (ignores NULLs). Useful to understand mean loss per record.

measures.name: PhoneReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where the primary Phone (PhoneM11) is marked reachable/valid (PhoneM11 flag).

measures.name: Phone1ReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where Phone1 is marked reachable (Phone1M11 flag).

measures.name: Phone2ReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where Phone2 is marked reachable (Phone2M11 flag).

measures.name: Phone3ReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone3M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where Phone3 is marked reachable (Phone3M11 flag).

measures.name: Phone4ReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone4M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where Phone4 is marked reachable (Phone4M11 flag).

measures.name: Phone5ReachableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone5M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where Phone5 is marked reachable (Phone5M11 flag).

measures.name: PctPhoneReachable
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points with the primary phone marked reachable (PhoneM11).

measures.name: DistinctZipCodes
measures.description: Number of distinct ZipCode values represented in the current selection.

default_filters.description: Default to business points whose primary phone is marked reachable to focus on contactable points. Remove this filter for full population analyses.
